They tried to hide, but it did not save them. Another invader was able to come closest to our positions. And when our drone hovered over him, he smoked a cigarette. The pilots gave him a smoke, and then destroyed him with a targeted hit. -For courage, he chose the right to smoke his last cigarette,- the battalion commented on the video. As ArmyInform reported, a fighter of the K-2 battalion of the 54th mechanized brigade named after Hetman Ivan Mazepa was able to stop the advance of the occupiers along the line of our trenches.

Title: Find in 3 seconds - our drones conducted an investigation and went to the enemy
Description: A video about this story was released on December 6. -Alastor- pilots were conducting routine work of destroying enemy manpower and hiding places when their drone intercepted a video signal from a Russian copter for 3 seconds. The boys kept it and tried to find out the location of the Russian pilots. They found a yard among the residential buildings from which the Russians flew. Our copter went there for reconnaissance and found enemy antennas. The Russians tried to crush our drone with an EW, but it still destroyed the antenna of the Russian drones that launched the FPV drones. The second drone destroyed the antenna belonging to the enemy Mavik operators. So the enemy pilots remained for some time without the possibility of harming us. As ArmyInform reported, the operators of the -Alastor- unit of the 25th Sicheslav Airborne Brigade were able to hit the enemy armored vehicles, despite all the anti-drone protection that the Russians installed.

Title: -Attempts to cut communication and logistics channels-: in Donetsk region, the occupiers continue to...
Description: Bohdan Petrenko, head of the communications branch of the 48th Separate Artillery Brigade. According to Bohdan Petrenko, this restoration of reserves lasts three to four days. Then the scenario repeats itself. -As for the enemy's goals, they fully understand, we see that these are attempts, first of all, to cut the communication channels of logistics that go to our eastern neighbors, to our brothers, who are currently conducting defensive operations in the Pokrovsky direction,- he said Bohdan Petrenko. Earlier ArmyInform told , in the Vremiv direction, the enemy conducts 20-25 assaults every day - trying to gain a foothold at the Donetsk -junction- and Dnipropetrovsk regions.

Title: Interfaith mobile groups of military chaplains greeted soldiers at the hottest areas of the front
Description: During the difficult battles taking place near Pokrovsk, Kupiansk, and Toretsk, our defenders need spiritual support more than ever. It is the Warrior Spirit that allows the defenders to successfully fight and win.     Military priests handed over gifts from St. Nicholas to the soldiers, created a joint prayer, and spiritually supported the soldiers. Satisfying the spiritual and religious needs of our defenders is a very important element in strengthening psychological stability and psychological readiness to perform combat missions. — In the conditions of a limited number of full-time military chaplains in combat units, the creation of the Khortytsia OSU Command of mobile interfaith groups of military chaplains plays an important role in providing for the spiritual and religious needs of servicemen performing combat tasks in the area of ​​operational responsibility of the command, emphasized the head of the OSU Military Chaplaincy Service -Khortytsia-, military chaplain Boris Kutovy. We remind you, Rustem Umyerov, on behalf of the Ministry of Defense, awarded defenders for their heroism and indomitable spirit with departmental awards.

Title: The Ministry of Defense offered large American businesses projects for investment in the Ukrainian d...
Description: About this reported on December 6 the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The meeting took place at the headquarters of Bank of America in New York. The event was attended by Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for European Integration Serhiy Boyev, First Deputy Prime Minister Yulia Svyridenko, First Deputy Minister of Economy Oleksiy Sobolev and Deputy Minister of Energy Roman Andarak. According to the results of the meeting, Serhii Boev noted that American business is interested in the development of production in Ukraine, as well as in investments in energy, agro-processing, transport and logistics, digitalization, mining of critical minerals and the development of the defense sector with localization in Ukraine. The Deputy Minister of Defense emphasized that the Ukrainian defense-industrial complex has reached significant potential and needs support and cooperation with partners for further progress. -The capabilities of our defense industry have the potential to grow, so cooperation with a large American business can be a significant boost,- emphasized Serhii Boev. He reminded that the largest American defense commercial companies already cooperate with Ukraine. -The foundation has already been laid, the only thing left to do is expand cooperation and increase capabilities,- Serhii Boev assured. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine and the USA signed a memorandum providing for the possibility of dopomogy-na-825-mln/->aid for $825 million

Title: As a result of an enemy missile attack on Kryvyi Rih, there is already a dead person and 8 injured, ...
Description: This is reported by the Office of the Prosecutor General of Ukraine. According to the investigation, on December 6, 2024, the Russian military launched a missile attack on the city of Kryvyi Rih A 40-year-old man died as a result of the shelling. Eight local residents sought medical help. Among the injured is a 6-year-old boy. Information about victims and destruction is being clarified. The administration building and residential buildings were damaged. Employees of the emergency services and law enforcement officers are working at the scene of the incident, recording yet another war crime of the Russian Federation. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Nikopol the rescuers came under repeated enemy fire.

Title: The President of Ukraine discussed the acceleration of aid delivery with the head of the Italian gov...
Description: This was announced by the President on December 6. -Told about the current situation on the battlefield. We discussed the continuation of military support to Ukraine, in particular, the acceleration of the provision of the next, 10th aid package. We agreed to strengthen coordination at the level of the leaders of European states in order to discuss the security situation in the region and increase the supply of air defense systems for Ukraine,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. As reported by ArmyInform, the President assigned ranks to military personnel and handed over battle flags.

Title: The voice of defense: how -Armiya FM- became a radio station for all Ukrainians
Description: To the Day of the Armed Forces, the information service of NSJU prepared a story about the main military radio of our country. The history of the radio station began in 2016 — -Army FM- was called to support military personnel in the area of ​​an anti-terrorist operation. Since then, radio has significantly expanded its audience. Today's -Army FM-, which works as part of the Central Television and Radio Studio of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine headed by Lieutenant Colonel Serhii Zhukovsky, is a radio station that speaks in 37 settlements throughout Ukraine. This is no longer exclusively a radio for military personnel, but for every Ukrainian, because practically every family has a military person. -Army FM- broadcast is structured taking into account the needs of the audience. The main prime time is in the morning and evening hours, when people go to work or return home. From 8:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m., the morning show of the famous radio presenter Serge Gagarin, who tells listeners about important events, communicates with listeners, from 4:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m., the evening show of experienced radio host Igor Kozak, and from 8:00 p.m. until 10:00 p.m. — -Evening Poe-, author's program by a famous Ukrainian singer and military serviceman Oleksandr Polozhynskyi. Under the leadership of Major Andrii Davydov, -Army FM- works with the military and political leadership, receives information about the development of the defense complex, what weapons our units are equipped with, how training is conducted. -Army FM- maintains constant contact with the audience through all available communication channels. Communication is especially active during the morning and evening shows, when listeners can join in discussing current topics. The radio station is present on all social networks and messengers, so any listener can conveniently write, express their opinion or ask questions to an expert in the studio. Among the listeners' questions are many about how to get to serve in one or another unit of the Defense Forces of Ukraine. And this despite the fact that nowadays this information can be easily found on the Internet or on street billboards. But on the radio, there is a program with military servicemen who tell how they came to serve in their units, about their military experience, about the combat path of the brigades and joint achievements. The radio also distributes recruiting videos through its social networks, from which you can learn that the army is not only about combat tasks, there is also other work that many can do. The main audience of the radio station is men and women aged 30+: current and future military personnel, volunteers and their family members. It is interesting that before the start of the full-scale invasion, the radio was listened to even in the temporarily occupied territories. Listeners from Luhansk, Donetsk, Makiivka, Debaltseve called and wrote messages. The work of military radio does not go unnoticed by the enemy. The site has been repeatedly attacked by cyber attacks. The most recent case was on the Day of Remembrance of the Holodomor Victims. The site was attacked allegedly from Indonesia, although it is clear that in fact it was from a completely different country. In the front-line territories, the Russians are trying to jam Ukrainian radio broadcasts and broadcast their own. The enemy allocates huge funds for disinformation, has at least twenty years of experience in imperial propaganda. The programming content of -Army FM- is diverse and meaningful. Every day at 4:30 p.m., the program -Stratcom Speaks- is broadcast - an up-to-date summary of the most important military and socio-political events in Ukraine and the world. Captain Kateryna Bilenko's program -There is no reason to worry- is broadcast twice a week, which tells about the legal features of military service. A special place in the broadcasting network is occupied by the program -Timely about- - the author's project of Dmytro Simanskyi. The program discusses global topics: international military cooperation, recruiting and mobilization, energy, political processes. Guests are top officials, military, diplomats and politicians. Verified objective news from primary sources and refutation of Russian fakes is the most important direction of the radio station, which is overseen by Captain Maria Veres and highly experienced journalist Oleksiy Mustafin. Andriy Vyrva provides timely sports news. Every day on -Army FM- you can hear -the same historian from Tik-Tok- Oleksandr Alfyorov, a soldier of the 3rd Assault Brigade, with a unique author's column -A Minute of Ukrainian History-. The radio station always supports a variety of events for military and veterans at all levels. A prime example of this is the partnership with Invictus Games. Its manifestation on the air is the big weekly project -Games of the Invincibles- from the inside. Also, -Army FM- likes to provide media support to interesting initiatives of units of the Defense Forces of Ukraine. A lot of attention on the radio is paid to the musical content. Radio presenter, now captain of the ZSU, Serzh Gagarin, who has more than 22 years of experience in radio broadcasting at leading Ukrainian radio stations, joined the Army FM team at the end of 2022 after serving in the Chernihiv National Guard. At the same time, a professional approach to the formation of the program grid and music playlist was applied to the broadcast. The format of -Army FM- is Modern Rock / Power Pop, which is based on rock compositions, recognizable world hits and a large share of modern music from Ukrainian rock artists who have an unblemished reputation. Ukrainian music occupies more than 40 percent of the airwaves. Nobody arbitrarily rearranges songs on the air. The music selection that the radio -plays- is determined in advance, taking into account categories, hours and audience preferences. With the passage of time since the large-scale invasion, the musical preferences of listeners have changed. -Bayraktarshchy- became less. At the beginning, there were a lot of jokes in the style of -what a Cossack you are-, -what a Cossack you are-, -Russian ship-, etc. Now is the time for more serious music that conveys important messages to listeners. Some songs can make you feel sad, and some songs can inspire you for important things and victories. At -Army FM- they are convinced that music can save, -pull out of a psychological pit.- Someone is inspired by Oleksandr Polozhynskyi's -Knight's Cross-, someone likes -Pianoboy- with the song -I can do everything-, someone likes -Surface Tension- with the motivational composition -Tomorrow-, someone likes the group -Pyratyn- and its humorous song -Arta-, someone else the work of the Finnish group -Moon Shot- called -Yes!-, recorded in support of Ukraine, or Yarmak's track -Babylon-. The Ukrainian military believes that today it is important to talk to people about Ukraine's victories - and not only at the front, but also in sports, art, film production, and the IT sphere. All of these parts make up our overall prospective Victory. The radio station is actively developing and planning new projects. I would like to see more programs, but the human resource of the Central Television and Radio Studio of the Ministry of Defense is limited, in addition, military personnel are assigned to combat units on a rotational basis. But from the New Year, some pleasant surprises are waiting for the listeners. At -Army FM- they intend to introduce an international project about global changes, talk about the political component of events in the world, how it affects Ukraine and democratic countries. They are also planning a full-length program on the fight against Russian fakes, they want to talk more about Western weapons and Ukrainian developments. As of now, military radio speaks in 37 settlements, including the big cities of Kyiv, Lviv, Kharkiv, Chernihiv, Zaporizhzhia, Poltava, Rivne, Kryvyi Rih and others. Also, the -Army FM- signal receives a considerable number of small front-line and border towns and villages, where radio is more or less the only way to receive information, so the mission of the radio station does not lose its strategic importance. Another expansion of coverage and the start of broadcasting in Mukachevo is on the way. There are plans to obtain more permits for temporary broadcasting in order to inform Ukrainians about the state of affairs in the army and the state in general. Today, Army FM is much more than just a radio station. It is an information outpost that reminds every day: together we are strong, together we are free, together we will win. It is a voice that, through music, news and communication, supports the fighting spirit of defenders and the entire Ukrainian people.

Title: The Minister of Defense visited the Irpin military hospital
Description: This was reported by the Minister in the evening of December 6. -I had the honor to talk to our heroes who are undergoing rehabilitation after serious injuries. Each of you is an example of courage and devotion to Ukraine. Thank you very much for your self-sacrifice in the fight against the Russian aggressor,- wrote Rustem Umyerov. During the meeting, the Minister listened to the proposals and comments of the servicemen. -I instructed the deputy to promptly resolve all the issues raised. Special words of gratitude to the medical staff who help our wounded defenders every day. It is thanks to their hard work that our soldiers recover faster and return to a full life,- Rustem Umyerov noted. He awarded medics with awards. -As the Minister of Defense, I assure you: we are always there, we support our defenders and provide them with everything they need. On behalf of the Ukrainian people and the Ministry of Defense, I sincerely thank each of you. Together to Victory! Glory to the Armed Forces of Ukraine!- Rustem Umyerov concluded. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense honored the memory of the Heroes and thanked the defenders for their courage.

Title: - There was a tank and no tank! That creature is a small creature! - - in Kurshchyna, the occupiers ...
Description: The video of the fight was released on December 6. The first footage taken by someone from the Russians shows a Russian tank approaching our FPV drone, followed by a powerful explosion caused by the detonation of ammunition. The explosion depresses the Russians. -But there is absolutely nothing left of him! Guess!- - shouts the invader. Up to half a dozen units of damaged Russian equipment can be seen on the field. As reported by ArmyInform, the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces visited the Kursk direction.

Title: SSO ambush on Russians, -Baba-Yaga- burns the enemy, a new weapon against tanks: a stream from a fro...
Description: The next day, the enemy sent 20 soldiers on three armored personnel carriers for reinforcements. The Russians thought that the positions were under their control and began to rush their infantry without haste. However, UA_REG immediately began liquidating the Russians and their equipment. The Russians decided to make a beautiful landing with the BMP, but they were prevented by -Cats- from the 130th battalion of the TRO. At first, they hit the infantry with skirmishes, later they burned the bekha with a direct hit. Then the -Cats- used drones to search for Russians and successively destroy them. The Sturm-S anti-tank missile system was shown for the first time in the Armed Forces. Our fighters are already learning to work with him on training grounds. It is known that -Sturm-S- is adapted and modernized to the needs of modern warfare. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - lieutenant colonel Serhiy Misyura and lieutenant Yevhen Nazarenko.

Title: Farewell flex: the last dance of the occupier was shown by our drones
Description: informs about this State Border Service of Ukraine. The operator of the FPV drone recorded on camera how the Russian occupier, trying to evade the Ukrainian UAV, -stanced- his last capoeira. -All Putin's soldiers are invited to take part in the next sports dance -competition-. We will definitely cleanse our land of Russian filth,- the department noted ironically. As reported by ArmyInform, the radio game for elimination was lured into an ambush and -vzvod-vorozhyh-morpihiv-na-kurshhyni/->killed a whole platoon of enemy marines in Kurshchyna.

Title: The TOT -military commissariats- reported on the first batch of illegals who signed a contract with ...
Description: About this reports Center of National Resistance. The workers, who were initially taken to the construction site, are now under pressure to sign a contract with the Russian army. The reason is that there is less need for their services due to a decrease in the pace of construction during the construction crisis that began in Russia. Illegals are threatened with deportation with a ban on entry, instead they are offered to sign a contract and promise not to send them to the front line. However, this is a delusion, because the empire always fights with other people's hands. We remind you that in the temporarily occupied territories, the Russians continue to destroy any Ukrainian identity.

Title: There were 119 clashes at the front: the hottest in the Pokrovsky and Kurakhiv directions
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: They are preparing against the Shaheds - our drone -ELF-P- has already shot down many Russian reconn...
Description: This was reported by the Deputy Prime Minister for Innovation, Education, Science and of Technologies, Minister of Digital Transformation of Ukraine Mykhailo Fedorov. -The Russians use reconnaissance drones to target Iskanders and Lancets.- Shooting down UAVs with anti-aircraft missiles is expensive and irrational, so Brave1 participants are actively looking for cheaper solutions. -ELF-P- is one of them,- said Mykhailo Fedorov. According to him, fighters use this drone in the Kharkiv, Sumy, Kursk and Zaporizhzhia directions. And there are already many confirmations of Russian UAVs being hit by our ELF-P drone. -Brave1 helped the manufacturer take all the necessary steps to codify according to NATO standards, as well as test it in combat conditions. Now the manufacturer is improving the development in order to use it to destroy the Shaheds,- said Mykhailo Fedorov. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine actively works to provide the Defense Forces with the most modern technologies and drones, in particular, through the implementation of large-scale projects, such as Brave1.

Title: He organized the forced mobilization of citizens for the war against Ukraine - the leader of the DNR...
Description: reports this by the Donetsk Regional Prosecutor's Office. On February 19, 2022, with the aim of waging an aggressive war against Ukraine, the -head of the DNR- entered into a conspiracy with the highest political leadership of the Russian Federation. He announced a general mobilization on the territory of Donetsk region temporarily occupied by Russian troops. Following the instructions of the Kremlin, the head of the pseudo-state entity signed a number of legally void -decrees-. At the same time, in order to increase the number of occupation troops, the accused changed the maximum age of conscripts from 55 to 65 years. Thanks to these actions, members of illegal armed formations in the regular army of the Russian Federation carried out a full-scale invasion of Ukraine. In compliance with the -decree- of the leader of the pseudo-republic, subordinate employees of the -military commissars- and commanders of enemy units threaten the citizens of Ukraine with criminal responsibility for refusing to fight against our state. All these actions are a gross violation of the requirements of Articles 4, 8, 51, 147 of the Geneva Convention on the Protection of the Civilian Population in Time of War of August 12, 1949, as well as Art. 23 of the Hague Convention on the Laws and Customs of War on Land of October 18, 1907. We will remind, on December 27, 2023, the -head of the DNR- Pushylin was convicted in absentia for encroachment on the territorial integrity and inviolability of Ukraine and collaborative activities (Part 2 of Article 110, Part 2 of Article 28, Part 5 of Article 111-1 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine) . He was sentenced to 15 years in prison with the deprivation of the right to hold positions in the bodies of state power, state administration, local self-government, related to the provision of public services, the performance of organizational-administrative and administrative-economic functions, for 15 years and confiscation of property . We remind you that on the border with Poland, at the checkpoint -Krakivets-, border guards discovered a pseudo-couple - residents of Ternopil region and Ivano-Frankivsk region.

Title: Italy and Ukraine discussed speeding up the transfer of the tenth package of military aid
Description: This is reported by /a> Office of the President of Ukraine. The head of state spoke about the situation on the battlefield. The leaders discussed the continuation of military support to Ukraine and the acceleration of the transfer of the tenth aid package from Italy. Volodymyr Zelenskyi and Giorgia Meloni agreed to strengthen coordination at the level of leaders of European states to discuss the security situation in the region and to increase the supply of air defense systems to Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, the -Peklo- drone missile already had a confirmed combat application, and now it has entered the army.

Title: The President conferred ranks on military personnel and presented battle flags
Description: About this reported on December 6 the President's website. Volodymyr Zelensky presented battle flags to 21 separate mechanized brigades of the Ground Forces, 211 separate pontoon-bridge brigades of the Support Forces, 78 separate airborne assault regiments of the Russian Air Force and 37 separate aviation squadrons of the Air Force, as well as awards -For Courage and Courage- to the 107th Jet Artillery Brigade ground forces, 38 separate brigade of marines of the Navy, 102 separate brigade of territorial defense and 38 anti-aircraft missile regiment of the Ground Forces. Volodymyr Zelenskyy assigned honorary titles: to the 203rd training aviation brigade of the Air Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine - -named after Vladislav Rykov-, to the 808th separate support brigade of the Support Forces - -Dniestrovsk-. In addition, the President awarded the following military ranks: Major General to the Commander of the Defense Forces Brigadier General Ihor Skibyuk and Commander of the SSO to Brigadier General Oleksandr Trepak, as well as Brigadier General to the Commander of the Ground Forces OK -East- to Colonel Dmytro Bratishko and Deputy Commander of the Combined Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces Colonel Mykola Palas. As ArmyInform reported, Volodymyr Zelensky honored the memory of the fallen defenders of Ukraine.

Title: -Managed the torture- during the capture of Balaklia: prosecutors referred the case against the occu...
Description: reports this by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. According to the investigation, the accused was a military commandant in Balaklia, a city that was under Russian occupation for more than half a year. Among the Russian military, the figure is better known as -Granit-. He signed orders and instructions authorizing Russian servicemen to illegally detain and torture civilians. The military commandant identified such grounds for the -detention- of civilians, such as a person's participation in the area of ​​ATO, the presence of relatives of military personnel, expressing a pro-Ukrainian position, etc. The officer on duty at the military commandant's office reported each fact of detention to the accused, who, in turn, repeatedly personally interrogated civilians, exerting considerable psychological pressure on them. Thus, in April 2022, the military commandant ordered his subordinates to detain a local resident who actively expressed a pro-Ukrainian position. The occupiers kidnapped the man, put handcuffs on his hands and a bag on his head, and brought him to the torture chamber, before beating him in the face. Then the Russian military brought the man for -interrogation- to the military commandant. He put the gun on the table, pointing its barrel in the direction of the victim, and ordered to tell all the information about his life. The man was kept in a torture cell for 21 days without sufficient food and water, without fresh air, a bed and basic sanitary conditions. Regarding another victim, the commandant carried out almost the same execution. In addition, he informed the detainee that in case of disobedience, the victim's relatives would be taken to the Russian Federation, and the man would go to prison. Later, both detainees were released. The indictment was sent to the Balakliya District Court of the Kharkiv Region for consideration. The sanction of the article provides for punishment in the form of deprivation of liberty for a term of eight to twelve years. We remind you that on the border with Poland, at the -Krakivets- checkpoint, border guards discovered a pseudo-couple - residents of Ternopil region and Ivano-Frankivsk region.

Title: The Minister of Defense honored the memory of the Heroes and thanked the defenders for their courage
Description: The head of the defense department wrote about this on the Internet Facebook. Special attention was paid to honoring the memory of fallen Heroes who gave their lives for the defense of the country. Their feat, as Umyerov noted, obliges Ukraine to continue the struggle and win. The minister also reported on participation in the first military prayer breakfast, which took place in the Kyiv-Pechersk Lavra. -I thank every defender for their courage and devotion to the state. Thanks to you, Ukraine has not only survived, but is also moving towards victory step by step,- Rustem Umyerov emphasized. The minister concluded his address with the words: -Glory to the Armed Forces of Ukraine! Glory to Ukraine!- As reported by ArmyInform, the President congratulated the defenders and women defenders on the Day of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: In Nikopol, the rescuers came under repeated enemy fire
Description: notifies the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine. During its liquidation, the enemy attacked the rescuers. Damaged fire rescue vehicle. Fortunately, the emergency workers were not injured. We remind you, in the Kherson region as a result of Russian shelling six people were injured last day.

Title: Hits 700 kilometers — the first batch of new missiles -Peklo- handed over to the Defense Forces
Description: About this announced on December 6 the President of Ukraine. -It is very important that our defenders receive such modern Ukrainian-made weapons. Now the task is to further increase their production and use. Thank you to everyone involved in our defense production, whose contribution helps Ukraine to fight,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. According to his data, the flight range of the -Hell- drone-missile is 700 km, and the speed is 700 km/h. As reported by ArmyInform, President congratulated the defenders on the Day of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: The occupiers promise to fine for Ukrainian-language address signs
Description: This is reported by Center of national resistance. The enemy pursues a policy of total Russification, denying the right of other peoples to exist. Within the framework of this policy, the Russians are actively fighting against any Ukrainian symbols that are a reminder that they are the occupiers of this land. So, at TOT Zaporizhzhia, the invaders promise to fine the owners of private houses for Ukrainian-language address plates with valid street names. Sanctions are promised to be imposed from the beginning of 2025. We remind you, in the temporarily occupied territories of the Zaporizhzhia region local collaborators report on their -volunteer- successes.

Title: The President congratulated the defenders on the Day of the Armed Forces of Ukraine
Description: Information about the celebrations appeared on December 6 on the President's website. Volodymyr Zelenskyi emphasized that when it comes to the defenders of Ukraine, our people first of all feel respect, gratitude and honor. -Respect. Gratitude. Respect. And goosebumps. When we say: -Glory to Ukraine!- and we answer: -Glory to the heroes!- Because we know who it is about. We know who our heroes are - real, brave, worthy. Those about whom we have the best words,- said the President. Volodymyr Zelenskyi emphasized that everyone in the country associates the words -Ukrainian warrior- with real examples and true heroism. These are family and friends, friends, colleagues, neighbors, work colleagues or just acquaintances. -To whom do we write -how are you?- and glad that the message was read. The one whom we try to help with everything we can. Close the collection or just send a picture, as our children do. And the one who, unfortunately, is no longer with us, but his number cannot be deleted from the phone book. Because his name cannot be erased from our memory,- said the President. Those present honored the memory of fallen defenders of Ukraine with a moment of silence. The President presented the Golden Star Order to the relatives of the fallen Heroes of Ukraine. The highest state award was awarded to: Lt. Col. Boris Horoshko. At the beginning of the full-scale invasion, he organized the management of the squadron and, as a member of the crew, took the aircraft out of the attack. Took part in the destruction of tank columns, military equipment and pontoon crossings in Kyiv region, Mykolaiv region and Kherson region. On April 5, 2022, as part of the crew, he delivered ammunition and evacuated the wounded from Azovstal. While returning to the territory controlled by Ukraine, his plane disappeared from the radar. Senior Lieutenant Vitaly Nesterenko. Last year in May, he headed a reconnaissance group to detect the transition to the left bank of the Dnieper and a demining subgroup. In the enemy's rear, scouts blew up a prepared system of landmines for laying, as well as sappers, eliminated the observation post. In October of last year, a reconnaissance group led by Vitaly Nesterenko advanced to the islands in the Dnipro delta to set up ambushes, but the Russian invaders had already landed there. Vitaly Nesterenko died during the battle. Soldier Serhiy Ivanov. Defended Ukraine in the Avdiyiv direction. Despite the akubarotrauma, which he suffered during another Russian assault, he continued to hold combat positions. Helped his brother in battle. He kept the defense surrounded for about 10 hours and personally destroyed ten Russian invaders and one armored personnel carrier. Serhii Ivanov died on October 30 last year during the shelling of the position of his motorized infantry company. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also presented the Golden Star order to two more Heroes of Ukraine — sergeant Oleksandr Krokovets and soldier Andrii Sergienko. Olexandr Krokovets defends the country on the territory of Zaporizhzhia and Donetsk regions. The Bradley crew led by him repeatedly stopped the assault actions of the Russian occupiers and prevented the enemy from occupying Ukrainian positions. This year in April, despite heavy fire, the crew of Oleksandr Krokovets evacuated 15 wounded soldiers. He was wounded three times, but each time he returned to the front. Andriy Sergienko during one of the assaults on Andriyivka in Donetsk region personally destroyed 24 Russian invaders and wounded four more - this was recorded by air reconnaissance. In March of this year, he acted as the commander of the assault division. Under his leadership, the unit's fighters repelled at least 16 attacks. During one of the artillery barrages, Andrii Sergienko ordered his subordinates to move, but he himself came under mortar fire and was wounded in both legs, as a result of which they had to be amputated. Four more soldiers were awarded the Cross of Combat Merit by the Head of State. This is: Junior Sergeant Yaroslav Didukh. Commander of the marine corps. In December 2022, during an offensive near Maryinka, he personally destroyed two enemy BMPs. Last summer, he distinguished himself in the liberation of Urozhany and Staromayorskyi, and at the end of the year - in the battles in Krynky in the Kherson region, destroying at least 30 invaders. He is currently recovering from a shrapnel wound in his knee. Lieutenant Colonel Alexander Zima. Since the beginning of the full-scale invasion, he staffed and organized the work of the 193rd separate battalion of the TrO of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, which holds positions in the area of ​​the Antonivsky Bridge and Dach. In addition, the units of the battalion remotely mine the territories near Oleshok in the Kherson region. Oleksandr Zima suffered a gunshot wound last year, but after treatment he returned to the army. Sergeant Pavlo Tymoshchuk. His calculation in the fall of this year played a key role in the offensive operations of the 95th Airborne Assault Battalion near Pogrebki, Kursk Oblast. Also, Pavlo Tymoshchuk's unit repelled about 20 enemy attempts to break through Ukrainian defenses. Fighters destroyed approximately 200 Russian invaders, enemy armored vehicles, T-90 -Breakthrough- tank. Major Vladislav Subota. From the beginning of the full-scale Russian invasion, he organized the successful execution of combat missions by the mechanized battalion in Donetsk region, Luhansk region, and Kharkiv region. The units under his command destroyed at least four tanks, three BMPs, a mortar fire and 150 Russian invaders, and captured another six. In addition, the President awarded the defenders with the orders of Bohdan Khmelnytsky I-III degrees, -For Courage- I-III degrees, Princess Olga III degree and the medal -For military service to Ukraine-. As reported by ArmyInform, Volodymyr Zelensky honored the memory of of the fallen defenders of Ukraine.

Title: Radio game for elimination - an entire platoon of enemy marines was ambushed and killed in Kurshchyn...
Description: The video of combat work was released on December 6 on the unit's channel. Previously, the UA_REG Team fighters regained their previously lost position. Using the prisoners, ours started a radio game in which they reported on the continuation of the duty and waiting for the promised reinforcements. The next day, the enemy sent reinforcements in the amount of 20 soldiers on 3 armored personnel carriers. Enemy equipment drove up close to our positions and began to turn around for landing. But the UA_REG Team fighters helped start the landing right at the Kobzon concert. Armored vehicles were hit by Swedish AT-4 anti-tank grenade launchers, and infantry by small arms. Those who did manage to climb into the fields were later finished off by our snipers. As reported by ArmiyaInform, fighters of the UA_REG Team unit of the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine during a raid in the rear of Russian troops were able to take rich booty in the form of captives.

Title: The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces visited the Kursk area
Description: He reported this on December 6. -The work, both at the control points and directly on the battlefield, continues almost 24 hours a day. Our soldiers effectively and systematically destroy the advancing enemy with superior forces,- wrote the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces. In his opinion, our main task now is to strengthen the stability of the defense, inflict maximum losses on the enemy, prepare reserves, ensure uninterrupted supply of ammunition and other material and technical means to units and units. -My work was devoted to the solution of these issues as well. I am proud of the heroism and resilience of our soldiers, who are doing everything to defeat the Russian invaders! Thanks to our defenders! Glory to Ukraine!-, Oleksandr Syrsky remarked. As reported by ArmyInform, General Oleksandr Syrskyi congratulated the servicemen on the Day of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, expressing gratitude for their courage, dedication and contribution to the defense of the country.

Title: Russia is on the verge of a reputational defeat in Syria
Description: About this reports the Foreign Intelligence Service of Ukraine. The command of the Syrian Arab Army (SAA, the Assad regime) officially announced the decision to withdraw from Hama and redeploy its forces outside the city in order to -save the lives of civilians.- The main goal of the rebels at the moment is the overthrow of the regime of Bashar al-Assad, as well as -the construction of a new Syria-. The next big city, Homs, is located 47 km from Hama. It is critical for the troops b. Assad and Russia, as all the roads to Latakia and Tartus pass through it. If the loss of the city of Hama had a destabilizing effect on the forces of b. Assad, then the loss of Homs will make it impossible for them to reach the sea and communicate with the Russian group located on the coast. The rapid advance of the rebels through the territory that he would have previously controlled. Assad with the help of the Russian Federation, shows the weakness of the Russian contingent in the country. Fleeing the battlefield, leaving behind a large number of modern weapons, could lead to a sensitive military and reputational defeat for Russia, not only in Syria, but also in the entire Middle East region. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the temporarily occupied territories of the Zaporizhzhia region, local collaborators report on their -volunteer- successes.

Title: -Volunteering- the Kremlin way: TOT collaborators take property from civilians for their needs
Description: About this reports Center of National Resistance. Following the example of their -colleagues- from the conquered Kherson region, who took boats from civilians for the needs of Putin's army, here the Kremlin swindlers squeezed local motorcycles. Almost 100 two-wheelers have already managed to hand over to one of the Guards assault-assault regiments of the enemy in the Zaporozhye direction. Of course, the crime was presented as a -volunteer- action. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that The Security Service of Ukraine foiled an attempt by Russian special services to strike the logistics infrastructure in the southeastern direction.

Title: -Celt- saves lives: chronicles of a military surgeon in a combat zone
Description: About this notified in the State Security Service. He returned to the State Border Service in April 2022, deliberately mobilizing for the war, as in 2015, when he went to the front in Donetsk and Luhansk regions. Andriy heads the unit's medical station, which evacuates the wounded from the battlefield, often under enemy fire. -Speed ​​and accuracy save lives. Even a minor injury can become fatal within hours,- he says. However, the main challenge for the physician is losses. -The unsaved remain in memory. But there are also victories when it was possible to help even in seemingly hopeless situations,- admits Andrii. Andrii received the nickname -Celt- in 2015 for his indomitable character and endurance. He also has an interesting story: at first his brothers called him -Apostle- because of his initials, but in Mar'inka they decided to change the call sign because of its ambiguous sound on the radio. Medicine is a vocation for Andrii. The son of doctors, he can imagine no other life than saving people. His main motivation is his son and faith in the future of Ukraine. -I want to see how our children grow up in a civilized country and live to understand: all this was not in vain,- the doctor noted. In the war, Andrei remains an example of fortitude, indomitability and faith in his fellow men, turning the call sign -Celt- into a symbol of endurance and courage.

Title: He married a friend's girlfriend: tangled -lav stori- on the Polish border
Description: About this informs State Border Service of Ukraine. It is noted that a 25-year-old man from Ternopil Oblast married a 20-year-old resident of Ivano-Frankivsk Oblast, who has the II disability group. During communication with the border guards, they reported that they were traveling for tourist purposes. However, later it turned out that the woman is the girlfriend of the man's friend, and his real chosen one remained in Ukraine. Operatives of the 7th Carpathian border detachment sent a report to the police about the detection of signs of a criminal offense under Article 332 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (-Illegal transportation of persons across the state border of Ukraine-). ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: A 16-year-old teenager was hit by a Russian drone in Kherson
Description: informs Kherson OVA about this. It was also a restless night in Bilozerka. the Russians hit the settlement with artillery. As a result of the attack, a residential building was damaged. The house has a destroyed roof and walls, broken windows and doors. A woman was injured. She suffered shrapnel injuries to her arm and leg. As reported by ArmyInform,

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyi honored the memory of the fallen defenders of Ukraine
Description: About informs the Office of the President of Ukraine. The head of state laid flowers at the Wall of Memory of Fallen Defenders of Ukraine on Mykhailivska Square in Kyiv. Chairman of the Verkhovna Rada Ruslan Stefanchuk and Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal also took part in the ceremony. As reported by ArmyInform, President Volodymyr Zelensky congratulated the servicemen on the Day of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: -Heavy equipment is very fat-: princely hunting in the Kharkiv region
Description: Nadiya Zamryga, the head of the department, told about this on the air of -Social News-. communications of the 14th separate mechanized brigade named after Prince Roman the Great. However, Nadiya Zamryga notes, heavy equipment is rarely used by the occupiers. To a greater extent — for transporting infantry. During the assaults, the -armor- lives until it is noticed by air reconnaissance. -Heavy equipment, it is very, as my boys say, fat. A target for aerial reconnaissance, for drops, even for the same artillery and the same tankers. They use it infrequently, because it is much better to see, much better to hear,- said Nadiya Zamryga. Previously ArmyInform told, Near Kupyansk, the Defense Forces are restraining the enemy, and somewhere they are counterattacking and push back the occupiers from their positions.

Title: Eleven stormtrooper prisoners in Kurshchyna landed in Ukrainian captivity straight from prisons
Description: About this told on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- the senior officer of the communications department 80th Brigade Petro Haydeschuk. According to Petr Haidashchuk, this -living- force is occasionally captured. Already there it becomes clear that the stormtroopers have no training at all. For example, 11 prisoners from the 11th assault brigade of the Russian Federation, who were captured recently, did not have it. -Talking with them, we realized that their training is very poor. These are people who were forcibly dragged into the occupying army. They were forced to sign a contract, left their penal colonies and went to war. They were preparing for several days,- Petro Haydashchuk noted. As Petro Haidashchuk tells, the former prisoners were also deceived by their command. It just threw itself into storms. -They were told that they will go to certain positions where there are no Ukrainian troops, they will sit there and will not take part in the battles at all. But the reality is completely different. These deceived ex-prisoners tried to storm our positions with the help of armored vehicles. Those who survived decided to surrender,- said Petro Haydaschuk. Previously ArmyInform reported about how soldiers of the 80th Airborne Assault Brigade captured 11 Russian prisoners of war during the battle in Kurshchyna.

Title: They hid cameras in trees and made streams on the railway: the SBU detained Russian agents
Description: About this informs the Security Service of Ukraine. The perpetrators prepared data for attacks on hub stations and railway lines through which, according to the occupiers' plan, they could transport equipment and ammunition of the Defense Forces of Ukraine. The informants installed hidden video cameras near the railways, hiding them in the branches of trees.The cameras broadcast real-time video of the trains to the accounts of Russian curators. They used portable batteries, which were regularly replaced. As the investigation found out, the detainees were local residents, who were recruited through Telegram channels, offering quick earnings. They acted separately, but under the instructions of a single person during the searches, phones, cameras and power banks with evidence of subversive activities were seized. Both informants were notified of suspicion under Article 27 and Article 2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine, as reported by the Security Service href=-https://armyinform.com.ua/2024/12/04/pid-vyglyadom-poyizdok-u-taksi-shpyguvala-za-oboronczyamy-chernigova-zatrymano-nepovnolitnyu/->detained a 16-year-old local girl in Chernihiv a resident whom the Russian Federation involved in criminal activity and who helped the Russians prepare a new airstrike in the region.

Title: The Verkhovna Rada noted the contribution of young military personnel to the development of parliame...
Description: The Chairman of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine signed a resolution approving the list of this year's Prize laureates. They became soldiers, sergeants and officers of the Ground Forces, Air Force, Special Operations Forces, Medical Forces and intelligence units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, who directly perform tasks in the areas of hostilities. The servicemen were awarded this high honor for their significant personal contribution to the protection of the independence, sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine during the repulsion of Russian armed aggression. They actively contribute to the processes of state formation, protection of independence, sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, development of parliamentarism and local self-government. This year, the Prize laureates were: Among this year's laureates are military personnel who have previously received state awards and departmental honors. Several of them received regular and non-regular military ranks during the time between the receipt of the petitions and the adoption of the resolution, which underlines the importance of the contribution of each of them to the fight against Russian aggressors. The prize of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine for the contribution of youth to the development of parliamentarism and local self-government has been awarded since January 1, 2004. Title: Kish Babai and Tol Babai: the occupiers brought fabulous guests from Tatarstan and Udmurtia

The situation is complicated for apartments without meters, where calculations are carried out according to regulations. In addition, in the occupied territories of Luhansk region, the organization of New Year's holidays is under the control of Russian -regional chiefs-. Children are greeted not by St. Nicholas or local Santa Clauses, but by guests from Tatarstan or Udmurtia. Last year, -kish babai- came, this time in Lutugyn, -tol babay- is expected. Artem Lysogor noted that such a -cultural policy- of Russia is gradually displacing traditional festive images, which can lead to the forgetting of local customs and traditions. As reported by ArmyInform, they plan to spend 43 billion rubles for the so-called development of the coal industry. A significant part of the funds will be directed to the -organization of safe working conditions-.

Title: As a result of Russian attacks in Donetsk region, dozens of houses were destroyed

Title: 11 stormtrooper prisoners in Kurshchyna landed in Ukrainian captivity straight from prisons
Description: This was said on the broadcast of the Yedyny Novy telethon, a senior officer of the communications department Petro Haydeschuk of the 80th Brigade. According to Petr Haidashchuk, this -living- force is occasionally captured. Already there it becomes clear that the stormtroopers have no training at all. For example, 11 prisoners from the 11th assault brigade of the Russian Federation, who were captured recently, did not have it. -Talking with them, we realized that their training is very poor. These are people who were forcibly dragged into the occupying army. They were forced to sign a contract, left their penal colonies and went to war. They were preparing for several days,- Petro Haydashchuk noted. As Petro Haidashchuk tells, the former prisoners were also deceived by their command. It just threw itself into storms. -They were told that they will go to certain positions where there are no Ukrainian troops, they will sit there and will not take part in the fighting at all. But the reality is completely different. These deluded ex-prisoners, with the help of armored vehicles, tried to storm our positions. Those who survived decided to surrender,- Petro Haydaschuk said. Previously ArmyInform reported about how soldiers of the 80th Airborne Assault Brigade captured 11 Russian prisoners of war during the battle in Kurshchyna.

Title: - The Armed Forces are hardened by a decade of struggle - Oleksandr Syrskyi on the courage and sacri...
Description: The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine wrote about this on his page. on Facebook. In his address, he emphasized the inheritance of the modern Ukrainian army from the heroic military formations of the past - the Ukrainian Sich Riflemen, the Army of the Ukrainian People's Republic, the UPA and other fighters for independence. -The enemy is the same as a hundred years ago. Ukrainians are called to fight again, and we must win!- Oleksandr Syrsky emphasized. The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces thanked each defender, urging them to continue the struggle for the freedom of Ukraine. -We have endured, we are holding on, we will overcome the enemy. Glory to Ukraine!- - he finished his address. Title: The Armed Forces stopped 188 Russian attacks: the enemy is actively advancing in three directions
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. In addition, it carried out more than 4,200 attacks, including 141 from rocket salvo systems, and used more than 2,000 kamikaze drones for damage. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of the settlements of Glukhiv, Krugle, Petropavlivka, Bohuslavka, Lyman, Lozova, Kostiantynopil, Komar, and Vremivka. In the Kharkiv direction there was one unsuccessful enemy attack in the Tykhoi area. In the Kupyan direction, there were five attacks by the occupiers during the day. In the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked five times in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar, Stupochki and Predtechyny. On the Toretsk direction the enemy launched six attacks near Toretsk and Nilipivka. In the Pokrovsky direction our defenders stopped 40 assaults and offensive actions of the aggressor in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Dachenske, Zhovte, Pushkine, Novotroitske, Shevchenko, Novopustinka settlements.
