In the Gulyaipil direction, the enemy launched an air strike with attack aircraft in the area of ​​the Gulyai Pole settlement. In the Orikhov direction, the enemy did not conduct active operations last day. Near Kozatsky Island in the Dnieper direction our troops repelled three enemy attacks, the enemy was unsuccessful. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of offensive groups of the occupiers were detected. Last day, 15 skirmishes took place in the Kursk direction, the enemy carried out 14 airstrikes with 30 guided bombs and launched 381 artillery strikes, including three from rocket salvo systems. We will remind you that last The loss of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,780 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 8 tanks, 22 armored combat vehicles, 23 artillery systems, 31 operational-tactical UAVs, 3 cruise missiles, 60 vehicles and 8 units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: 40 thousand mobilized Russians, the 125th caliber and the Kursk bridgehead: an expert on the unprece...
Description: Why is this happening now? But will the Russians increase the mobilization norms in the near future? Military expert Petro Chernyk answered these questions: -Recently, there have been huge losses of Russians at the front: more than 1,700 people per day. And this indicator is not decreasing. A logical question arises: why are the Russians so reluctant to count on losses right now? And they really do not count with them. And the month of November is an indicator that the losses are truly incredible. An absolute record was set - more than 45,000 people were confirmed killed and wounded. These are unprecedented losses since World War II. Not only the Russian Federation as such, but in general in the universal sense of the word. Why so? It all boils down to big geopolitics. On January 20, President Trump takes office. And very, very much will depend on his position: what will be our battle. And by this time, Putin has two tasks, as he understands them: to knock us out of the Kursk region. This is moment one. And the second point is to end the full-fledged occupation of Donetsk region. Will they be able to make it happen? In my opinion, they will not be able to. In order for them to realize this task, it is necessary to increase the monthly mobilization rates to 50 thousand people. So far, there is no reliable information that they worked that way. According to my own calculations, they mobilize 40-42 thousand per month. We have the so-called anticipatory extermination, when the enemy's losses are greater than he recruits. In a general sense, do the Russians have mobilization potential? Yes, there is. Unfortunately, it is quite large. They have 2 to 3 million trained men who know how to use a Kalashnikov assault rifle. And if we also take into account the unprepared component, then this number can be safely multiplied by two. In their opinion, learning how to use a Kalashnikov assault rifle takes about five to six days. And for the Russians, the MPL-50, what we call a minesweeper, is also a weapon. There is no mention of the equipment with which they could provide their personnel. The maximum they can do is 25 T-90 tanks per month. So far, there are between 3,000 and 6,000 different armored vehicles in warehouses, along with PT-76. What is PT-76? This is such a small irony: this is the predecessor of the BMP-1. If necessary, they will reach them. And there is an already confirmed, personally verified option, when, say, in the same Kurshchyna, tanks go into battle with almost no ammunition, they are used as a kind of armored vehicle that drops personnel. So, even with a 125 mm shell, they already had a problem. But in no way should the opponent be underestimated. They will also now count all their losses for the month of November. And my personal version is that closer to the New Year, considering that they have a holiday mentality, as they say, Putin may dare to raise the mobilization rates. Our task is to hold both the Kursk bridgehead and Donetsk region before the cycle of dry weather.-

Title: Why the Russians are afraid of our drones: a DSH combatant told where the enemy assault groups disap...
Description: But with the beginning of the invasion chose the way of the paratrooper. Now the lieutenant colonel is the commander of one of the battalions of the 46th separate air mobile brigade. His combat career in the role of a combatant began in the Zaporizhzhia region. It was near Robotyny and Verbovoy. All forest strips located between these settlements were liberated by the 46th brigade. Serhiy recalls that at that time the latest developments were actively used in the battles, and this gave results: -It was then, during the battles in the Zaporizhzhia region, that we actively began to develop UAVs. FPV drones and -drops- were used. At that time, the enemy had not yet caught up with us. The guys were all prepared, intelligent. There were moments when we carried out assault actions without a single loss. No casualties or injuries.- After the battles in Zaporozhye region, the paratroopers were transferred to Donetsk region. The unit got to the outskirts of Maryanka. At that time, the settlement was almost entirely occupied. Only scraps of Ukrainian land remained, where the paratroopers were forced to hold the ruins. And they suffered losses there. -It was decided to prepare a defense line. Everyone who could was sent to equip the fortifications. This is a technical support platoon, a material support platoon, even signalmen were equipping positions at that time. They worked by hand - with shovels, peels. Logs and other materials that were needed were transported at a risk. The task was completed. They built a line, which was then held for more than six months. But, despite their heroism and all their skills, the situation on the front line was such that they were forced to retreat to a certain distance and occupy a more advantageous line,- says the serviceman. Before that, paratroopers did not take part in defensive operations. So I had to study. And learn fast. -We understood how to work in defense, what to do. Fortifications were constantly being built to move personnel to preserve life. Dugouts were dug at a certain distance so that a serviceman could move from shelter to shelter when artillery fire was being fired at him,- recalls Serhiy. In the unit, the UAV group was constantly developing. Both FPVers and Mavic pilots with resets. -There were times when we heard from interceptions that the enemy complained about them very much. And the prisoners also complained: -your drones with skids stole us.- That is, the Russians are very afraid of our drones. But, as they say, enemies do not sleep either. They also began to actively use FPV drones, drops from Mavics, and now with the enemy, you can say, we are on the same level.- However, the enemy has an advantage in the number of personnel. And they do not protect their soldiers, constantly throwing them into crazy assaults. -When we took prisoners, they often complained that their assault groups, which left on armored vehicles, simply disappeared. They reached a certain area and disappeared. Well, they didn't know the truth that we simply destroyed them after they landed,- says Serhiy. Sometimes the paratroopers had to secretly take out the prisoners so that they would not be destroyed by their comrades. In particular, after artillery and drones destroyed the main mass of enemy attack aircraft, paratroopers went out in small groups to clear the area and, if possible, take prisoners. -But the enemy does not spare his own. Even when ours were already leading prisoners, and the Russians saw it, they themselves destroyed these people so that we could not interrogate them. So, people are indifferent to Russians. Therefore, during the assaults carried out by the paratroopers, the prisoners were already taken out secretly, trying to save their lives,- recalls Serhiy. To the question of what he is proud of in his battalion, Serhiy answered without hesitation: -The DSHV is the highlight of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. But I will say that in our country each battalion works in its own way. I am proud of the fact that we still have many of those servicemen who arrived on February 24, 2022. We are all mobilized, few are full-time. We became friends, became one. Basically, we are one fighting family. We have many experienced soldiers, sergeants. If we saw that a sergeant was being followed by soldiers, we suggested that he become an officer. After all, servicemen always follow those officers who were soldiers yesterday.- And we have many such officers now. Photo by the author and from the photo archive of Sergey Kuzheluk

Ukrainian defenders repulsed six attacks, one more battle is currently underway. On the Seversky direction the enemy launched one assault on the positions of our defenders in the Beilohorivka area. In the Kramatorsk direction, four combat clashes have been recorded near Hryhorivka and Chasovoy Yar, which were successfully repelled by our defenders. In the Toretsk direction the Russians attacked the positions of the defense forces eight times. The occupiers concentrated their main offensive efforts near the settlements of Toretsk, Nelipivka and Shcherbynivka. Currently, three military clashes are ongoing. Rozdolny, Velika Novosilka, Novoandriivka, Novosilka and Novopol. Five clashes continue until now. The enemy launched an air strike with one guided bomb in the Andriivka area. Title: Black hornets will come in handy: the US military will be armed with new personal nanodrones
Description: How reported the official portal of this firm, in addition to the supply of the miniature drones themselves, the deal, which is valued in $91 million, provision is made for the transfer of relevant controllers, spare parts and training with personnel to the army, ArmiyaInform reports. These advanced nano-unmanned aerial systems (UAS) will be acquired as part of the second phase of the US Army's Soldier Borne Sensor (SBS), Individual Airborne Reconnaissance System program. According to the company, the US military is currently using previous versions of the Black Hornet system (-Чорный шерный- in Ukrainian), which have been supplied to the US Army since 2018. And the total amount of investment in the SBS project by 2030 is expected to exceed $250 million. By the way, it is worth reminding that miniature drones from Teledyne FLIR are well known in the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As our agency reported with reference to -_blank- rel=-nofollow- href=-https://www-regjeringen-no.translate.goog/en/aktuelt/droner/id2924942/?_x_tr_sl=auto&_x_tr_tl=uk&_x_tr_hl=uk&_x_tr_pto=op-> statement Ministry of Defense The Kingdom of Norway, in August 2022, Norway and Great Britain decided to purchase a batch of Black Hornet microdrones for the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the amount of more than $9 million. Today's latest variant of this nanodrone builds on the previous version and retains the concept of -infantry tool for reconnaissance and surveillance beyond direct line of sight-, but at the same time has received a better payload compared to the Black Hornet 3, tell the authors of the EDR Magazine site. The drone received an updated 12-megapixel camera with day, night and thermal video and photo channels. With a weight of only 70 grams, the Black Hornet 4 can stay in the air for more than 30 minutes, and the range of the UAV is more than 2 kilometers. The Nanodrone can fly confidently in winds up to 25 knots. Flight performance has been improved with new obstacle avoidance capabilities and an improved battery. Compared to small quadcopters, the single-rotor Black Hornet 4 has extremely low visual and acoustic visibility, allowing it to detect threats day and night without being detected. According to information of the experts of the IKK Defense Express portal, in order to implement the idea of ​​improving the capabilities of the drone into a concept, the developers had to slightly increase its dimensions. Yes, the weight has almost doubled, from 33 grams to about 70 grams. Rotor diameter - from 123 mm to 190 mm, length - from 168 mm to 255 mm. That is, the drone still remains quite small, and the entire unmanned aircraft complex, which weighs 1.3 kg, can still be carried in a bag on a body armor. The drone is able to launch in less than 20 seconds, well suited for missions in the absence of GPS. The Black Hornet 4 can be used to rapidly detect targets outside of line of sight and assess fire damage results in real time. -Black Hornet 4 takes the features and capabilities that made the Black Hornet 3 world-renowned to the next level,- said Jifen Lei, executive vice president and general manager of Teledyne FLIR Defense. In total, FLIR Defense delivered more than 20,000 various modifications of Black Hornet PRS to military and security services in more than 40 countries of the world. The Black Hornet 4 is designed and manufactured by Teledyne FLIR Defense in Norway. -We have worked closely with customers and end users to make this system even more valuable to reservists who need situational awareness or are involved in covert operations where accurate and operational information is critical. Black Hornet 4 is a promising nano-drone technology,- Lei added. It is also emphasized that the basis for artificial intelligence systems has been laid in the drone - thanks to this, the drone can be improved so that it is even easier for the military to operate it on the battlefield. Black Hornet 4 personal reconnaissance nanosystem. Video: Teledyne FLIR

Title: -5 FPVs fell, none hit the -beha--. How does the EW-laboratory of the DSHV work near the front line
Description: Actually, this industry is developing very quickly, and the 77th separate airmobile Naddnipryan brigade even managed to create its own EW laboratory near the front - in order to quickly produce and repair equipment for its fighters on the front line. Correspondent ArmyInform visited such a secret laboratory and asked paratroopers about what electronic devices can be made in such difficult conditions, where to get spare parts and how to keep up with know-how on the battlefield. Roman, a soldier of the 77th OAeMBr, conducts a tour of the laboratory. He emphasizes that almost all tools here are made from scratch, cases and other things are printed, and elements and spare parts are ordered from online stores. - We even bend the antennas ourselves. Here we manufacture cases on which modules and power supplies are mounted. We develop 3D models ourselves. That is, the module from scratch to the finished product is ours, he says in the room with 3D printers. Next, we get to the room where the guys solder everything. Here they mainly work with antennas. The next room is where the resource gathering takes place. This laboratory collects and repairs EW from drops and FPVs, as well as trench EW. 3D printers work 24 hours a day, says a fighter with the nickname -Fitter-. His task, in addition to bending and soldering antennas, is to monitor printing. Every day at two o'clock in the morning, he must come and replace the consumables, check whether the temperature regime in the printing house is maintained. A fighter with the call sign -Zirka- says that in the laboratory the guys not only manufacture, but also test the means: - We then carry them to the position on our shoulders. There we already receive a command when to turn on and in which direction. Sometimes you have to watch, let your drone pass. Military serviceman Serhii, who was an electrician in civilian life, adds that this laboratory has established feedback with his colleagues in the brigade - they praise the tools for their efficiency. — There was feedback, the guys called the commander, they said that the REB was awesome - there were five FPVs, they fell, all from the side, none of them hit the -beha- - that's good feedback, - recalls Roman. One of the most interesting developments of 77 OAeMBr are backpacks for assault groups. Backpacks and containers are selected by the guys themselves, spare parts are printed and ordered online. There are also anti-drop and anti-FPV backpacks. With a battery, it can weigh somewhere between 5-6 kg. - He is taken with them to the position. It has a control panel, there you can see the battery charge. There is also a seven-meter-long cable inside - that is, you can pull out, install and remotely control the backpack device, Roman explains. Serhiy talks in more detail about the technical side of the developments. He says that a year ago it was possible to close questions on one range, and now it is necessary to do four, or even five. It can be seen from the equipment that drives here near the front line, there are no longer two, but three or four -checkers- on the roof, he adds, emphasizing that before a combat mission, all equipment is tested together with pilots at different frequencies. Serhii says that the proximity to the front is connected with the need to promptly respond to the requests of fellow soldiers: - It happens that the guys at the front have a broken electronic device. Accordingly, it is delivered to us promptly, and we repair it in a day. And if it was a private manufacturer, which usually has production somewhere in the rear, then one can only guess how long it would take to repair or service the equipment. The financial aspect is also important, Serhii explains, because in the laboratory the guys can make a tool for 100 thousand hryvnias, the analogue of which on the market will cost 350-400 thousand. The fighter notes that both we and the enemy are very dependent on details from China. Although there are rumors that all these spare parts can be made here, but it will be many times more expensive. Now the guys use only Ukrainian aluminum radiators and plastic for 3D printing. The boys say that they have been fighting here for the second year. We immediately ask how to get to them. Serhii says that almost everyone here expressed their desire to serve. And everyone has the basic skills to work with EW. — In civilian life, I had an education in the field of radio engineering. They looked at the military ID and sent it here. People who understand what radio engineering is, know how to solder at least, - he explains. Serhiy also recommends going to the REB to those who know physics; understands what waves are, what they are. Motivation and a willingness to constantly learn are also important, because the approaches that were relevant a year ago may no longer work today. The -Zirka- fighter says that in civilian life he worked as a machinist at the Southern Mining and Processing Plant in Kryvyi Rih. At first I had protection against mobilization, but when it ended, I went to the TCC without hesitation. We talked about the fact that, in the eyes of civilian DSHVs, these are primarily assault units, and here we see a laboratory where the guys only do soldering, assembly and repair. First, you need to understand that different specialties are needed in the army. And secondly, the guys from the laboratory have either returned from combat missions after being wounded, or are carrying EW on their own. -Zirka- remembers how he received the task to go to the positions and help his comrades with the REB. But after he and his group went there, the Russians went on the offensive, and mines and drones began to fly at the boys. — There were four of us, we had machine guns, grenades and -flies- with us. there were five Russians, one was with the -baker-. They entered the landing stage, there was contact, we shot one of them three times, - says the fighter. Then the DSHV mortar connected, then the Russians were chased away. But towards the end, they sent a drone with a drop that landed right next to the boys' dugout. Then -Zirka- suffered a concussion. It took two days to leave, and the boys left another day later. - This is to understand that the REB platoon are the same fighters as all other paratroopers, and you should always be ready to take on a fight. Everyone who was injured there has already been treated, with the boys in contact, he adds. In parting, the 34-year-old soldier adds that his values ​​in life have changed significantly during his service: he began to appreciate the time he spends with his family, especially with his son, much more. — I appreciate every phone conversation, message. Even between the lines you can read how they care about me, are proud. They also have their own problems, so I call, reassure and say that everything is fine, everything will be fine, this is life. And no matter what, it continues. Under any circumstances, he summarizes. For more about EW laboratory 77 OAeMBr, see Artem Golub's story on Armiya TV:

Title: -When buying one shoe, a 50% discount-: the enemy invented a fake about veterans of the war in Ukrai...
Description: This is supposedly a promotional offer in one of the Ukrainian clothing stores. The first thing that comes to mind is that it was necessary to come up with such a thing! In the head of a healthy person, such a cynical and mocking idea - to offer a person who has lost a limb, a discount on one shoe - simply cannot be born. Only the -Russian measure- is capable of so deforming the consciousness of homo sapiens to produce such content. The primary source of the spread of this fake is the video of the Russian propagandist Armen Gasparian. The ad itself is a screenshot from it. The video shows that information about the promotion is posted in the fitting room. However, neither the sign nor the frame shows the name of this store, despite the fact that the name of the store is usually duplicated on the promotion announcement. In addition, fakers used the word -disabled- in the ad, although the correct word would be -person with disabilities.- This is a traditional problem with education and tolerance for them. Most likely, the Russians themselves printed such an ad in order to shoot this video and pass it off as a real promotion in a supposedly Ukrainian store. The purpose of this fake is to sow discord in Ukrainian society by openly mocking veterans. In fact, the level of respect for the military and war veterans on the part of society is extremely high. That is why such fakes cause hatred only for Russians.

Title: The Ministers of Defense of Ukraine and the United States discussed the supply of weapons, equipment...

According to him, during the conversation, special attention was paid to the preparation for the next meeting in the Rammstein format. Ukraine and its partners continue to work on solutions that will help further strengthen our defense capabilities and bring victory closer. -Our common vision is security, stability and just peace for Ukraine and the entire democratic world. I am grateful to the USA for its leadership role in the coordination of international support for Ukraine,- said Rustem Umyerov. Title: No one writes to the young men - because they are under arrest for setting fire to the post office

Currently, two suspects are in custody, another is under 24-hour house arrest. As reported by ArmyInform,

Title: The enemy hit Kryvyi Rih with three rockets. Everyone is shot down
Description: This was reported in the evening of December 2 by the Air Force of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. -All three missiles were shot down by air defense of the air command -East-. Title: Rustem Umyerov held the first conversation with the new European Commissioner for Defense: details
Description: The Minister of Defense of Ukraine spoke about this today in a telephone conversation with the newly appointed EU Commissioner for Defense and Space Andryus Kubilyus, reported MOU. -I congratulated Mr. Kubilyus on his appointment to this important position, which for the first time in the history of the European Commission combines responsibility for defense policy and the development of space technologies. This is a landmark step for Europe, which confirms its readiness to adapt to modern security challenges. And it is a great honor for me that our conversation was the first for Mr. Kubilyus in his new position,- said Rustem Umyerov. Among the key topics of discussion was the creation of a White Paper on European defense, which should strengthen the readiness of the European Union for security challenges and will include a security section on the ways of military and defense support of Ukraine at the current stage and in the medium and long term. According to the minister, Ukraine actively participated in the formation of this strategic document, which is designed to strengthen the security system of the European Union. -The attention was focused separately on the situation at the front. I informed Mr. Kubilyus about the most urgent needs of the Ukrainian Defense Forces: training and equipping brigades, strengthening of air defense, provision of artillery, ammunition and investments in our defense industry,- said Rustem Umyerov. He also announced that he invited Andryus Kubilyus to pay a working visit to Ukraine. -Ahead is ambitious and fruitful cooperation with the aim of ensuring a just peace in Ukraine and Europe,- Rustem Umyerov concluded. It should be noted that Andryus Kubilius became the first European Commissioner for Defense in the history of the EU. Previously, this area of ​​responsibility was combined with the position of the chief diplomat of the European Union. As reported by ArmyInform, Volodymyr Zelenskyi and Olaf Sholcz spilnogo-z-nimechchynoyu-vyrobnycztva/->inspected -smart drones- of domestic and joint with Made in Germany.

Title: Strengthening air defense and joint production of weapons: the results of the meeting of the leaders...
Description: The statement was made public on the evening of December 2. -We discussed our joint opportunities for the coming weeks and months — bilateral work and with other partners, possible meetings and agreements. He emphasized that it is fundamental for Ukraine that Germany, as the leader of support, does not reduce it next year, and in particular financial support. -This will be the right signal for all partners. We must also continue the pressure of sanctions on Russia for the war — we cannot let Putin adapt to the pressure. And, of course, we must remember that the key to our common security on the continent is geopolitical certainty — something that most European nations already have, but Ukraine has not yet secured. Geopolitical determination involves the solution of two issues for each country in Europe — about the EU and NATO,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said. According to him, the Patriot, IRIS-T, and Gepard anti-aircraft guns provided by Germany have already saved tens of thousands of people and hundreds of infrastructure facilities. Separately, the President thanked for the new military package worth 650 million euros and a clear deadline for delivery - this month. Among the topics discussed during the meeting were the continuation of defense cooperation and sanctions pressure on Russia, as well as maintaining the level of support from Germany next year. Title: Almost 4,000 servicemen are already worried about returning to service from the SZCH
Description: This was announced on December 2 by the Special Prosecutor's Office in the Defense Sector of the Central Region. Military servicemen who for the first time voluntarily left military units or places of service or committed desertion, and who will voluntarily arrive at military units no later than January 1, 2025 and express their readiness to continue military service, will have their military service extended, the validity of the contract, and the payment of financial support will be renewed accordingly and implementation of food and other types of provision, other benefits and social guarantees established by the legislation of Ukraine were also renewed. Servicemen or their commanders must inform the relevant specialized prosecutors' offices in the field of defense, the territorial offices of the State Bureau of Investigation, the National Police or the territorial offices of the Military Law and Order Service of their intention to return to military units for further military service. The presence of criminal proceedings for the act of voluntarily leaving a military unit or place of service or desertion is not a reason for refusing to continue military service and the validity of the contract. In the future, the procedure of release from criminal responsibility will be applied to such servicemen who have embarked on the path of correction, which became possible after the adoption of Law of Ukraine No. 3902-IX -On Amendments to the Criminal Code of Ukraine, the Criminal Procedure Code of Ukraine and other laws of Ukraine regarding the improvement of criminal liability for crimes against the established order of military service during martial law-, which entered into force on September 7 2024 year. It should be noted that for the commission of crimes provided for in Art. 407 (-Unwillingly leaving a military unit or place of service-) and 408 (-Desertion-), committed under martial law, the law provides for a punishment of at least 5 years of imprisonment. Thus, with regard to military personnel who will not return to the military units by January 1, 2025, the pre-trial investigation will be carried out in the general manner. As reported by ArmyInform, VSP explained , who are affected by changes in the legislation on the SZH.

Title: Colossal figures: the Defense Forces named the losses of the Russian army in the East for a month
Description: This was told on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyvi- the spokesperson of OSU -Khortytsia- - lieutenant colonel Nazar Voloshyn. -Colossal in terms of the number of casualties is November and, in particular, in our operational zone, the enemy suffered losses - more than 35,000 in a month,- said Nazar Voloshyn. According to him, the enemy carried out 1,156 assaults on Defense Forces positions last week, compared to 921 enemy attacks a week earlier. The spokesman said that last week the enemy advanced most actively in the Pokrovsky, Kurakhivskyi, Vremivskyi, Kupyanskyi and Lymanskyi directions. In particular, the enemy carried out 342 attacks on the positions of Ukrainian troops in the Pokrovsky direction, 341 in the Kurakhivskyi direction, 126 in the Vremivskyi direction, and 112 in the Kupyanskyi direction. The enemy uses assaults in the vast majority of small, mobile groups, also involving ATVs and motorcycles,- Nazar Voloshyn said. In addition, last week, the enemy launched 12 missile strikes against the positions of Ukrainian troops and civil infrastructure objects, firing 126 missiles. Enemy aviation carried out 327 airstrikes, dropping 424 anti-aircraft missiles. The enemy fired 31,000 shots at the positions of Ukrainian troops. As reported by ArmiyaInform, in November 2024, the Russian army suffered the greatest irreversible and sanitary losses in manpower since the start of the full-scale invasion, 45,720 troops.

The defense forces restrained the enemy's onslaught and repulsed ten attacks, six clashes are still ongoing. Enemy losses are being refined. Today in the Kurakhiv direction the enemy attacked 27 times near the settlements of Berestki, Stari Terny, Sontsivka, Novodmytrivka, Zorya, Kurakhove, Dalnye, Katerynivka, Antonivka and Hanivka. You are heroes. Ukraine respects and is proud of its defenders. Get well and take care of yourself,- the head of state said. Ukrainian defenders thanked the chancellor for the assistance provided by Germany, in particular for air defense systems. Olaf Scholz wished the soldiers a speedy recovery. The President also presented awards to medics: orders -For Merit- of the 3rd degree and medals -For Saved Lives-. -Thank you for your work. Difficult work that is outside the media and outside the airwaves. But it is very important, because you bring our boys back to life. Thank you and take care of yourself,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. Also today, Volodymyr Zelenskyi and Olaf Scholz honored the memory of the fallen defenders of Ukraine at the People's Memorial of National Remembrance, located on Independence Square in Kyiv. -Federal Chancellor Olaf Stoltz is in Ukraine today, and this is the first bilateral visit by the German Chancellor in more than two years. The guardsmen said that they repel constant assaults, conduct counterattacks and -demilitarize- the Russian army around the clock. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how our soldiers in the Pokrovsky direction destroyed the Russian automated complex of radio electronic suppression -Borysoglebsk-2-. A successful operation to destroy it was carried out by the Guardsmen of the Chervona Kalina brigade together with the Typhoon BSSP.

Title: A resident of Chernihiv is suspected of pointing Russian Kh-59 missiles at the city
Description: About this in message SBU. As the military counter-intelligence of the SBU established, it was at the behest of the suspect that at the beginning of November this year, the raiders hit the regional center with two Kh-59 aviation missiles. The suspected game was recruited by the Russian Federation through anti-Ukrainian comments in Russian Telegram channels. According to the available data, for future adjustments of Russian strikes, the enemy's special service assigned it a task: to install a hidden video camera near potential targets. With the help of a disguised -video trap-, the Russians wanted to monitor the locations of Ukrainian air defense and, after the air attack, record its consequences. However, the SBU military counterintelligence prevented this and detained the woman near her residence in Chernihiv. Video recording devices and a mobile phone with evidence of intelligence and subversive activities for the benefit of the Russian Federation were seized from her. Currently, the investigators of the Security Service have informed the detainee of the suspicion of h. 2 Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). The perpetrator is in custody. She faces life imprisonment with confiscation of property. As reported by ArmyInform, the counter-intelligence of the Security Service detained a 67-year-old resident of Lyman who is suspected of collaborating with Russian military intelligence.

Title: The occupant was dragging fuel canisters, but was met by our drone
Description: They published a video of combat work on December 2 on their channel. -Epic detonation of the occupier, who dragged with him… canisters with fuel. A hard blow from the merciless pilots of the BBS 63 brigade,- Ukrainian defenders commented. Earlier, fighters of the 63rd mechanized brigade demonstrated how tankers fire at the invaders with machine guns and cannons. In particular, the tank attacked the Russians with direct aim. ArmyInform showed how the occupier pihotynczi/->climbedto Ukrainian positions, but soldiers from this brigade eliminated him in close combat.

Title: The KAB has weakened: on the northern border, a decrease in the use of guided aerial bombs is record...
Description: This was reported on the air by -Suspilne Novosti- the spokesman of the OTU -Siversk- Colonel Vadym Mysnyk. However, according to Vadym Mysnyk, in the last days of November, there was a noticeable decrease in the use of enemy-guided aerial bombs. The last time the occupiers attacked Sumy Oblast was on November 29. Since then, their use has not been recorded at all. -There may be several signs. This is also the inertia of the fact that we hit their arsenals. And the deterioration of logistics deep into the territory of Russia itself - Kursk Oblast, Bryansk. And weather conditions can also be added here,- said Vadym Mysnyk. As reported by ArmyInform , on the night of November 29 and in the morning, Russian troops carried out 5 shellings of the border territories and settlements of the Sumy region. 8 explosions were recorded.

Title: The Ministry of Defense is standardizing property purchases for the food service of the Armed Forces
Description: This is reported by Ministry of Defense December 2. It is noted that this decision is an important step in the process of unifying technical requirements for the purchase of equipment. -Until now, there were no unified technical specifications for the property of the food service of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Their introduction will make it possible to eliminate possible discrepancies in the requirements for equipment purchased for the Armed Forces of Ukraine, simplify the procurement process, ensure standardization and increase the efficiency of resource management,- explained Deputy Defense Minister of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine emphasized that they continue to work on improving the logistical support of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in order to improve the level of support for the Ukrainian military. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine initiated important changes in the system of providing servicemen during treatment and rehabilitation. Thanks to the Decree adopted by the Cabinet of Ministers, the mechanism has been improved vlasnosti/-> provision of improved nutrition to military personnel in health care facilities of all forms property

Title: Comprehensive approach to demining in Ukraine: more than 4,000 sappers and 150 pieces of equipment
Description: Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal told about this during the Demine Ukraine forum. Thanks to the solidarity of partners and internal resources, it was possible to return almost 35,500 vehicles to operation. square kilometers of Ukrainian land. The potentially mined area today is about 139,000 square meters. square kilometers. This encourages a comprehensive approach in humanitarian demining, which is already being implemented in accordance with the National Mine Action Strategy. The first direction is the survey of potentially contaminated land. Surveys are conducted to determine which territories are outside the risk zone and quickly return them to farmers for cultivation. The second direction is to clear the land of mines and shells in areas where contamination was found. The third direction is attracting international donor aid. So far, about 50 partner countries have joined the humanitarian demining coalition. The total volume of contributions is more than 1 billion dollars. The fourth direction is increasing the number of demining equipment. Ukrainian equipment and equipment of foreign companies, manufactured in Ukraine, are already working in the fields. The fifth direction is to increase the number of certified mine countermeasures operators, in particular private ones. Over the year, the number of operators has doubled. -Demining Ukraine is an investment in the future, a contribution to a common better tomorrow. Thank you to everyone who is making this contribution now, and who will make it in the future,- said the Prime Minister. As reported by ArmyInform, according to the results of 2024, within the Coalition, the engineering divisions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine had -pidsumky-roboty-koalicziyi-z-rozminuvannya-u-2024-roczi/->submitted 40 М113 armored personnel carriers, more than 200 anti-drone systems, 118 off-road vehicles and 240 mine detectors were purchased and transferred to carry out combat mine clearance tasks.

Title: PR-attacks of the enemy in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar: they entered, put their rag, rolled back
Description: About this told on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyni- Vitaly Pyasetskyi, t .acting chief sergeant of the 93rd separate mechanized brigade -Cold Ravine-. According to Vitaly Pyasetskyi, the occupiers use various offensive tactics. Small group infiltration is most popular in the Cold Ravine area of ​​responsibility. -Rarely it is more than two or three people. And at the same time, the enemy uses either dusk or weather conditions that prevent drones from detecting them in time and aiming artillery. Whether to inflict fire damage with the help of FPV drones or drops,- Vitaliy Pyasetskyi said. ArmyInform already reported about the unsuccessful attempts of the Russians to cross the channel in Chasovoy Yar.

Title: The GUR reported how many North Korean missiles Russia used to strike Ukraine
Description: About this in an interview with -Radio Svoboda- Andriy Chernyak, a representative of the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, said. -Their accuracy, in principle, is not very high. We understand that the technologies by which they were manufactured are outdated,- said Andriy Chernyak. At the same time, he noted that these missiles still pose a danger, because there is no difference between being killed by a 24-year-old missile and a missile that was manufactured using old technologies. -These missiles, these supplies also pose a very serious danger to the industry of Ukraine, to the population of Ukraine, to absolutely everyone,- added the representative of the GUR. Andriy Chernyak also reported that the Russian army constantly receives artillery ammunition from the DPRK. -If we talk about artillery ammunition, it's millions. We constantly see the movement of goods and containers. We do not rule out that there may be artillery munitions that North Korea manufactures, which are already in its warehouses. Yes, this is also a huge danger for Ukraine, because in addition to the fact that Russia has its military-industrial complex, it has its own capacities, it also uses the ammunition that comes from North Korea,- he said. As reported by ArmyInform, more than 100 artillery systems and 100 short-range ballistic missiles of the KN-23/24 type moved for now from North Korea to the Russian Federation.

Title: Soft diplomacy: the National Presidential Orchestra presented the project -Symphony Rock Resonance-
Description: —⁠The National Presidential Orchestra is a world-renowned professional ensemble that is loved and respected in the music community. How are you greeted abroad today, during the great war? — Our creative, professional activity consists in the preservation and development of national cultural traditions, the promotion of the heritage of world musical culture, and the disclosure of Ukraine's cultural identity on the international arena. We are an integral part of the presentation, image, cultural and diplomatic symbols of the state and the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Therefore, during performances both in Ukraine and abroad, we are, first of all, carriers of our cultural and intellectual identity, we are cultural ambassadors who speak in the language of art. Any audience can sense sincerity very well, and when you are sincere in your work, you will receive a warm welcome. And we are sincere in our creativity. —In response to Russia's large-scale invasion of Ukraine, in 2022 your team initiated the -Fight for Ukraine- art project, which had great success and a powerful symbolic meaning. How is the repertoire selected today? - We have an unlimited genre and stylistic spectrum of different music. We have the potential to perform diametrically opposed concert programs. So, performing academic music today, tomorrow, or even in parallel and at the same time, we are preparing for the performance of modern popular compositions with a different composition. Of course, this is a great physical and psychological burden on orchestra artists, but our team can handle it. Selection of the repertoire is a complex, intellectual, creative process. It is difficult for people who are not immersed in our artistic world to understand all the complexity of creating a concert program, all that is connected with the performance, combination, dramatic arrangement of this or that piece of music in a concert. It's funny when some people think that we just take some music, put a sequence number next to each piece - and that's it! But in fact it is psychology, history, and emotion. Sometimes, while performing music, we only hint, without speaking directly, and the listener already discovers the path for himself, and sometimes we take the listener by the hand and lead him along the path of music, showing this path. That's why we always analyze what we've done, where and for which audience. And it's actually always very responsible, a kind of daily test, because music is the universe, it's a powerful tool that has an incredible ability to revive, heal, and sometimes vice versa. The war brought suffering and grief to our country and to every family. Does it affect the repertoire? Undeniably. But what is more important is not whether the war affected the repertoire itself, it is important how we all perceive, rethink, reevaluate, relive the sound of certain musical works. —​​Military servicemen who attended -Symphony Rock Resonance- were sincerely delighted with what they saw and heard. How do you help the Armed Forces of Ukraine? - The National Presidential Orchestra functions within the structure of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. So, in the very essence, our activity takes place in the interests of the IOU and the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces. And, as is well known, in any field, and in the field of intellectual work and leisure, the balance between the direct and indirect form of beneficial effect of certain activities and the achievement of results is critically important. It's like an asterisk challenge… Our creativity is soft diplomacy, effectively used by our partners. It is taking into account modern trends and the experience of foreign partners that we build our philosophy of activity. In fact, I see so many people everywhere who loudly and loudly measure who helps the Armed Forces, and who is more, and who is better… We are working. The best help is to join the Defense Forces of Ukraine, and everything else is work, tacit homework, which everyone should do as professionally, qualitatively and efficiently as possible, well, and without too much PR.

Title: The conclusions of the VLK were fabricated: the suspicion was reported to a doctor and an employee o...
Description: This is stated in messages national gender The organizer of the group turned out to be a former employee of the Metropolitan Military Commissariat, previously convicted of corruption crimes. The perpetrator involved in the scheme a current official of the RTCC and a doctor of the city hospital. So far, all those involved have been notified of the suspicion. The law enforcement officers established that the doctor provided the men with fake medical documents, and the employee of the RTCC facilitated the passing of the military medical commission. In this way, men received a -white ticket-, which gave them the opportunity to go abroad. Mobilization evasion services cost those interested from $7,000 to $15,000. The police conducted a series of searches at the places of residence of the persons involved, in the premises of the TCC and the hospital. Therefore, medical documentation, draft records, computer equipment, various media, mobile phones, as well as 5 million hryvnias were seized. The Central Military Medical Commission canceled the previous decisions of the district military medical commissions regarding those men who managed to use the -services- of the perpetrators. The investigators informed three participants of the OZH that they were suspected of having committed criminal offenses under Part 3 Art. 332 (Illegal crossing of the state border of Ukraine in a special period or during the operation of the legal regime of martial law), ch. 3 Art. 28, ch. 1 Art. 369-2 (Abuse of influence), ch. 5th century 27, ch. 3 Art. 15, Art. 336 (Evasion of conscription) of the Criminal Code of Ukraine. The organizer and another figure were remanded in custody with bail, and the third violator is under night house arrest. The sanction of the most severe article provides up to 9 years in prison with deprivation of the right to hold certain positions or engage in certain activities for a period of up to three years with confiscation of property. Currently, the police continue to identify persons who evaded the draft, as well as other members of the criminal group. A pre-trial investigation is ongoing.

Title: -They did not reach the river and do not bathe-: near Kupyansk, the occupiers suffer maximum losses
Description: Oles Malyarevich, deputy commander of the attack drones, told about this on the air of the Espresso TV channel of air complexes -Achilles- of the 92nd assault brigade named after the head of the army Ivan Sirk. According to Oles Malyarevich, the enemy's task was and remains one - to capture the left bank of the Oskil River completely. The Defense Force's job is to hang on. -Currently, their movement is maximally slowed down. Everything is done so that for every landing they have to storm, they lose the maximum. They rested in the Oskil River, but the place where they rested, in the Kruglyakivka district, is a gray area. That is, they have not reached the river and are not swimming,- Oles Malyarevich summarized. Previously ArmyInform told that heavy fighting is going on near Kupyansk, the occupiers are trying to break through in Kupyansk-Vuzlovy and ford the Oskil River.

Title: As a result of Russian shelling in Donetsk region, 5 people were injured, houses were damaged
Description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. In total, during the day, the Russians shelled populated areas of Donetsk region 9 times. 144 people, including 18 children, were evacuated from the front line. In the Pokrovsky district, Kurakhove, Uspenivka, Hannivka, Vesely Hay, Kostyantinopilske, Suhi Yaly, Dachne, Dalnye, Illinka, Sontsivka, Berestki, Zorya and Novodmytrivka are under constant shelling. The occupiers damaged 6 objects in Stara Mykolaivka of the Illinivska community. The outskirts of Kostyantynivska and Lymanska communities were shelled. In Siversk, Russian troops damaged 6 houses, in the Chasovoyarsk community - 7 private houses, a high-rise building, an infrastructure object and 2 non-residential premises. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of December 2, 2024, from the directions of Kursk, Orel, Millerovo, Primorsko-Akhtarsk - Russian Federation. the enemy attacked with 110 attack UAVs of the Shahed type and other types of drones.

Title: -We are not citizens, we are trash-: Galician paratroopers captured 11 former Russian prisoners in K...
Description: They published the corresponding video on December 2 on their channel. -Thus, during one of the unsuccessful enemy assaults, the Lviv paratroopers destroyed the occupiers, some escaped, and those who survived and hid were captured by a unit of the Galician brigade,- Ukrainian defenders said. The video tells the story of Russian soldiers, former prisoners who signed a contract and got into the 11th Assault Brigade of the Russian Army. It is noted that one of the units was tasked with seizing a settlement under the control of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, where there is also a Russian civilian population. -Badly trained and poorly equipped ex-prisoners were thrown to their deaths like cannon fodder, and their command fled as soon as the battle began. The enemy, having met with our paratroopers, decided to surrender, saving his life,- the Ukrainian paratroopers reported. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that fighters of the 80th Galician Airborne Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine found a phone from the slain commander of the Russian group of fighters with the call sign -Larkin- href=-https://armyinform.com.ua/2024/11/24/ya-v-shoczi-ne-lizte-syudy-nikoly-ostannye-video-z-telefona-rosijskogo-komandyra-na-kurshhyni/- >last entry.

Title: A resident of Lyman was exposed, who gave the location of the Defense Forces of Ukraine to the enemy
Description: This is stated in message of the SBU. According to the investigation materials, in June 2024, the woman received an offer through the Telegram messenger from a serviceman of the Russian Armed Forces. She was offered cooperation in carrying out subversive activities against Ukraine. The suspect agreed and performed the duties of a curator for four months. She transmitted information about the deployment locations of units of the National Police, SBU, and equipment of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, using screenshots of maps with handwritten markings. This data was used to coordinate the offensive actions of the enemy. At the behest of the occupiers, the figure walked around the outskirts of the front-line community, where she recorded the locations of the Defense Forces. The agent paid the greatest attention to the location of fortified areas and firing positions of Ukrainian troops involved in hostilities in the Lyman direction. Under the procedural guidance of the Donetsk regional prosecutor's office, citizens were informed of suspicion of treason (Part 2 of Article 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). The detainee is in custody. She faces up to life in prison with forfeiture of property.

Title: Consequences of the night attack of the Russian Federation in the Chernivtsi region: damaged buildin...
Description: The State Emergency Service of Ukraine informs about this. In particular, in the territory of the Dnistrovsky District, a residential building and an outbuilding were damaged due to falling debris. The shock wave knocked out windows, destroyed the roofs of buildings. -Fortunately, there were no casualties or injuries. At the scene of the incident, relevant services continue to work,- the message reads. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of December 2, 2024, from the directions of Kursk, Orel, Millerovo, Primorsko-Akhtarsk - Russian Federation. the enemy attacked with 110 attack UAVs of the Shahed type and other types of drones.

Title: Improving the quality of BZVP and increasing the terms of officer training: the Commander-in-Chief o...
Description: This is stated in message on the Facebook page. The leaders of structural divisions of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, commanders of types and branches of troops (forces), commanders of separate combat military units, heads of training centers and VVNIs were involved in the meeting. At the meeting, they discussed the preliminary results of the implementation from November 1 of the current year in all educational centers of the new BZVP Program with a training period of 1.5 months. For the objectivity of the evaluation of the innovations, interviews were held with cadets and instructors, who noted only positive aspects in the increase in training terms and changes in the basic military training program. -Defined tasks for further monitoring of the effectiveness of implemented changes. Already in December, the first graduates of the one-and-a-half-month training period will go to combat military units. Therefore, we are waiting for feedback about the graduates from unit commanders and proposals for the further increase of basic combined military training,- said the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Oleksandr Syrskyi added that the training of officers of the tactical unit, the content of which currently needs improvement, including an increase in the training period, was not overlooked. Such proposals were expressed by the heads of higher military educational institutions. Commanders of combat brigades also emphasized the need to improve officer training. The participants of the meeting proposed the deployment of advanced training courses for the training of staff officers in separate areas of activity. -Each commander must be responsible for the quality of the training of the staff, therefore, during their training, the principle -the commander trains with his subordinates- must be used,- said the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Training is the basis of the activities of troops (forces) both in peacetime and in wartime, the activities of all commanders should be aimed at constantly improving the knowledge, skills and abilities of servicemen, their stability during combat missions. -Combat results directly depend on the quality of training of soldiers. I am grateful to the commanders of all levels, who take maximum responsibility for the training of personnel. In particular, the best practices used for training at the level of combat brigades should be extended to all Defense Forces of Ukraine,- concluded Oleksandr Syrskyi.

Title: Inflated prices and fraudulent schemes: what the enemy invents to demotivate the Ukrainian military
Description: However, Russian propaganda would like everything to be exactly the opposite. That is why in the pro-Russian segment of the networks from time to time they spread information about inflated prices for the military, or about additional taxes, or generally about fraudulent schemes. Yes, the other day, enemy scoundrels spread information that one of the Ukrainian cafes allegedly has a menu with different prices for civilians and military. These menus are allegedly labeled -standard- and -military- respectively, with similar dishes and inflated prices for the latter category. Propagandists add a corresponding photo as -proof- of this. Usually, similar cases of discrimination by the Ukrainian military gain publicity in the media and social networks. However, no Ukrainian publications reported on this incident, the -news- is spread only by Russian propaganda resources. Neither the name of the establishment, which allegedly has a similar menu, nor its address is also known. Most likely, this is just an edited photo or a production. Previously, Russian propagandists distributed a fake photo - an announcement that a 20% tax for TCC employees was in effect in one of the Ukrainian grocery stores. And they also tried to cheat the military for money, offering them an alleged 30% discount for a driver's license without passing exams. With such fakes, Russian propagandists are trying to demotivate the Ukrainian military, disrupt mobilization in Ukraine and sow discord in Ukrainian society.

Title: -Bradlists- destroyed two dozen pieces of equipment: the paratroopers cut down the enemy in Kurshchy...
Description: Major Serhii Poemchuk, deputy commander of the battalion of the 95th brigade of the Russian Armed Forces, told about this on the air of the -Yedini Novyni- marathon. According to Serhiy Poemchuk, the situation remains difficult. -Meat assaults- take place both during the day and at night. Paratroopers destroy groups of attack aircraft, often together with dozens of vehicles. Ukrainian -Bradley- effectively -shreds- enemy infantry fighting vehicles and armored personnel carriers. -The enemy attacked with 20 armored vehicles, but we suppressed it. We take 20 units of equipment, each of them has 10-20 manpower. This is quite a large number,- noted Serhii Payemchuk. As reported by ArmyInform, in Kurshchyna the enemy throws into battle a large number of light transport to bring his stormtroopers closer to our positions. After unloading, the transport often remains, because the Russians do not reckon with its losses.

Title: Germany will provide Ukraine with a military aid package worth 650 million euros
Description: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz announced this on the social network H. Germany will remain the strongest supporter of Ukraine in Europe. At the meeting with Volodymyr Zelenskyi, I will announce the further supply of defense equipment in the amount of 650 million euros, which will take place in December,- the message reads. Olaf Scholz assured that Ukraine can rely on Germany. -To prove this once again, today I came to Kyiv: by train through a country that has been defending itself against Russian aggression for more than 1,000 days,- he added. The last time the German chancellor was in Kyiv was in June 2022 together with French President Emmanuel Macron and then Italian Prime Minister Mario Draghi. As reported by ArmyInform, President Volodymyr Zelensky on Sunday met with the President of the European Council Antoniu Koshta, High Representative of the EU of Foreign Affairs and Security Policy Kaya Callas and EU Commissioner for Enlargement Marta Kos, who visited Ukraine on the first day of taking office.

Title: Technology war: shots of the duel between our UAV and a Russian ground drone
Description: A video of combat work appearedon the unit's page. -Charter unmanned aerial vehicle against the enemy's unmanned ground vehicles. In this duel, the winner is obvious,- the fighters assured. A tank, a howitzer, a cannon, and infantrymen in and without shelters could not stand against the drones of the 13th NSU brigade these days either. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how the fighters of the 13th operational brigade of the NSU -Charter- together with their comrades from the 92nd assault brigade named after the basket chieftain Ivan Sirk first destroyed enemy equipment, and then finished off the landing of the Russians.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Air defense units shot down 52 Russian UAVs, another 50 were lost to location
Description: This was reported by Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The air attack was repulsed by anti-aircraft missile troops, units of electronic defense systems and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As of 08:30, the downing of 52 enemy UAVs in Kyiv, Cherkasy, Chernihiv, Vinnytsia, Khmelnytskyi, Zhytomyr, Sumy, Poltava, Kharkiv and Dnipropetrovsk regions has been confirmed. -50 unmanned aerial vehicles were lost in location, presumably as a result of countermeasures by EW means of the Defense Forces, 6 - left the controlled airspace in the direction of Russia and Belarus, another one - in the air. Combat work continues!- - noted in the Air Force. As reported by ArmyInform, at the end of the year the enemy significantly increased the number of air attacks on Ukraine. November was marked by massive attacks on Ukrainian cities.

Title: Strengthening of air defense and negotiations on accession to the EU: Volodymyr Zelenskyi and Antoni...
Description: About this reported the Office of the President. One of the key topics of the meeting is the strengthening of air defense. Volodymyr Zelenskyy conveyed specific needs for strengthening the air shield. Separately, they discussed the situation at the front, among other things, the implementation of the Czech and pan-European initiative to provide Ukrainian soldiers with artillery shells, and the development of Ukraine's defense industry. The head of state thanked all partners who invested in projects for the production of modern weapons. -It is important to increase the purchase of weapons from Ukrainian manufacturers, in particular, at the expense of revenues from frozen Russian assets. Most of the funds from the second tranche of these revenues from the European part of the contribution — that is, at least one billion euros — will be directed to support the Ukrainian defense industry,- the President said. He noted that specific mechanisms for the use of income from frozen Russian assets should be operational in January. During the meeting, they also discussed the strengthening of the sanctions policy and the approval of the next package of sanctions in the near future. Separately, the head of state thanked all partners who support Ukraine's efforts to join the European Union and receive an invitation to NATO. -Both in December and next year, we must do as much as possible to advance in negotiations with the EU. It is absolutely realistic to open the first two negotiation clusters at the beginning of next year and the remaining negotiation clusters within a year. We would very much like that,- the President emphasized. Antoniou Costa assured that Europe will do everything possible for Ukraine to become a member of the EU as soon as possible. -The progress you have shown is impressive. Ukrainians are writing a new guide on how to implement deep reforms in the conditions of a war for their survival,- he said. The President of the European Council condemned nuclear threats from the Russian Federation and attacks on energy infrastructure. He noted that the EU will participate in the repair of generating facilities damaged by the strikes and will continue to provide assistance. -Already this month, the European Union will provide Ukraine with an additional 4.2 billion euros in order to support the Ukrainian budget. On top of that, starting next month, we will provide another full year of €1.5 billion in aid each month. We receive these funds from the use of frozen Russian assets, and they can also be used for military purposes,- Antoniou Costa said. He also emphasized that Europe will continue to put pressure on the Russian economy in order to weaken the aggressor country's ability to wage war. According to the President of the European Council, the EU is preparing the 15th package of sanctions.

Title: In the Kherson region, three people died due to Russian shelling
Description: This reported the head of the Kherson Regional State Administration Oleksandr Prokudin. Antonivka, Stanislav, Sadove, Bilozerka, Komyshany, Priozerne, Inzhenerne, Vesele, Zolota Balka and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. the Russian military hit critical infrastructure and residential areas of the region's settlements, in particular damaged 12 private houses. The occupiers also mutilated buses and a private car. As reported by ArmyInform, in Ternopil as a result of a strike drone hitting a residential building died person.

Title: Defense forces repelled dozens of attacks in the Pokrovsky and Kurakhiv directions
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff Armed Forces as of 08:00 on December 2. According to detailed information, yesterday the enemy carried out 18 airstrikes on the positions of Ukrainian units and populated areas, dropped 25 anti-aircraft missiles, and used 1,635 kamikaze drones. In addition, he fired 5,079 rounds, 145 of which were from RSV. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy stormed 10 times in the areas of the settlements of Staritsa, Tykh, Vovchansk and in the direction of Kozachai Lopan. In the Kupyansk direction, there were nine attacks by the occupiers during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Lozova, Kruglyakivka, Hlushkivka, and Zeleny Gayu. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked eight times. Tried to move forward near Druzhelyubivka, Grekivka, Hryhorivka, Terni and Torskyi. Title: There will be no total immersion in darkness: an expert on mass air strikes of the Russian Federatio...
Description: Military expert Petro Chernyk told why there have been more mass attacks and what to expect in our country in winter: -Such a number of Shaheds: is it a lot or a little (November 28 of this year - ed.)? In fact, it is very, very much. That is, the Russians managed to raise the level of their composition. But not production. The only thing they produce is the body itself. Two-stroke petrol engine is either Iranian or Chinese. Microelectronics - from other countries. But there is a nuance. Despite the fact that these are really very high figures (the number of launched enemy UAVs - ed.), the rate of shooting down or location deviation is in the range of 90 to 98%, and sometimes 100%. This is a very serious indicator of the performance of our air defenses. Regarding indicators of locational deviation. This means that we already have such a level of radio-electronic warfare that allows -shaheda- not just to plant, but even to deploy back to Russia and Belarus. Will the Russians continue this work? One hundred percent, will not stop. But there is also an important point here: because there are again huge fears that, say, 200 Kh-101 missiles Russia has made. And it is supposedly something incredibly huge. Let me remind you that the largest volley they launched in August was 127 rockets simultaneously. And they still haven't repeated it. And they produce no more than 150-170 rockets per month. Do they have the task of destroying our energy infrastructure? THERE ARE. But again, we are a big country in terms of electricity generation, specifically in the nuclear aspect. And our network has been closed to the European network for at least two years. Despite the fact that there will be difficulties with turning off the light, I am 100% sure that there will be no total immersion in darkness. And our air defense forces will continue to demonstrate such high performance.-
