Title: Warrior Taras shot down a cruise missile during one of Russia's largest combined missile-drone strik...
Description: told more about the fighter in the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -The morning of November 28, 2024 seemed tense for the defenders of the Ukrainian sky. During one of the largest combined missile-drone strikes, Russia used up to 200 missiles of various types and UAVs. Soldiers of mobile fire groups destroyed eight enemy missiles in the south of Ukraine,- the military recalled. It is noted that one of the cruise missiles was shot down by Taras. This is the second enemy air target he has eliminated as part of a mobile fire group in the past two weeks. The previous shooting was on November 17. Then the soldier also destroyed a Russian cruise missile. -I am an anti-aircraft gunner from the first day of service in the army, so I know my job well,- says the soldier. — Got into the Kherson anti-aircraft missile brigade back in 2016, when he was serving his military service. I liked it, signed a contract, and I am fighting in this unit to this day,- said Taras. The man was born and grew up in the south of Ukraine. Here he got married and became a father. Therefore, he does not know from words what the Russian occupying forces are doing in Ukraine, and how to protect his native home and family. -We must defeat the enemy, protect every family, every child, parents, every piece of native Ukrainian land and sky. For this, we need to strengthen the army,- he emphasized. Taras urged everyone to join the fight against the aggressor, to join their Kherson anti-aircraft missile brigade. -Our team is excellent. Together we can hasten the Victory. In the meantime, let's continue to destroy the enemy!- - he summarized. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of November 28, 2024, as a result of an anti-aircraft battle -ta-naslidky-vorozhoyi-ataky/->almost 90 percent of the winged Kalibr and Kh-101 missiles.

Title: The hero of Ukraine Oleg Apostol told how his 95 beat the enemy: interview
Description: The Hero of Ukraine Oleg Apostol was the commander of the 95th Separate Airborne Assault Brigade of the Polish Army until today. In the spring, the correspondent of ArmiyaInform recorded a long interview with him, we suggest that he be recalled on the occasion of his new appointment. The great war that Russia started against Ukraine 10 years ago, during this period many young but extremely experienced military personnel grew up. who have already entered the history of modern Ukraine as talented military leaders. One of these is the commander of the 95th Separate Polish Airborne Assault Brigade, Hero of Ukraine, Knight of the Cross of Combat Merit, Full Knight of the Order of Bohdan Khmelnytskyi, Colonel Oleg Apostol. During the ten-year war, the paratrooper fought for Slovyansk and Luhansk airport, liberated the Mykolaiv thermal power station in Donetsk region, and from the beginning of the large-scale invasion, also populated areas in Mykolaiv region. With the appointment to the post of commander of the 95th brigade of the Russian Armed Forces, Colonel Apostol led the battles in the Serebrian and Kupyan forests, and now continues to organize defensive and offensive actions in Donetsk and Luhansk regions. Exclusively for ArmiyaInform, Hero of Ukraine Oleg Apostol talked about his combat journey from platoon commander to brigade commander. — What are the most significant combat episodes of the paratroopers since 2014, in your opinion, will go down in the history of Ukraine? — Undoubtedly, the well-known raid (the raid of the Ukrainian paratroopers, which began in July 2014 during the anti-terrorist operation - ed.), defense of Luhansk and Donetsk airports, battles for Debaltseve. During the breakthrough to Luhansk airport, I led a combat reconnaissance platoon, then I was in the position of deputy battalion commander. The occupiers then tried twice to set up ambushes on the advance route. Having calculated the dangerous areas in time, they decided to play it safe. Ordered two tanks and an armored personnel carrier to occupy the designated line. It saved us and prevented us from being destroyed. Everyone knows that 80-90% of ambushes do not survive… But the commander should always be able to calculate everything in advance, because then it saves many lives and enables the completion of the task. — Tell us about your first battle with the enemy. — June 2, 2014, when everyone went to storm Sloviansk and Lyman. I was tasked with bringing three artillery batteries into a designated area to support operations. Two batteries were equipped with 122 mm howitzers, and one with 152 mm. I was driving behind the 79th DSHV brigade, and then they were ambushed on the climb to Sloviansk. At that moment, I stopped the convoy, because I realized that the 79th was operating with one of the Jaguar special units. All of them are charged, and I have three armored personnel carriers, one -zushka- and three batteries that are covered with tents and not ready for combat. Then the 79th broke through and went forward to Liman, we stood in a column, and the enemy was on our right and left. I understood that the enemy might start to outflank us, so I gave the command to turn off the headlights, turn right and left, and we took up a circular defense. 15 minutes have passed I got on the armored personnel carrier and decided to move forward. I thought then that if I leave and nothing happens, then we will jump by 2-3 cars. When we realized that the enemy had withdrawn, we first thought how lucky we were, because if the enemy had not made such a mistake, it is difficult to imagine what could have happened if three batteries, each with 6 howitzers and ammunition, had been ambushed. ; This is actually the first moment of the battle, but then there was the first contact battle, when I liberated the Mykolaiv TPP. The first time we went there, it was difficult to detect the enemy, and we conducted reconnaissance by combat. The second time, we already knew where all their firing points were, and we simply stopped them with direct fire from tanks. In fact, after we regularly held them at gunpoint, they began to run away. For the third time, we broke through, unblocked Mykolaiv TPP, occupied the commanding heights - and after that Slovyansk was liberated. - What are the most memorable combat episodes since you became the commander of the 95th brigade? - The first is the assault in the direction of the settlement of Kreminna. We had great success there, but the only thing we lacked was effort. Of the four battalions, only two advanced, because the other two were in other directions. We broke ahead, we literally lacked two kilometers. After that, the enemy brought in significant reserve forces, we switched to defense with the task of defending the Kreminny direction. Secondly, this is the defense of the Kupyan forest, at times it seemed that everything was about to fall, but the enemy could not withstand the dynamics of the fighting. This was clearly visible from their assaults. At first, they attacked 15-20 people several times a day. Then 6–8 Russian soldiers, then two people, and then once a day, a couple tried to go on an assault. As soon as such a turning point comes, we immediately tried to regain the lost positions, which we did. - What units of the Russian army did you have to fight against? - We were in the Flint Forest opposite the 76th Airborne Assault Division, which included the 104th Guards Airborne Assault Regiment, the 234th infantry regiment and the 237th Guards parachute regiment On the eastern side, they concentrated the 228th motorized rifle regiment, the 80th tank regiment, and the 4th separate motorized rifle brigade. I am sure that this enemy remembered us well, because we crushed them so much that some units went out to recover. In the Kupyansky Forest, -Sturm Z- and -Sturm V- stood against us, and when the -Zeks- were finished, the personnel left - the 25th Separate Motorized Rifle Guards Brigade, the 138th Separate Motorized Rifle Brigade - this was real -meat -. Analyzing the actions of the enemy, you ask yourself the question, how can you just send people to slaughter like this? But I cannot understand this, because my commanders did not act like this with their personnel. And he himself would never do that to his people. At Terny, units of the 20th Guards Combined Arms Army and some assault units of the Tank Army tried to storm us. They have the same tactics here as in the Kupyan forest. They also go in packs, they just put people down. By the way, they call themselves -Kyiv Russia-, but in fact they are simply distorting our history. The most stupid thing is that their people are led by such narratives and believe that it is normal to send people to their death. All this is welcomed by the people, because then they can buy a car. Of course, it is worth noting that the -stacking- tactics of the occupiers is paying off. We have seen this in Bahmut, Soledar and other destinations, but our advantage lies in pure intelligence and technological development. — Your brigade took many prisoners. Will they admit their guilt for all the evil they have committed on our land? - When the occupiers are captured, they immediately become different people. It is clear that at first the characteristic phrases are heard: -We have been abandoned, we are offended by everything and everyone, barefoot, poor, unhappy and hungry.- They behave as prisoners should, they don't show their character, they give us information about where their command posts are, what paths they took, who is senior. If compared with the captives who were at the beginning of the large-scale invasion and now, then I call this -party- mercenaries, because they stupidly go to kill for money. No one catches them and forces them to go fight against Ukraine and kill our civilians and military. This is a purely conscious choice of each of them. When I talk to them before handing them over to replenish the exchange fund, they all say that they were aware of the possibility of their death, but they came to make money. But we understand that they have come to destroy our people. And there is nothing sacred about them. - Which settlements did your brigade liberate? - Our brigade de-occupied Dovgenka, Krasnopill, Makarivka, Pasika, Dolyna, Kamianka, Sukha Kamianka, Studenok, Koroviya Yar, Yatskivka, Krymka, Synycheno. Then they moved to the settlements of Krymka, Shandrigolovo, Zelena Dolyna, Kolodyazi and reached Ploschanka. The Kharkiv operation was well planned by the senior commander, it was correctly selected units, the direction of our shock fist, support and a clear assessment of the enemy. The enemy really relaxed then, they were confident - and that also worked against them. While still a member of the 80th DSHV brigade, he met the war in the position of battalion commander. Such a first moment, which will be remembered forever and will go down in history, is the defense of the settlement of Voznesensk. After successfully repelling the enemy's offensive, we moved to offensive actions. And then they liberated the following settlements in the Mykolaiv region: Arkhargelske, Katerynivka, Kashpero-Mykolaivka, Novopetrivske, Novofontanka, Dobrokamyanka, Ingulets, Vynogradivka, and in this way we reached Yavkina, and already near Snigurivka we supported the enemy. The outlying villages that we held there were: Shiroke, Chervona Dolyna and Kobzartsi. Oh, and we won trophies then! - Which trophies were the -fattest-? - Well, the most I can point out is REB -Resident-. In addition to it, there were gas tankers, water tankers, bathhouses, armored personnel carriers, tanks of various models of the T-72BZ type and modifications, D-30 howitzers, engineering vehicles, MT-LB, pickup trucks, many shells and even to the Grad anti-aircraft missile system. In general, we received such a normal lend-lease from the Rashists, it was -gifted- to us by the 126th separate brigade of the coast guard and the command post of the army. - How has the training of Ukrainian paratroopers changed over these 10 years? - Definitely for the better. Everything we invest in the training of young recruits is invaluable experience forged in battles on our own experience. We in the brigade have developed our own material base and assembled a group of experienced instructors who skillfully manage personnel for each type of combat and explain all the nuances. For me personally, the combat training of personnel is extremely important. — A few months ago, I saw with my own eyes how you set an example and taught the paratroopers of your brigade. To be honest, I was impressed not only by your professional approach, but also by how much your actions motivate the personnel. — Yes, then I gathered my instructors and another certain category of officers and showed all those points that need to be improved in preparation for further training of soldiers on the battlefield. Of course, these are not all dogmas and things are different in battle, but absolutely all situations are analyzed from real battles. We constantly monitor the enemy's channels, watch how our defenders act, analyze where there was success and what caused it, and where we could have done differently. That is, constant analysis of oneself and the enemy gives an understanding of how to plan the course of hostilities. If a person is trained and clearly knows what he should do, then this is already a great destiny of success, because it is the soldiers who forge our Victory in the trenches. And then an extremely important point is the moral and psychological state of my paratroopers. All of us are waiting for our relatives at home. A person should always understand what he is fighting for and what will happen if we do not fight, if we do not overcome this evil now, then Russia will not let us go so easily and will destroy us. — At the beginning of the large-scale invasion, many Ukrainian media underestimated our enemy and dispelled myths that the occupiers were weak and weak. What can you say about this and how often the enemy changes? - If they were weak and weak, we would have knocked them out long ago to the borders of 1991. You can never underestimate your opponent. Russia is a really big machine with a huge human resource, which they do not spare. They are abandoning their people by the thousands and will continue to do so, because history repeats itself. In addition, the occupiers learn quite quickly. Many examples can be given. Russia learns a lot from us and uses it against us in the future. - Did you dream of becoming a paratrooper as a child? - Definitely yes. I never considered infantry or other types of troops. When I was little, in the 7th grade, I had about 300 toy soldiers, up to 100 pieces of equipment, aviation, special forces. All the money that I saved and that my relatives gave me, I spent on my plastic army. I put them against each other according to the scenario, simulated the landing of the landing force and developed various battle sequences. It happened that I was so engrossed in the placement of soldiers that I did not come to the actual battle. After all, I was a child, and I switched to another game, for example, I went to play football, because the placement itself took more than an hour. I have also loved historical films and the history of Ukraine since childhood, constantly read memoirs and historical novels. It was then that my desire to become a soldier was born, I could not see any other way for myself. - What personally gives you strength and how do you motivate your personnel? - Gives strength when the day or battle has passed without loss. War dictates its terms, so you can never get too lazy. I understand that it can be difficult for me mentally at times, because you are constantly worrying about your people, that they are all alive and well, but we understand that it is the hardest for the soldier there. Yes, we plan everything with the brigade leadership, combatants, conduct reconnaissance, provide artillery support, but nothing will happen without soldiers. Therefore, I sincerely want all people to respect our real heroes, because many of them have already given the most valuable thing - their lives. Russia is an enemy and an evil that we must stop. I have lived in this world for a reason, at least we have already avenged both the Cossacks and the Kruts. Now our job is to reclaim the rest of ours. Here you are either the hunter or the prey. — What do you wish for the youth who dream of joining your ranks? What traits do they need to nurture? — DSHV is an elite. I even tell my boys, when they're a little off balance, to remember that they're paratroopers! It will always be difficult, because war is merciless and unfair. We all realize what a tremendous amount of work has been done here to earn the proud title of paratrooper. I wish the youth to cultivate courage, to be physically hardy, to study the entire history of Ukraine, because this is not the first time we are fighting this enemy. Putin's appetite is growing, and it will not stop. He is becoming, and may have already become a copy of Hitler himself, without realizing it. Everyone will have to fight, it is necessary to accept it as it is and with a cold mind. The main thing is to remember and honor all our fallen Heroes! Photo by the author and the press service of the 95th separate Polish assault brigade.

Title: During the day, Russian troops attacked residents of Kharkiv Oblast
Description: reported this by Oleg Synegubov, the head of Kharkiv OVA. -As a result of an attack by the Russian army, a civilian 74-year-old man died from a fatal wound,- the message reads. As reported by ArmyInform, yesterday Russian troops ->delivered a series of strikes on Kharkiv Oblast, causing damage to infrastructure and the death of civilians residents As a result of a missile attack on Kharkiv, the production buildings of the enterprise and the glazing of the windows of a multi-storey residential building were damaged.

Title: The ideological supporter of racism, who pointed Russian missiles at the defense plants of Kharkiv, ...
Description: About this informs November 29 SBU. According to the investigation materials, an employee of a local pharmaceutical company turned out to be an enemy accomplice. Under the guise of business trips, the agent collected information about military facilities, including defense enterprises, and -matched- their coordinates with locations on Google Maps. SBU counter-intelligence exposed the suspect and arrested him during a special operation in the regional center in September 2023. -During the search of his apartment and car, mobile phones were seized with maps of the locations of potential targets, which he tried to pass on to the FSB,- the statement said. According to the investigation, the convict came to the attention of the occupiers as an ideological supporter of racism, about which he repeatedly wrote on Russian social networks. -After recruitment, the agent used a conspiratorial channel of communication with the FSB with the help of anonymous chats in instant messengers, which he registered on the phone numbers of foreign operators,- the SBU said. According to the materials of the Security Service, the court found the intruder guilty of 2 Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). As reported by ArmyInform, Security Service of Ukraine detained five persons, who justified Russian aggression and were waiting for the full occupation of the country. Their activities were conducted in Kyiv, Kharkiv and Donetsk region.

Title: North Korean ammunition is flying in the wrong direction: the occupiers complain about the allies
Description: This is what told on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyny-, lieutenant colonel Nazar Voloshyn, spokesman of the Khortytsia operational-strategic troop grouping. According to Nazar Voloshyn, first of all, they complain about the lack of ammunition. Then there is a lack of food and even water. The problem with logistics became especially acute with the onset of cold weather. -It's trite, but they even complain about the lack of warm things. And we have information that Russian servicemen are complaining about difficulties in using ammunition supplied by North Korea. That is, they don't fly where they need to go,- Nazar Voloshyn noted. Previously ArmyInform reported, in the Pokrovsky, Kurakhivskyi and Vremivskyi directions, the enemy is completely destroying shelling and bombing of Ukrainian cities and villages.

Title: He survived because his son made him run: the story of the rescue of a border guard in the Kharkiv r...
Description: About this informs State Border Service of Ukraine. One of such attacks was shelling from Grady, when the positions of the border guards were literally destroyed. There were defenders in the dugouts, and in the forest - the border guard Vadim with the call sign -Obolon- and the position commander. After the shelling ended, the commander rushed to save his comrades, but came across a mine that detonated. -Our commander was cut by shrapnel, a lung was pierced. We quickly gave him first aid and evacuated him. Fortunately, he is now recovering and will hopefully return to us soon,- says Obolon, who temporarily took command of the position. The border guards rebuilt the fortification from scratch, putting all their strength into it. -We do this for ourselves, because it is our security, and for our commander - so that he is satisfied with our work,- Obolon adds. Vadim, who used to work in Kyiv, says that he repeatedly thanked his son for the habit of running: it was she who saved his life during attacks. The man hopes for a quick end to the war and calls on Ukrainians to join the border brigade -Hart- to fight together for victory. -Only by joint efforts will we be able to overcome the enemy,- he is convinced.

Title: Damage to an oil base and the failure of an elite unit of the Russians: a stream from a front-line c...
Description: Elite units advanced from the side of the invaders, but after a skirmish they had to retreat. They did this very slowly, so our artillery gave them an acceleration. Defense forces hit an oil depot and destroyed the radar station of the Buk-M3 air defense system. As in the summer, the tanks of the -Atlas- oil depot in the Rostov region caught fire again. And the radar station of the Buk-M3 anti-aircraft missile system was destroyed in the temporarily occupied territory of the Zaporizhzhia region. Tank 63 OMBr visited the Russian positions. First, he mowed down the landing with a machine gun, and later, to consolidate the result, he sent the invaders several shells from a cannon. These and other topics are discussed by the presenters - Captain Artem Golub and Major Andriy Makarenko.

Title: The President named the new commander of the Ground Forces and the deputy commander-in-chief of the ...
Description: About this he wrote on November 29, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi. -Together with the Central Committee, several personnel decisions were made for our army. The main task is to significantly increase the combat capability of our army, ensure the quality of training of servicemen and introduce innovative approaches to people management in the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The Ukrainian army needs internal changes to fully achieve the goals of our state,- the head of state said. According to him, Major General Mykhailo Drapaty successfully organized the defense in the Kharkiv direction and disrupted the offensive operation of the Russian forces. Colonel Oleh Apostol is an experienced commander of the 95th separate amphibious assault brigade. -Both have proven their effectiveness in battles,- the President emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, previously the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky emphasizedthe tragedy of war, which affects children the most. In his statement, he noted that the concepts of -war- and -children- are two polar realities that should not exist side by side.

Title: The forces of unmanned systems hit an interesting military target of the Russians worth $10 million
Description: Video of the combat work published on its page by the Command of the Unmanned Systems Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine . It is noted that the target illumination and missile guidance radar station (RPN 9С36М) is a key element of the anti-aircraft missile complex. Its value is estimated at about 10 million dollars. -The detection and destruction operation was carried out by the operators of the 412 OBBps NEMESIS, once again proving the effectiveness of the SBS in weakening the enemy's air defense,- they said military As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 42nd mechanized brigade /->filmed from a copter a city that has been stormed by Russian troops for several months.

Title: Toretsk was completely destroyed by artillery: the Russians are razing the city to the ground
Description: The spokeswoman of -Luhansk- OTU told about this on the air -Suspilne Novosti- Major Anastasia Bobovnikova. According to Anastasia Bobovnikova, everything is very difficult in the Toretsk direction. There, the enemy uses small assault groups, of which there are many. -In fact, they attack with -meat assaults- under the cover of artillery and aviation. You can see what Toretsk looks like. Now the footage is very scary, there is not a single whole house left. Everything was completely fired by the artillery. And plus constantly KABy, KABy, KABy. There may be 10 KABs per day,- Anastasia Bobovnikova said. Previously ArmyInform reported that in the Toretsk direction the enemy is constantly replenishing its personnel - every night it brings in -live meat- and delivers weapons, but there are problems with food.

Title: The enemy began to actively operate in the Vremiv and Lyman directions
Description: This is reported in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 16 :00 November 29. The border areas of Chernihiv Oblast, Sumy Oblast and Kharkiv Oblast continue to suffer from Russian artillery shelling. A number of settlements, including Bleshnya, Porozok, Mykhalchyna-Sloboda, Gremyachka, Progress, Nova Huta, and Vidrodenivske, were hit by the shelling of the terrorist army today. In the Kharkiv direction, the occupiers twice stormed the positions of our units in the area of ​​Vovchansk and Tykhi. One battle is still going on. Six times the enemy attacked our positions in the Kupyansk direction. Ukrainian defenders repelled enemy assaults near Kolisnikivka, Lozova, Pershotravnevoy and Zeleny Gay. On the Lyman direction, enemy units attacked in the Grekivka, Novoehorivka, Terniv, Yampolivka, Dibrova, Torsky, Zarichny, Hryhorivka areas and in the Serebryansk forest. Since the beginning of the day, Ukrainian soldiers have already repelled 16 attacks. In the Kramatorsk direction, the invaders carried out two assaults near Chasovoy Yar and in the direction of Bila Hora. There are currently two ongoing attacks by the occupiers. In the Toretsk direction, Ukrainian defenders repelled an enemy attack in the Druzhba district, and enemy aircraft also struck Oleksandr-Kalynovy and Oleksandr-Shultyny. In the Pokrovsky direction since the beginning of the day, the occupiers have already made 21 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their occupied positions in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Dachenske, Chumatske, Novy Trud and Zhovte settlements. The defense forces repulsed a total of nineteen enemy attacks in the direction. The enemy suffers heavy losses in manpower. The largest number of clashes was recorded at this time in the Kurakhiv direction. The invaders attacked our units 33 times, trying to advance in the areas of the settlements of Sontsivka, Berestka, Novodmytrivka, Zorya, Kurakhove, Dachne, Dalne, Elizavetivka, Hannivka, and Uspenivka. Ten fights are ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction the invaders carried out 22 attacks on the positions of the Ukrainian troops near Vesely Hay, Kostyantynopolskyi, Suhy Yalyi, Rozdolnyi and Novodarivka. Eleven skirmishes are ongoing, and the enemy aircraft also struck Novosilka and Makarivka with guided air bombs. In the direction of Gulyaipole, the enemy is using attack aircraft, hitting the area of ​​the settlement of Gulyaipole with unguided air missiles. In the Dnieper direction the enemy made one unsuccessful attempt to storm the positions of Ukrainian units. In Kurshchyna, Ukrainian defenders repelled 11 attacks by Russian invaders today, the fighting continues. We remind you that last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 2030 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 8 tanks, 33 armored combat vehicles, 34 artillery systems, 89 operational-tactical UAVs, 86 cruise missiles, 86 vehicles and 3 units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: The results of the Security Cooperation Forum: who ignored the hysteria of the Russian Federation
Description: The FBS is the OSCE's main platform for arms control, as well as disarmament, confidence-building and security measures, on the basis of which it cooperates for stability in the Euro-Atlantic and Eurasian regions. Russia tried to disrupt this meeting even before it began. In particular, during the adoption of the agenda, the Russian delegation stated that there was no consensus regarding the proposed project. In their statement, the Russians demanded from Denmark: The Russian delegation also demanded to immediately start consultations between the Russian Federation and Denmark with the involvement of -third parties-, in particular Malta and the OSCE Secretariat. In response to Russia's actions, the presiding country resolutely confirmed its position on the impossibility of blocking the agenda, which contains only minimal items (-General statements- and -Other-). The Danish side also rejected accusations of abuse of power. Only Belarus supported the Russian demands, and the delegations of the EU, Ireland, Sweden, the USA, Switzerland, Romania, Croatia, Ukraine, Poland, Latvia, France, Great Britain and Georgia expressed their full support for the Danish approach and called for the continuation of the meeting. All this theater was organized to disrupt the performance of Ukraine at the FBS. But our delegation, headed by T.V.O. the permanent representative of Ukraine to international organizations in Vienna, Victoria Kuvshinnikova, who initiated consideration of the issue of the ongoing Russian aggressive war against Ukraine, nevertheless gave her speech on this occasion. -Ukraine, Europe and the whole world need a comprehensive, just and durable peace. Ukraine, as the main victim of Russian aggression, wants an end to this war more than any other country. But this must be real peace, not appeasement of the aggressor. Ukraine is open to diplomacy, but from an honest, strong position. That is why we have the Peace Formula - it is a guarantee of negotiations without forcing Ukraine to commit injustice. Ukrainians deserve a just peace and we must do everything to end the war next year. Unfortunately, the Russian Federation continues to reject all peace initiatives aimed at restoring justice in accordance with the norms and principles of international law. The criminal regime in the Kremlin still believes that it can achieve victory and change the international order according to its own vision. However, despite repeated claims that Russia has one of the most powerful armies in the world, it is still far from military success even after 1,000 days of intense fighting against a country 28 times smaller in size and almost four times smaller in population.- — said the representative of Ukraine. She also emphasized that the successes of the Russian army are based only on a complete disregard for the rules of warfare and a huge amount of -cannon fodder-. Therefore, the Russian army can be defeated, and the international order can be restored. This goal can be achieved only under the condition that all peace-loving states join forces to force the Russian Federation to end the war and recognize its responsibility for the crimes committed. Statements were also made by Great Britain and the EU, and statements by the United States and Canada were distributed in writing. Thus, for the second time, the Danish chairmanship of the FBS decided to ignore Russia's demands and limited the Russian delegation's ability to speak at the Forum. Such a position, in the opinion of the Embassy of Ukraine, corresponds to the interests of our state, since the actions of the chairmanship emphasize Russia's isolation and the weakness of the aggressor's position in the OSCE arena. In addition, the Danish reaction to Russia's actions caused significant damage to the image of the Russian Federation, emphasizing the destructive nature of its actions and the illegality of its demands.

Title: Forged documents for almost half a thousand evaders: a man was exposed who made false orders of the ...
Description: About this informsNovember 29 State Bureau of Investigation. It is noted that the intruder, having access to the orders of the Ministry of Economy, according to which decisions were made regarding the reservation of conscripts, made fake extracts from the relevant orders. -He provided them with unreliable information that these citizens allegedly work for various critical infrastructure enterprises and are subject to a 6-month deferment from being called up for military service during mobilization,- the report said. In addition, he produced forged documents regarding the belonging of this or that enterprise to the category of critical importance for the functioning of the economy and ensuring the livelihood of the population in a special period, as well as regarding the reservation of their employees. It was established that documents related to employees of 12 enterprises, in total, related to 454 citizens, were forged. Depending on the complexity, the -service- cost between $200 and $2,000. The documents produced by the attacker were used during the verification of military registration documents of citizens, were entered into the Unified State Register of conscripts, conscripts and reservists, and were also used when crossing the state border of Ukraine. Such machinations harmed the legitimate activities of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and other military formations during martial law. Law enforcement officers conducted 20 searches, during which computers, media, forged documents and lists of persons who used the illegal scheme were seized. The leading engineer was informed of the suspicion of obstructing the legal activities of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and other military formations (Part 1, Article 114-1 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). A petition was submitted regarding the selection of a preventive measure in the form of detention. Investigative actions are currently underway to identify other citizens and legal entities whose documents were forged. The possible involvement in illegal actions of other persons, in particular officials of ministries, RTCC and SP, is also being checked. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: He put his love for defenders on the altar: Stepan Giga thanked the Defense Forces
Description: About informs DPSU. In particular, the artist thanked the border guards for their selfless service and heroism in protecting the country. -Thank you for Ukraine!- said the singer from the stage. Stepan Giga, People's Artist of Ukraine, is one of the most popular performers in the country. His songs, which have become real hits, find a response among both the youth and the older generation, collecting millions of listens on streaming platforms. As reported by ArmyInform, the border guard of the Lviv detachment became the hero of Nicholas Karma's column -How much is Look worth-.

Title: The occupiers lead a cockroach lifestyle: the Russians turn cities into wasteland and do not think o...
Description: About this told on the broadcast of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- Lieutenant Colonel Nazar Voloshyn, spokesman of the Khortytsia operational-strategic troop grouping. According to Nazar Voloshyn, Russian propagandists tell the locals after the occupation that life will soon be restored in the devastated cities. But in fact, the Russian army uses all the captured infrastructure for further hostilities. -They are scattered over destroyed buildings, shelters, crevices. They lead a so-called cockroach lifestyle. First of all, high-rise buildings are used as observation posts - they install communication antennas and various types of transmitters. They use administrative buildings, schools, kindergartens, that is, everything that survived. First of all, as a shelter,- said Nazar Voloshyn. Previously ArmyInform reported that in ten days 50 occupiers raised a white flag: the Russians are fleeing from the killer commanders, despite the fear of capture.

Title: And he put his love for the Defense Forces on the altar: Stepan Giga thanked the defenders
Description: About informs DPSU. In particular, the artist thanked the border guards for their selfless service and heroism in protecting the country. -Thank you for Ukraine!- said the singer from the stage. Stepan Giga, People's Artist of Ukraine, is one of the most popular performers in the country. His songs, which have become real hits, find a response among both the youth and the older generation, collecting millions of listens on streaming platforms. As reported by ArmyInform, the border guard of the Lviv detachment became the hero of Nicholas Karma's column -How much is Look worth-.

Title: President: War and children are two realities that should not exist side by side
Description: He wrote about this in his Telegram channel. -Unfortunately, in today's world there are those who choose war over development, destruction over concern for future generations. Violation of children's rights has become the most painful aspect of this war,- the head of state said. Despite all the difficulties - power outages and massive attacks - Ukrainian children continue to study, showing incredible resilience. The President expressed his gratitude to parents, teachers and everyone who supports children in this difficult time. -We are proud of our children. Their perseverance and strength of spirit is an example for all of us,- emphasized Volodymyr Zelensky. As reported by ArmyInform, in one of the districts of Kyiv, an unmanned aerial vehicle fell on an open area near a two-story building of a children's polyclinic, causing significant damage.

Title: They encouraged cooperation with the Russians and persecuted patriots: four traitors were convicted
Description: About informsNovember 29 State Bureau of Investigation. Among the traitors is a former law enforcement officer from the village of Shevchenkove, Kharkiv region, who during the temporary occupation of the settlement provided information to the occupying authorities in writing about local ATO participants and law enforcement officers. First, he was appointed a precinct inspector in the so-called people's militia, then he was promoted to an authorized criminal investigation group. For his work, he received 45,000 from the occupiers. rubles every month. -He -earned- money by patrolling the streets and detaining local patriots. During the liberation of the region, the man fled to Russia. He was found guilty of treason,- the message reads. A former law enforcement officer from Yakymivka, Zaporizhzhia region was also found guilty of treason. In April-March 2022, the man voluntarily joined the ranks of the -people's militia-. The defector carried out -patrols-, searched for and delivered to the illegally created -law enforcement body- persons who did not support the occupiers, and encouraged colleagues and local residents to cooperate with the Russians. A resident of Kherson, who got a job at the so-called expert forensic center of the occupation police in the captured city, received 15 years with confiscation of property, also by court decision. The woman started working for the occupiers in July 2022. She studied in Moscow and held the position of -expert of the physical and chemical research department of the Ministry of Interior of the Kherson region.- After the liberation of the city, the collaborator escaped with the Russians. A former law enforcement officer from Kherson was also found guilty. After the capture of the city by the Russians, he voluntarily went to them and joined the -thunder- punitive squad. This unit was created by the invaders to persecute Ukrainians in the occupied territories. The defector carried out the criminal orders of the invaders, defended the Russian authorities in the temporarily occupied territories of Ukraine. After the liberation of the city, he fled with the occupiers. The public prosecution in court was supported by the Zaporizhia, Kharkiv, Kherson and Chernihiv regional prosecutor's offices. As reported by ArmyInform, DBR employees in cooperation with the State Border Service reported the suspicion to the capital's law enforcement officer, who do-ugorshhyny-cholovikiv-pryzovnogo-viku/-> crossed across the border of men of conscription age.

Title: Provocative videos on TikTok and the heroization of Putin: the SBU exposed yet another supporter of ...
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. A 51-year-old blogger who was previously convicted for spreading Kremlin propaganda was detained in Kyiv. During his probationary period, he again began posting provocative videos on TikTok, praising the leadership of the Russian Federation and justifying the war. In Kharkiv, a local resident who spread fakes about the Ukrainian military in pro-Russian Telegram channels, justified rocket attacks on the city and called for the occupation of the region was suspected. Three women were detained in Donetsk region, who used the banned Odnoklassniki and VKontakte social networks to heroize Putin and the leaders of terrorist groups. During the searches, mobile phones and equipment with evidence of their subversive activities were seized from the detainees. Operational actions were carried out by SBU employees in cooperation with the prosecutor's offices of Kyiv, Kharkiv and Donetsk regions. As reported by ArmyInform, SBU detained Mykolayivskogo -babaya-, who filmed Ukrainian positions from the attic.

Title: Military units will be able to report substandard products in the DOT-Chain IT system
Description: About this informs The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. It is noted that this will allow to significantly reduce the time of formation and processing of such complaints, and, most importantly, to further improve the level of food supply to the Armed Forces. -Previously, the procedure took place exclusively in paper form, which required a lot of time and effort from military units and DOT. Now DOT-Chain automatically pulls up information from the order, so the military unit only needs to add data about low-quality goods,- Deputy Minister of Defense Dmytro Klimenkov emphasized. According to him, the system forms an electronic document, reducing the time of working on complaints by 2-3 times. Currently, in addition to convenience, the new functionality makes the process much more transparent. After all, thanks to the structuring of information and quick analysis, the system helps to detect abuse by unscrupulous suppliers, which significantly increases the overall efficiency of work. The MOU emphasized that DOT continues to work on further expansion of functionality. As early as next year, the system will be able to submit complaints about completeness and delivery times electronically. As reported by ArmyInform, a quarter of the Armed Forces support the introduction of inclusive dry rations.

Title: At the TOT of Luhansk Oblast, the occupiers are terrorizing the population: even a Russian passport ...
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysohor, the head of the Luhansk Regional Military Administration. It is noted that repressive measures do not depend on the presence or absence of Russian passports of local residents. People are accused of working for the Ukrainian special services, participating in terrorist organizations, inciting hatred, or failing to report so-called crimes under Russian law. Especially vulnerable are those who remain in the occupied territories, where the majority of the population does not have access to the Internet and cannot follow the constant changes in Russian laws. Over the past two months, 68 criminal proceedings on such charges have been opened in Luhansk region. These measures have become a tool for Russian security forces, who are trying to demonstrate their effectiveness while ignoring human lives. Simultaneously with the repressions, the occupiers continue to militarize the youth. In Luhansk, the Russian military is actively instilling in the young generation loyalty to the occupation authorities and hatred of Ukraine. Thus, recently the students of the Luhansk economic and legal lyceum-boarding school named after the heroes of the -Young Guard- were awarded the rank of vice sergeants after taking an oath of loyalty to Russia. The ceremony took place in the local history museum, decorated according to the canons of Kremlin propaganda. The situation in the region remains tense due to the constant escalation of repression and military militarization aimed at forming a generation that supports the occupation regime. As reported by ArmyInform, Novodruzhesk and Pryvilya, located near Lysychansk, -mistah-okupovanyh-terytorij/->actually neglected by the Russian occupying forces.

Title: The bodies of 502 fallen Ukrainian Defenders were returned to the controlled territory
Description: This was reported by on November 29 Coordinating Headquarters for the Treatment of Prisoners of War. From the number of returned fallen Defenders of Ukraine: It is noted that together with expert institutions, the identities of the dead will be established as soon as possible. The fallen Defenders of Ukraine were brought back as a result of the joint work of many structures of the Security and Defense Sector of Ukraine. -We are grateful for the assistance of the International Committee of the Red Cross. A special thanks to the personnel of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, who carry out the transportation of repatriated fallen Heroes to certain state specialized institutions, organize the transfer of the dead to representatives of law enforcement agencies and forensic medical examination,- the message reads. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy intensified attempts to influence the relatives of prisoners of war and under the time of personal communication provokes destructive actions and crimes.

Title: Oleksandr Syrskyi visited units in the Donetsk, Pokrovsky and Kurakhiv directions
Description: He informs about this on November 29 in social networks. According to him, based on the results of the work, all the necessary decisions have been made to strengthen the units with reserves, additional ammunition, weapons and military equipment. Oleksandr Syrsky noted that we continue to restrain the enemy and inflict heavy losses on manpower and equipment. -The steadfastness and courage of our defenders break the enemy's plans that go far beyond these directions. I am grateful to our soldiers for their steadfastness and bravery in the fight against the Russian aggressor,- he emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine General Oleksandr Syrsky honored with awards military personnel of 38 separate brigades of marines and 503 separate marine infantry battalion.

Title: Massive strikes in the Kherson region: there are victims
Description: This reported the head of the Kherson OVA Oleksandr Prokudin. Unfortunately, as a result of the explosion, she received fatal injuries. The woman died on the spot. According to the head of the OVA, Russian troops launched a missile attack on the Berislavsky district. -Currently, we know of one victim: a 59-year-old woman received a landmine-explosive injury and a shrapnel injury to her leg,- the message reads. The victim was taken to the hospital. Doctors assess her condition as moderate. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kherson region as a result of Russian shelling last day one person died, nine more were injured.

Title: The Chancellor of Germany told the President of Ukraine the details of his call to Putin
Description: He wrote about this on social networks on November 29. -I am grateful to the chancellor for his willingness to continue to support Ukraine, in particular our defense against Russian aggression and our stability. We discussed which of our bilateral steps and the steps of our partners can strengthen Ukraine,- the head of state said. According to him, it is important that the pressure on Russia increases and that Ukrainian positions become stronger, because this will force Russia towards real peace. -The Chancellor of Germany spoke about the details of his call to Putin. It is obvious that only the force of arms and the force of diplomacy together can force the perpetrator of the war to peace, and that peace is possible only through force,- the President of Ukraine said. As reported by ArmyInform, the Kremlin dictator Volodymyr Putin is trying in every way -trampa/-> to frustrate efforts to end the war, which is why he resorted to striking a new ballistic missile. It will be recalled that on November 21, the Russians hit the Dnipro with a new medium-range ballistic missile based on the older Rubezh ICBM, which is a potential carrier of a nuclear warhead. GUR IOU reported that Russia struck by using a ballistic missile vdaryla-po-dnipru/->probably from the -Kedr- missile complex.

Title: Practically wiped off the face of the earth: the frontline villages of Luhansk region suffer from da...
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysohor, the head of the Luhansk Regional Military Administration. Only in the last day, the enemy used artillery 15 times and launched 28 drones in the direction of Ukrainian positions. In addition, the enemy tried to carry out offensive actions in the districts of Raihorodka, Grekivka and Tverdokhlibovo. The situation in the Luhansk region remains tense, the population centers of the region are subject to significant destruction due to continuous hostilities. As reported by ArmyInform, artillery and KAB the enemy attacked Sumyshchyna, there is destruction and wounded.

Title: The enemy, that is, Putin, is in a hurry: in the Pokrovsky direction, the intensity of offensive act...
Description: Serhii Tsehotskyi, officer 59, told about this on the air of -Social News-. of a separate mechanized brigade named after Yakov Handziuk. According to Serhii Tsehotskyi, the fact that 249 occupiers were killed or wounded in the past day alone shows the intensity of the fighting. Losses of the Russian infantry are really crazy. -In some areas, up to 30 people go out, but in most cases, it's a movement of 3-4 people at night. They try to go through some forest strip there, get a foothold somewhere, then accumulate and move on. Our task is to spot them far from the line of battle and inflict fire damage,- said Serhii Tsehotskyi. As reported by /a> ArmyInform, in the Pokrovsky direction, more than a hundred attack aircraft are eliminated every day at the positions of only one brigade.

Title: The Ministry of Defense allowed the use of JCB HMEE excavators in the military
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informs about this. The JCB HMEE excavator (High Mobility Engineer Excavator) is an armored special vehicle designed to perform a wide range of tasks. -JCB HMEE excavators have proven themselves well during the performance of special works in difficult conditions and are in service with many advanced armies of the world,- said Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. JCB HMEE weighs about 16 tons. Develops a speed of up to 100 km/h, provides full crew protection, compatible with STANAG standards for damage protection. Its four-wheel drive system, control of all four wheels, locking differentials ensure high performance on off-road. Suspension and brakes specially reinforced for military needs ensure controlled and safe operation. The cabin of the armored excavator is ergonomically designed for maximum operator productivity, equipped with air conditioning. The agency reminded that manufacturers and developers of samples of weapons and military equipment who have questions about the codification process can contact the Main Directorate for Life Cycle Support of Weapons and Military Equipment by e-mail: mdalc@mil.ua. As reported by ArmyInform, Ministry of Defense codified and put into operation domestic armored personnel carrier.

Title: The SBU detained a man from Mykolaiv who was filming Ukrainian positions from the attic
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. The attacker organized an observation post in the attic of a high-rise building, where he installed a hidden video camera. With her help, the agent tried to record the location of Ukrainian air defense systems, combat positions and the movement of weapons of the Defense Forces. Its purpose was to transmit data to circumvent Ukrainian air defense systems. The SBU documented the attacker's activities and detained him at his place of residence. During the searches, a mobile phone, a video camera and media containing evidence of his cooperation with the Russian special services were seized. According to the investigation, the FSB agent was recruited because of the anti-Ukrainian comments he left on Russian Telegram channels. Further communication with the curator was carried out through an intermediary from the occupied part of Donetsk region. Suspicion was announced to the intruder for h. 2 Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason under martial law). He is currently in custody, facing life in prison with forfeiture of assets. As reported by ArmyInform, on In Kharkiv Oblast, a very greedy schoolboy has a chance to face eternity in prison.

Title: Another day of heavy strikes in Donetsk region: significant destruction and injuries in the region
Description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. In the Pokrovsky district in the city of Kurakhove, two people were injured, seven houses were damaged in the village of Uspenivka, and four in Hannivka. In Pokrovsk, two houses were destroyed, another ten were damaged. Damage to one house was recorded in Rivne of the Myrnograd community. In Kramatorsk district, the village of Zarichne of Lymanska hromada suffered damage to two houses, and in Kostyantynivka shelling damaged eight private houses. In Bakhmut District shelling affected the Chasovoyarsk community, where six private houses, a high-rise building and a non-residential building were damaged. Four houses were destroyed in Siversk, and one person was injured and two houses were damaged in Toretsk. Over the past 24 hours, Russian troops have carried out eight attacks on populated areas of Donetsk region. 159 people, including 17 children, were evacuated from the front line. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of November 29 Russian troops carried out a mass attack with kamikaze drones in Odesa. As a result of the strikes, private houses, farm buildings and cars were damaged in the Odessa region.

Title: The infantry has to walk many kilometers, almost from the border: in the Kharkiv region, the occupie...
Description: A representative of the public relations service of the -Charter- brigade told - Sergeant Volodymyr Degtyarev of the National Guard of Ukraine. Drones, according to Volodymyr Degtyarev, contributed a lot to the fact that month after month the -Charter- brigade pushes the enemy from Kharkiv towards the border. -Infantry has to go many kilometers away, almost from the border, on foot. Because most of the airspace is controlled by our drone operators and related units. Therefore, very little equipment is used on their part,- said the representative of the public relations service of the -Charter- brigade. As reported ArmyInform, in the north of the Kharkiv region, in the Liptsi district, Ukrainian troops are fixed in new, conquered positions.

Title: The enemy attacked Sumy Oblast with artillery and anti-aircraft guns, causing destruction and wounde...
Description: informs Sumy OVA about this. Velikopysariv community: the enemy fired artillery, 4 explosions were recorded. Khotinsk community: a Russian plane struck with air bombs of the KAB type (3 explosions). 10 private residential buildings were damaged, an outbuilding was destroyed. Esmansk community: one KAB airstrike damaged an apartment building. As a result of the attack, a civilian was injured. However, air defense units of the Sumy Oblast shot down 6 enemy drones of the Shahed type today. The situation remains tense, rescue services are working at the sites of shelling to eliminate the consequences. As reported by ArmyInform, the army of the Russian Federation from -Gradiv- and Nikopol was shelled by drones.

Title: Environmental safety: The Ministry of Defense is working on new standards for landfills
Description: This was reported by the head of the environmental security department, Colonel Yuriy Sytnyk, during the 27th meeting of the working group NATO Environmental Protection Group (EPWG) in Brussels. The first standard, entitled -Best Environmental Protection Practices for the Rational Use of Military Training Ranges-, will define environmental requirements for basic military training. The second standard - -Ensuring environmental safety of troops (forces) in military field camps- - will be aimed at minimizing the environmental consequences of the operation of military camps. Both documents are currently in the stage of approval of the second edition. Their implementation will help not only to reduce environmental damage caused by the war, but also to strengthen Ukraine's cooperation with NATO countries. We will remind that before the beginning of the large-scale invasion of Russia, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine had already developed four military environmental standards according to the requirements of the Alliance. Now some of them need to be updated taking into account the realities of the war. As reported by ArmyInform, demining and port protection: Ukraine and Denmark strengthen naval cooperation.

Title: And again the Russian oil base: the Armed Forces entertained the residents of the Rostov region with...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. It should be noted that in the summer of this year, the specified oil depot was already attacked by the Defense Forces. -Atlas- is a part of the Russian military-industrial complex, which provides the supply of oil products for the army of the Russian Federation. In addition, as part of the task of detecting and eliminating the enemy's anti-aircraft defenses, the radar station of the Buk-M3 anti-aircraft missile system of the Russian invaders was destroyed. The target was located in the temporarily occupied territory of the Zaporizhzhia region. The tasks were carried out by units of the Unmanned Systems Forces, Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine in cooperation with other components of the Defense Forces. Joint combat work on important military targets of the Russian occupiers continues.

Title: The enemy has set himself the task of entering the Zaporozhye-Donetsk highway: the occupiers seek to...
Description: Dmytro with the call sign -Dynamo-, an officer of the 148th separate artillery brigade of the Zhytomyr DSHV of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, told about this on the air of the Yedyni Novyni telethon. According to Dynamo, the enemy wants to -make it impossible- for Ukrainian logistics on the Kurakhiv and Vremiv directions. That is why it is so hot there now - the invaders use aviation and heavy armored vehicles and do not count losses. -Where the enemy does not manage to advance on armored vehicles, he uses infantry groups on motorcycles, buggies. It seems that this resource simply does not run out. However, every meter of Ukrainian land is given to him with incredible losses,- Dynamo said. As reported ArmyInform, the operation of the Ukrainian army continues in the Kursk region of the Russian Federation - now the defenders repulse the attacks of the enemy who attacks with columns of armored vehicles.

Title: Odesa is on fire: the consequences of an attack by drones on residential areas
Description: This was reported by the Prosecutor General's Office. Seven civilians were injured and suffered acute stress reactions. In addition, enemy attacks damaged the port and transport infrastructure of the region. An inspection of the damaged objects is currently underway, and the scale of the destruction is being clarified. Prosecutors, together with law enforcement officers, are documenting the consequences of the attack, and the investigation is being conducted by investigators of the SBU Office in the Odesa region. It is noted that this is another mass attack directed against civilians and critical infrastructure in the region. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kherson region as a result of Russian shelling last day one person died, nine more were injured.

Title: And the snow didn't help: three cunning tourists left too many traces
Description: About this informs State border service of Ukraine. After a chase, with the help of a service dog, the offenders were apprehended near the border. The detainees turned out to be three residents of the Poltava region who decided to take advantage of the difficult weather conditions to avoid the attention of the border guards. Now the men will have to answer for their actions in accordance with Part 2 of Article 204-1 of the Code of Ukraine on Administrative Offenses. This case once again confirms the importance of constant control at the state border, even in adverse weather conditions. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Tragic consequences of shelling in Kherson region: one dead and nine wounded
Description: This was reported by the head of Kherson OVA Oleksandr Prokudin. Last day, Antonivka, Prydniprovske, Bilozerka, Komyshany, Sadov, Romashkov, Tomyna Balka, Stanislav, Berislav, Shlyakhov, Zolota Balka, Monastyrske, Novovorontsovka, Odradokamyanka and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes. According to the head of the OVA, the Russian military attacked the residential quarters of the populated areas of the region, in particular damaged 7 private houses and an administrative building. The occupiers also mutilated a generator, buses and private cars. As reported by ArmyInform, over the course of a day, the occupiers struck 350 attacks on 8 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: Conference of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and OVA: the focus is on the supply o...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The specified meeting, in the format of a video conference, was devoted to the issues of synchronizing the actions of local authorities in support of units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In particular, during the meeting, the possibility of supplying combat units of the Defense Forces of Ukraine with a wide range of UAVs was discussed. Such measures make it possible to quickly and effectively respond to the urgent needs of units in the most difficult areas of the front. As reported by ArmyInform, soldiers of the unit - -Kryla-, which is part of the active operations department of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine's GUR, detected and struck the radar complex of the Russian occupiers -Zoo-.

Title: - Everything is great - meat assaults and convoys of equipment suit us-: in Kurshchyna, the marines ...
Description: About this on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novy- Aeneas, spokesperson 36 of a separate marine infantry brigade named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Bilinskyi. According to Aeneas, meat assaults on the Russians are always a priority. But the basis of the tactics of the occupiers in Kurshchyna remains unchanged — attacks with a large amount of equipment, tanks, BRDM and BMP. -Everything is great! In principle, this suits us. When there are many of them and they are together, it is a little easier to deal with them. The 155th brigade stood against us, but now it was a little -tired- and Russian airborne troops entered. Their tactics -on ATVs and motorcycles- are even more cool than armored vehicles,- said the spokesman of the 36th separate marine infantry brigade. As reported by ArmyInform , soldiers of the Special Operations Forces during special operations in the Kursk direction inflicted significant losses in manpower to the enemy.

Title: Our anti-aircraft defense liquidated 88 Russian Shaheds
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Aviation, anti-aircraft missile units, electronic warfare equipment and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine were involved in repelling the attack. As of 09:00, air defense shot down 88 enemy drones in Kyiv, Chernihiv, Cherkasy, Sumy, Kharkiv, Poltava, Zhytomyr, Dnipropetrovsk, Zaporizhia, and Odesa regions. It is noted that 41 UAVs were lost in location, presumably due to the active anti-aircraft defense of the Defense Forces, 1 drone returned to Russia. As a result of the Russian attack, infrastructure, cars, private and multi-apartment buildings were damaged in several regions of Ukraine, and the victims are being provided with assistance. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Air Force The Armed Forces showed a missile shot down in the center of Ukraine.

Title: Aviation of the Defense Forces struck a concentration of enemy personnel
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. However, the Defense Forces of Ukraine continue to conduct operations in the Kursk region. According to the available information, the enemy carried out 19 airstrikes using 30 guided air bombs on its territory over the past day. Yesterday, aviation, missile forces and artillery of the Defense Forces carried out nine strikes on the areas of concentration of personnel and anti-aircraft defenses of the enemy. We will remind, last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 2030 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 8 tanks, 33 armored combat vehicles, 34 artillery systems, 89 UAVs of operational-tactical level, 86 cruise missiles, 86 vehicles and 3 units of special equipment of the occupiers. As reported by ArmyInform, The defense forces stopped 207 Russian assaults, half of which were in two directions.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: The Russian army from Grady and drones bombarded Nikopol
Description: reported this by the head of Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Serhiy Lysak. Yesterday evening, Russian troops struck the Nikopol district with the Grad anti-aircraft missile system. According to preliminary information, there were no casualties or injuries. No enemy attacks were recorded on the territory of the region during the night. This morning, the aggressor attacked Nikopol with a kamikaze drone. The consequences of the impact are currently being clarified. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day of November 28, the Russian army attacked Nikopolshchyna — district center, Pokrovsk, Mirivska, Marganetska, Chervonogrigorivska communities.

Title: The occupiers are in trouble, the GUR throws up its hands: the Russians are left without -Zoopark-
Description: This is reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The cost of such a complex is roughly 1 billion hryvnias. Title: The defense forces stopped 207 Russian assaults, half of which were in two directions
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. In addition, it carried out more than 4,800 attacks, including 126 from multiple rocket launchers, and used more than 1,700 kamikaze drones for damage. The enemy attacked the areas of the settlements of Oleksandria and Esman of the Sumy region with means of bombing and attack aircraft. 12 combat clashes took place in the Kharkiv direction. The fighting took place in the areas of the settlements of Vovchansk, Tykh and Hlyboke. In addition, enemy aircraft struck the settlements of Liptsi and Neskuchne, dropping 4 guided aerial bombs. In the Kupyansk direction, the number of combat clashes per day reached 25. The defense forces repelled attacks in the areas of Figolivka, Kolisnykyvka, Zagryzovo, Golubivka, Kindrashivka, Zeleny Gayu, Raigorodka, Lozova, and Kruglyakivka. The enemy carried out an airstrike with three air defense systems on the settlement of Kupyansk. In the Lyman direction, our troops stopped six enemy attacks in Tverdokhlibovo, Grekivka, Pershotravnevo, Torsky, Yampolivka, and Terni districts. The areas of Ivanovka and Serebryansky Forest were hit by attack and bomber aircraft. In the Seversky direction, the enemy carried out airstrikes with three air defense systems in the Zakitny region. No sign of the formation of offensive groups of the Russian occupiers was detected. We will remind, last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 2030 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 8 tanks, 33 armored combat vehicles, 34 artillery systems, 89 UAVs of operational-tactical level, 86 cruise missiles, 86 vehicles and 3 units of special equipment of the occupiers.
