The headquarters of the TPP and National Emergency were assembled to eliminate the consequences of the enemy attack. The fire has already been extinguished. All relevant services are working to restore heat, water and electricity supply as soon as possible. -We are putting into operation additional unbreakable points, where there will be light, internet and heat,- added the head of OVA. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russian troops > struck Kharkiv Oblast, causing damage to infrastructure and the death of civilians.

Title: The water is rising in a unique area: in the north of Kharkiv Oblast, defenders are resisting the oc...
Description: The commander of the UAV platoon of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the Kosh Ataman spoke about this on the broadcast of the -Edyny Novyni- telethon Ivan Sirka with the call sign -Cat-. — With the deterioration of weather conditions, the situation became more complicated, the enemy has now pulled up reserves, active assault actions have been renewed. The enemy is advancing in small groups of infantry, in this they are stable, nothing changes. Heavy armored vehicles are not applicable, he said. The military explained what makes the area in the Liptsi district unique. — This location is unique in that we have a forest-steppe zone intersected with the SMT development of a small urban-type village. The reservoir adds its uniqueness — it is small, located in a lowland, and makes very [significant] corrections, the drone commander said. The high water level makes it difficult for the Ukrainian military to stay at their positions and carry out logistics. - Now everything is complicated by the fact that we are facing not only the enemy, but also weather and natural phenomena. It is because of this reservoir that the water is rising now, and in our positions it makes it very difficult for our maximally coordinated movement actions, and in general, the presence of personnel directly in these lowlands. The situation is very difficult and the water level is very high, - said the defender. He assured that the Ukrainian military knows how to solve the mentioned problems, because this is not their first military winter, and they respond promptly and professionally to challenges from nature. Voyyskovyi also explained the significance of Liptsi for the defense of Kharkiv. — As for Liptsi, their geographical position is a very strategic settlement, on its outskirts there are operational heights that, if God forbid, will be lost, then this will give a direct view of the city of Kharkiv itself and the approaches to it. This will make our logistics very difficult. If the enemy starts to use direct strikes with artillery systems, it will be very difficult for us to move, to store our ammunition, - explained the fighter with the call sign -Cat-. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Kharkiv Oblast the enemy is -covered- by fog, but artificial intelligence helps to detect it, the -Charter- brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine carried out a successful offensive and is entrenched in new positions.

Title: Rocket attack on Kharkiv: industrial buildings were destroyed and residential buildings were damaged
Description: reported the head of Kharkiv OVA Oleg Synegubov about this. Today, as a result of a rocket attack on Kharkiv, the production buildings of the enterprise and the glazing of the windows of a multi-storey residential building were damaged. According to the head of the OVA, yesterday in the village of Bily Kolodyaz, an FPV drone hit a T-150 tractor that was in a field. Two men, aged 38 and 42, died as a result of the impact, and three more - aged 39, 44 and 61 - were injured. In addition, an FPV drone with a fuse fell in the city of Kupyansk, but did not detonate. A car was also damaged as a result of dropping ammunition from the drone. As Oleg Synegubov noted, two private houses were damaged as a result of the fire by FPV drones. In response to the threat of shelling, 121 people were evacuated from Kupyansk and Borivsk directions. As reported by ArmyInform, pieces of rockets fell in Kyiv on enterprise: there is damage.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine

Title: Very accurate, very strong, very bright - powerful bomb attacks on the enemy in the South
Description: Mykola Kolesnyk, commander of the 422nd Luftwaffe unmanned systems battalion of the Unmanned Systems Forces, told on the Army TV stream. -Weather conditions do not allow us to use our capacity in full force. This is reconnaissance, corrections, the task of striking deep into the enemy to beat his logistics... We will wait for the sun, and then we will see. He showed a video of the strikes of our aviation, when the enemy's command posts and command and observation posts were destroyed with high-precision bombs. In the last weather, we participated in the confirmation of these strikes. Very accurate, very strong, very bright, and most importantly - effective,- noted Mykola Kolesnyk. According to him, the tactics of enemy assaults have not changed. -We are working on a technique that throws the infantry closer to our positions. There they hide in holes and then try to storm our infantry. So the main task is to prevent them from accumulating and conducting active assault actions,- said Mykola Kolisnyk. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the 114th tactical aviation brigade interacted with the drones of the 422nd battalion of unmanned systems of the SBS of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces strike on places where equipment is stored and shelters of the occupiers on one of the operational directions.

Title: The Armed Forces of Ukraine repelled 157 Russian attacks: the enemy is aggressively advancing in the...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. In addition, it carried out almost 4,800 attacks, of which 154 were from anti-aircraft guns, and used 1,672 kamikaze drones for strikes. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of Ivanivka, Torske, Vasyukivka, Nikiforivka, Markove, Toretsk, Panteleimonivka, Myrolyubivka, Velyka Novosilka, Novosilka, Stupochki, Dovga Balka and Minkivka. In the areas of the settlements of Vovchansk and Tyche on the Kharkiv direction, over the past day, there have been five enemy assaults on the positions of our defenders. 17 attacks by occupiers were recorded in the Kupyansk direction. The defense forces repulsed offensive actions near Kolisnikivka, Zagryzovy, Zeleny Gay and Kruglyakivka. The enemy attacked four times in the Lyman direction. The main offensive efforts of the enemy were concentrated in the districts of Grekivka, Novoehorivka, and Torsky. In the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked once in the Bila Hora area. On the Toretsk direction the enemy made six attacks near Toretsk, while the enemy actively used bomber aircraft, dropping up to ten guided bombs. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 37 offensive actions of the aggressor near Myrolyubivka, Promen, Lysivka, Dachensky, Zhovto and Chumatsky. On the Kurakhiv direction, the defense forces repelled 39 attacks. The main efforts of the enemy were concentrated in Sontsivka, Berestki, Kurakhovo, Dalnyi, Elizavetivka, Antonivka and Hanivka districts. With the support of aviation in the Vremivsk direction, the enemy carried out 18 attacks on our positions near Trudovoy, Kostyantynopolsky, Rozlyv, Rozdolny, Suhy Yali and Novodarivka. In the Dnieper direction Russian invaders attacked our positions six times. They were fiercely repulsed and suffered losses. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. An operation is underway in the Kursk region, where during the day Ukrainian defenders repelled 18 attacks by invaders. It will be recalled that the Russian invaders lost 1,220 people last day. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed a tank, two armored fighting vehicles, 22 artillery systems, 45 UAVs of the operational-tactical level, 60 vehicles and 10 units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: After that, an incendiary munition flies into the enemy's trench - our attack aircraft repel attacks...

Movement is no longer observed. -Near Novogrodivka, Russians die in whole groups, but they continue their attempts to climb the -Rock-. However, as always, it ends with sure death for the occupiers. It seems that the enemy finally realized that hiding from the eyes of the -Rock- is a waste of time, so we show you another cut of the destruction of the occupiers in the open area near Pokrovsk,- the battalion commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 425th assault battalion -Skala- shkolu/-> threw thermobaric grenades into the dugout with the occupants, having completed the work that is now usually assigned drones

Title: The fiercest battles continue in the Pokrovsky direction: our soldiers are not giving up their posit...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The enemy carried out 11 airstrikes on the territory of Ukraine, shooting down 22 anti-aircraft missiles, and used 648 kamikaze drones to destroy them. He carried out almost 4,000 attacks on the positions of our troops and population centers. On the Kharkiv direction, the enemy attacked five times near Vovchansk and Tikhoi. One battle is still going on. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy tried to advance to our positions near Kolisnykyvka, Zagryzovy, Zeleny Gay and Kruglyakivka 17 times during the day. All enemy attacks were repelled by the Defense Forces. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked four times in the Grekivka, Novoyehorivka, and Torsky areas. Our soldiers stopped all the enemy's efforts. In addition, the occupiers' aviation carried out anti-aircraft missile strikes on Ivanovka and Torsk. In the Kramatorsk direction the enemy was active in the area of ​​White Mountain. Ukrainian units repelled one assault of the invaders. Vasyukivka, Nikiforivka and Markove were hit by Russian aerial bombs. In the Toretsk direction, with the support of aviation, the enemy carried out offensive actions against the positions of our troops six times. All attacks were repelled by Ukrainian soldiers. Also, the enemy tried 35 times to wedge into our defenses in the Pokrovsky direction in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Dachenske, Zhovte and Chumatske settlements. Our units repelled twenty-six attacks, the fighting continues, the enemy's losses are being verified. On the Kurakhiv direction, the enemy attacked our positions 36 times. The most active was in the Sontsivka, Berestki, Kurakhovo, Dalnyi, Elizavetivka, Antonivka and Hanivka districts, where Ukrainian defenders repelled 30 attacks, six clashes are still ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction, our troops repelled fourteen enemy attacks near Trudovo, Kostiantynopolsky, Rozlyv, Rozdolny, Suhy Yaliv, and Novodarivka, and four more clashes are still ongoing. The occupiers actively used aviation: they dropped the KAB on Novosilka, and also hit Velika Novosilka with unguided air missiles. In the Dnieper direction, the enemy does not stop trying to knock our units out of their positions, where during the day they carried out six unsuccessful assaults on the positions of Ukrainian soldiers. In Kurshchyna, Ukrainian defenders repelled 16 enemy attacks, the fighting continues. In addition, the department honored soldiers of the 38th separate brigade of marines, the 100th separate mechanized brigade, the 14th operational brigade named after Ivan Bohun of the National Guard of Ukraine and the 126th separate brigade of the Territorial Defense Forces for their effective and professional combat work. which effectively destroy the enemy, harm him significant losses in manpower and equipment. As reported by ArmyInform, soldiers of the Special Operations Forces during special operations in the Kursk direction, significant losses in manpower were inflicted on the enemy.

Title: Trump, Putin and more than 220 clashes per day: an expert explains why the front is getting even hot...
Description: Why the number of enemy assaults has increased so significantly, military expert Petro Chernyk explained to ArmiyaInform. -This is connected with major geopolitics. Putin set two clear and understandable tasks. The first task: before Trump's inauguration, seize Donetsk region at any cost, and similarly, before Trump's inauguration, knock us out of Kursk region at any cost. Does the enemy have the human potential for this? Unfortunately, there is. The total mobilization resource is within 3 million people. This is very, very much. The average figures of their conscription are somewhere in the range of up to 40,000 personnel per month. And I think that in this proportion they will continue to train themselves. Do they still have a certain margin of strength, say, in terms of armored vehicles? Let's look at the example of tanks. At the beginning of the large-scale invasion, they had 3,400 full-time vehicles, but there were still up to 10,000 in warehouses at that time, which is quite a lot. And part of the equipment we destroyed, the enemy managed to restore. Approximately the same applies to artillery. We have already destroyed more than 20,000 units. But they may still have 3,000-5,000 barrels of all calibers. However, we must understand that they cannot and will not be able to build a full-fledged artillery. The comprehensive margin of strength, which is currently calculated for the Russian Federation, is somewhere within the limits until the summer of next year. And then the real problems of both military and economic nature will begin. That is why the Russians set themselves the goal of seizing as much of our territory as possible and knocking them out of Kurshchyna. This is all we need to understand why the number of armed clashes has increased. It is extremely important for us to stay in the Kursk region until the summer, until the next cycle of dry weather. And it is extremely important that we retain Donetsk region also for the summer of next year. Then our positions in a potential conversation through intermediaries will be much stronger.-

Title: Soldier Mykhailiuk destroyed an enemy tank from an almost unreal distance. The history of the defend...
Description: In civilian life, he was a builder, a loader, in the position of foreman. Currently, he is performing combat tasks as part of the calculation of anti-tank missile systems. His comrades say that he quickly navigates in extreme situations and has already destroyed more than 10 units of enemy military equipment and weapons. ArmyImform succinctly asked soldier Mykhailiuk about his path to the Defense Forces, his participation in the war, and, therefore, the approaching victory over the enemy. — I ended up in the army at a time when the long queues at the TCC stopped, and you could come calmly to the reception. On April 18, he arrived at the TCC, passed the medical examination, and already on the 19th, he left for Desna, the soldier recalls. Next is basic military training. — I already served in the army in 2008-2009 as a conscript. Therefore, I remembered, so to speak, what was once. Passed everything I knew. Nothing new. But they taught about radio communication, special devices. Everything happened in an abbreviated form. It was not difficult for me. All in all, there was plenty. The most vivid memory during the BZVP is scary, but interesting, says the soldier. — There was rocket fire, evacuation of a military unit. I was the driver - I was there -to and from- our outermost soldier from our battery. We assumed that there could be another shelling of the military unit, but, despite all the threats, we got fuel, made several walkers, took out all the people and all the things. The military destroyed more than 10 units of enemy equipment and weapons. We ask the soldier to recall the most vivid case when he managed to work on enemy equipment. Each destroyed enemy vehicle, the military officer states, is both -greasy- and -delicious.- But in October 2023, it was -as fat and tasty as possible.- — Then it was both dangerous and most interesting to beat them. Because there were so many of them, and because of that it was easy to beat them. But we had a connection, although the Russians thought that they had jammed it for us. We were completely controlled by the company. The commander was in constant contact with us. We knew how many enemy vehicles were coming. Yes, they already came in 3 pairs of deuces, 2 pairs of deuces… And we could already work for them, since we had the calculation of -Stugna- and their trophy -Cornet-, then we had a chance to do everything right. Therefore, their -Cornet- repulsed the attack. So we knew how to destroy them more easily and quickly, and that we would not get anything for it. There was excitement, it made sense to choose (enemy equipment.— Ed.). For example, 2 tanks, 2 BMPs and a trawl drove in. We immediately had the urge to destroy the trawl so that it did not pave the way for our infantry. We didn't let them get up,'' the army man recalls. But after that, he says, the enemy launched a powerful shelling with artillery and aviation: - There was a fire, it was burning, everything was in smoke, we had to change positions. But they failed to destroy us. Each combat exit and each launch is the brightest that can be, the soldier does not hide his emotions: - Nice exit, nice hit. The most interesting thing was when we destroyed their observation post. Then we had to go through a forest strip in the Swativ district, about 5 kilometers. It was approximately three kilometers through the gray zone and 2 kilometers through the red zone. They approached them, 2 km from the enemy observation post, and destroyed it. Later, he says, there was training on enemy tanks: - They came from closed positions and constantly gave nightmares to the infantry at different times. We found an enemy tank, but we couldn't get to it, it wasn't coming any closer. So we came as close as we could to get it anyway. It was a distance of 5200 - almost unreal. He was standing far from the line of scrimmage. And we destroyed him with a javelin. It was a good shot, and the detonated tank burned to the ground. Only the sides remain, and I think it is still there. We ask whether a soldier is afraid during such combat sorties, and if so, how does he cope with this fear: - Fear is in every person. But we have harmony, the commander constantly helps us. We know where we are going, what we are doing, what awaits us. That is, there is no fear as such. But when you perform a combat mission, fear disappears altogether. Yes, when they give you a short briefing and show you what you have to do, yes, there can be some fear. And when you already get into that zone, have already entered, there is no such fear at all. The mood is always fighting - in all boys, not only in me. And what would an army officer advise civilians who, for various reasons, have not yet joined the ranks of the Defense Forces? — There is nothing to be afraid of the army: there are shelling all over the country. And the sooner recruits join the army, the better it will be for our country, and the sooner we will defeat the onslaught of the horde, says Oleksandr. The military dreams of the borders of 1991: — But initially victory is when we stop the Russians and the shelling of our cities stops. And in the future, I am sure that we will reach our borders in 1991. Photo: press service of the 66th separate mechanized brigade named after Prince Mstislav the Brave, Olga Vikarchuk

Title: Blasters are already on the agenda: in the Republic of Korea, they are thinking about arming the tro...
Description: How informs the Army Recognition portal, during the work of the international defense exhibition KADEX 2024, which took place in the Republic of Korea and united the leading players of the global arms and security industry, the development of the local firm LIG Nex1, the newest laser rifle, attracted the attention of visitors, ArmyInform reports. The manufacturing company is positioning its latest creation, which has not yet been named, as a rifle designed specifically for modern combat conditions. This compact and lightweight weapon, equipped with advanced technology, offers not only high power but also stealth, making it ideal for military operations where efficiency and stealth are important. -The rifle produces an extremely low noise level, which allows soldiers to remain invisible during operations. In addition, the low-noise cooling system maintains the optimal temperature of the weapon, preventing overheating during prolonged use,- Army Recognition experts said. Designed for easy operation by individual soldiers, the LIG Nex1 laser rifle features advanced technologies such as non-line-of-sight (NLOS) laser generation. This ability allows the fighter armed with it to hit targets that are not directly visible on the battlefield, providing a tactical advantage in the confrontation with the enemy, especially in difficult conditions where visibility is limited. Featuring high-power laser technology (one kilowatt level), this rifle combines lightness and power, offering soldiers increased efficiency without sacrificing maneuverability. Its discretion and effectiveness make this weapon an essential tool for operations that require precision and stealth. At the same time, official data on the capabilities of the laser rifle are not disclosed. The product at the exhibition was equipped with an adjustable stock, bipods and an optical sight. Shin Ik Hyun, CEO of LIG Nex1, expressed optimism about the impact of KADEX 2024 solutions. -We hope that the solutions presented at this exhibition will not only strengthen the military potential of the Republic of Korea, but also contribute to the expansion of the global presence of K-defense (South Korean arms industry),- said the Korean businessman. Founded in 1976, LIG ​​Nex1 is a South Korean company specializing in the development and production of advanced weapons systems. It offers a wide range of defense products, from precision munitions to electronic warfare systems, drones and tactical communications systems. LIG Nex1, based in Yeonin, Republic of Korea, is a major supplier to the South Korean military and also exports its technology around the world. Presentation of the laser rifle developed by the South Korean firm LIG Nex1. Video: Radetskiy/visualization created by artificial intelligence.

Title: The Kremlin spreads the thesis that Ukraine has already lost the war: for what purpose
Description: This was noted by the Center for Strategic Communications and Information Security. His specialists found out that The National Interest is owned by Dmitry Simes, who actively supports Russian propaganda. After 2022, he is in the Russian Federation and is accused by the US Department of Justice of violating sanctions, which carries a sentence of up to 60 years in prison. The publication has long been associated with pro-Russian views, and Symes himself moderated events organized by the Kremlin and received funding from Russian state structures. This message aims to undermine faith in the Victory of Ukraine and encourages citizens to doubt their country's ability to continue the struggle. Such rhetoric also helps to create the illusion that aid to Ukraine is futile in order to discourage Western powers from providing arms and financial support. In this way, Symes justifies further crimes by the Russians, while at the same time creating the appearance of strength and invincibility of the Russian regime for a domestic audience.

Title: The drone could not defeat the occupier, but it was eliminated in close combat by our infantrymen

As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the 63rd mechanized brigade showed how to install a WED tanka/->helps save combat equipment from Russian kamikaze drones.

Title: Adult -games- on the Romanian border: law enforcement officers detained the violator
Description: This is reported by the State Border Service of Ukraine. Employees of the operational-search department -Tyachiv- of the Mukachiv border detachment, together with the policemen of the Tyachiv district, detained a 21-year-old resident of the village of Teresva, who was planning to illegally cross the border with a resident of the Volyn region. The man demanded $3,500 for his services. He was detained after receiving part of the amount. During the inspection of the scene, as well as searches of the suspect's apartment and vehicle, the law enforcement officers seized physical evidence confirming his illegal activity. Zakarpattia was detained in accordance with Art. 208 of the CPC of Ukraine. Actions were carried out within the framework of criminal proceedings under part 3 Art. 332 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (-Illegal transportation of persons across the state border-). If the man is found guilty, he faces seven to nine years in prison. The investigation is carried out under the procedural guidance of the Tyachiv District Prosecutor's Office. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: - Freedom to peoples! Freedom for a person!-: On December 1, the acceptance of works for the XII Ban...
Description: This was announced by the organizing committee of the conference. Until December 1, 2024, works are accepted for the essay contest for young people within the framework of the 12th Banderiv readings. Students are encouraged to write small studies about the history of the struggle for independence of peoples enslaved by Moscow. -For the first time in many years, peoples enslaved by Russia have a chance to gain freedom and become masters of their land. Uncover the history of the struggle that has been silenced and join the formation of ideas for a new future!- - says the message of the organizing committee. This year, young researchers are expected to receive substantial cash prizes and prizes from the military. Detailed information about the conditions of the competition can be found by link. The acceptance of works for the book -Involuntary Accession: Essays on the History of the Liberation Struggle of Peoples Enslaved by Russia- continues until December 1. It is planned to tell the world and itself the story of the heroic resistance of the peoples enslaved by Russia to Moscow's imperialism. About the fact that no nation has ever voluntarily joined Moscow, but on the contrary, has fiercely opposed it for centuries. Also, Ukrainian and foreign researchers will try to answer the question: what will happen when there is no Russian empire? How will the natural space of free original and self-sufficient organic communities that will appear in the post-Russian space develop? The book will be published in three languages ​​on the eve of the main event. In addition, the organizers of the conference reported that it is planned to gather leaders of peoples enslaved by Russia, historians of the liberation struggle and graduates of the University of Free Peoples within the framework of the XII Banderiv readings. This year, the main partners of the event were the Anti-Imperial Bloc of Peoples and the fire support company of the 5th separate Kyiv assault brigade. Among the information partners of the Banderiv readings is the information agency ArmiyaInform.

Title: Destroyed the air defense system for $10 million and disassembled - into molecules - the Russian sel...
Description: His story and footage of his combat work were published by the Security Service of Ukraine. The special agent is an FPV pilot of one of the combat groups of the Special Operations Center -A- of the SBU. In the video, Ajax told and showed how he destroyed the Osa air defense system worth $10 million with one FPV drone. One can really understand the effectiveness of this tool on the battlefield. They flew in the direction of completely different targets. They saw that the -Wasp- air defense system was moving. They hit her. After confirmation, we looked - everything is on fire, everything is on fire,- the fighter said. He also shared the story of how he disassembled the Msta-S long-range self-propelled gun -into molecules-. -Everyone knows that this is a very powerful weapon on the battlefield, it is long-range. When working on this target, the video shows that the radio horizon was poor. And we couldn't know for sure if we hit or not. But when the next drones flew up and saw that it was scattered into molecules,- the man recalled. In addition, -Ajax- stopped an attempt by a Russian tank to fire on Ukrainian defenders. -I myself was under fire from a tank and I understand how an infantryman feels when such equipment works on him. They contacted the eyes of someone flying there, took off, saw that it was working. They struck him. Luckily we stopped him. They wanted to go, but they couldn't because we damaged their engine. And with the next few copters, they finished off that tank,- he said. In the video, the fighter also shared stories about how he -minus- enemy assault groups, what he felt when he hit the windshield of Russian trucks, talked about the group's preparation before combat missions and how the experience of playing -fifashechka- helped him become a top pilot. Earlier, ArmiyaInform showed how special forces of the Security Service of Ukraine -A- with attack drones and other firearms hit 37 Russians tanks and 51 BBM.

Title: The largest center for wounded soldiers of the RECOVERY national network has opened in Chernivtsi
Description: Today, the center is the largest in the RECOVERY network, which Viktor and Olena Pinchuka founded to help the Security and Defense Forces. The RECOVERY project is an example of a successful partnership between the private sector and the state, when philanthropists create innovative rehabilitation centers on the basis of public medical institutions. The new center is designed for 61 beds, which makes it the largest in the RECOVERY national network today. The state-of-the-art center is built on three floors of one of the key medical facilities in Bukovyna. During a meeting with the military at the newly opened center, the founder of the RECOVERY project, Viktor Pinchuk, remarked: — Do you know what I felt at this, the 15th, RECOVERY center? How much it is necessary to do everything now so that our defenders realize: the state, society and the private sector value them, now they are literally our VIPs, because the most important for the state are those who are just now at the front, and those who goes to the front - and also added: - We do everything according to the highest global standards, and there is hope that we set them for everyone: the state, other philanthropists, foreign partners. That is, the standard will be all over the country. The center was equipped according to world standards of inclusivity and technology, providing the highest level of rehabilitation for our soldiers. The complex of simulators and devices covers the entire range of possible functional disorders, in particular injuries resulting from mine and explosive injuries. Physical rehabilitation rooms are equipped with virtual reality (VR) equipment that provides feedback to the patient. Such equipment contributes to the gamification of rehabilitation processes, which, in turn, increases the intensity of training and accelerates the recovery of patients. Task-oriented exercises add motivation, and built-in analysis programs allow you to effectively monitor the patient's condition and evaluate the results of rehabilitation. In addition to VR technologies, the list of equipment equipped with the center includes bobat and massage systems, rehabilitation complexes for limbs, simulators for balance correction, joint mobilization and sling therapy. Like other centers of the chain, RECOVERY in Chernivtsi is equipped with the requirements of inclusivity of premises: wide doorways, no thresholds, medical anti-slip flooring, handrails in the corridors, sanitary rooms for people in wheelchairs and showers with seats and handrails. On the first floor of the rehabilitation center there are rooms for physical rehabilitation (large and small), an occupational therapy room, as well as rooms for physiotherapy, laser therapy, assistive technologies, psychotherapy (group and individual) and a speech therapist. In addition, there are two massage rooms, staff rooms, inventory and pharmacy rooms. The second and third floors are reserved for 22 rooms: 4 single rooms, 6 double rooms, 3 three-room rooms and 9 four-room rooms. Each ward is equipped with functional beds, inclusive bathrooms and comfortable furniture. In addition, the floors are equipped with medical stations, dining rooms and treatment rooms, which ensure comfort and quality medical care for patients. Chernivtsi OVA also joined the creation of the center in Chernivtsi, allocating funds from the regional budget, as well as territorial communities of the region. This made it possible to arrange the roof, the entrance group according to accessibility norms and to insulate the premises. — Thanks to the work of a powerful multidisciplinary team and modern equipment, we expect not only a doubling of the possibilities of providing rehabilitation assistance, but also a high level of its provision. Today, it is extremely important that the military personnel who defend our country receive timely rehabilitation assistance, - noted Vitaliy Polataychuk, head of the medical institution on the basis of which the RECOVERY center operates in Chernivtsi. RECOVERY's multidisciplinary teams consist of physical rehabilitation medicine specialists, physical therapists, occupational therapists, massage therapists, assistants, speech and language therapists, and psychologists. An individual rehabilitation plan is developed here for each injured person, and thanks to innovative equipment, patients receive high-quality and evidence-based rehabilitation care at the highest level. RECOVERY is a national network of rehabilitation centers for wounded soldiers. Today, in addition to Chernivtsi, RECOVERY rehabilitation centers provide free services in Kyiv (two facilities), Lviv, Chernivtsi, Rivne, Lutsk, Vinnytsia, Cherkassy, ​​Poltava, Khmelnytskyi, Odesa (two facilities) and in the Dnipro region (three facilities). In total, 18,000 patients have already received rehabilitation assistance in the centers of the national network.

He emphasized that the decisions of the NATO summit in Washington regarding air defense and other supplies for the front have not yet been fully implemented. -We really expect this, and it has a significant impact on the motivation and morale of our people. The recent authorization of long-range strikes against military targets in Russia has helped. But pressure on Russia must be maintained and increased at various levels. The President and Secretary General of NATO also discussed contacts with Ukrainian partners and coordinated work with them for the purpose of fulfilling all agreements and additional strengthening — both military and political. -In particular, for the sake of inviting Ukraine to NATO is a strategic political step - an invitation that our people definitely deserve and that can really help. Title: AviaHerostrat — in Kirovohrad Oblast, a Russian agent wanted to leave a military airfield without el...
Description: The Security Service of Ukraine reported this on November 27. The detainee turned out to be a 21-year-old local resident who was remotely recruited by the FSB in August 2024. The young man came to the attention of the occupiers because of his pro-Kremlin comments in the Telegram channels of the aggressor country. To perform -verification- tasks, the agent collected information about the technical condition of power plants, as well as monitored the locations of military hospitals and TCC buildings. The traitor transmitted the received information to his Russian curator via messenger in the form of text messages and marking objects on Google maps. Later, the agent received a new task: to penetrate the territory of the key power station of the region and set it on fire with a flammable mixture, and then extinguish the fire. In the event of the destruction of the power facility, the occupiers promised their henchmen a monetary reward of 200 thousand. Russian rubles. SBU employees exposed the traitor in time, documented his crimes and arrested him -red-handed- when he was conducting reconnaissance near the target. At the same time, comprehensive measures were taken to secure the locations of the Defense Forces in the areas of the agent's intelligence activity. At the place of detention, a mobile phone with an anonymous chat in the messenger, which he used to communicate with the FSB, was seized from him. Investigators of the Security Service informed the defendant of the suspicion under part. 2 Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). The perpetrator is in custody. He faces life imprisonment with confiscation of property. As reported by ArmyInform, in Zhytomyr region detained a group of Russian terrorist miners.

Title: In Zaporizhzhia, the enemy attacked a car carrying bread to villages near the front
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. -Russia continues to cynically hunt down the residents of the frontline territories. The driver was taken to the hospital with injuries,- the message reads. During the past day, the occupiers 369 strikes on 12 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region. In particular, Russian troops carried out four airstrikes on Novodarivka, Shcherbaki, Malya Tokmachka and Pavlivka. As reported by ArmyInform, during the night attack of Russian drones on Kyiv debris of downed drones fell in the Dnipro district of the capital.

Title: Capture or suicide: the ZSU described a portrait of a typical Russian with a white flag
Description: Lt. Col. Nazar Voloshyn, spokesman for the Khortytsia operational-strategic group of troops, said this in a comment to ArmyInform. According to him, most of the Russian prisoners are newly mobilized. Many of them have recently undergone training on training grounds, and some are involved in assault operations and conducting reconnaissance of Ukrainian positions. Previously, a significant part of the prisoners were former prisoners who, in exchange for amnesty, joined the ranks of the Russian army, but now their number has decreased - many of them will no longer be able to return to the battlefield. In some cases, there are special forces soldiers among the prisoners. However, in general, the Russian army compensates for losses by recruiting people with financial difficulties - many new recruits and mobilized are motivated by promises of money to pay off debts or mortgages. In the Kupyan direction, as Lt. Col. Nazar Voloshyn noted, Russian units are replenished mainly with prisoners and mobilized. At the same time, cases of suicide among the occupiers due to fear of being captured were recorded. This is the result of Russian propaganda, which spreads lies about brutal torture by Ukrainians. Despite this, the zone of responsibility of the -Khortytsia- OSU is marked by numerous cases of surrender. One of the latest is the story of a Russian soldier who surrendered, saying that -it is better to live in captivity than to die at the hands of his commanders.- He reported that the Russian command threatened him with reprisals for refusing to follow orders. According to Nazar Voloshin, such cases demonstrate the demoralization of the Russian military and the complexity of the situation in their ranks. As reported by ArmyInform, -occupiers turned Bakhmut to a logistics hub-: warehouses and hospitals were placed in the city.

Title: -Thank you for the accuracy!-: The President praised the soldiers for the successful destruction of ...
Description: He wrote about this in his Telegram channel. According to him, nightly strikes by mobile fire groups and other units demonstrate their effectiveness in protecting the lives of Ukrainians. -Every night, our mobile fire groups shoot down the Russian Shaheds.- Every night there is a result in saving life. Thank you for the aptitude!- Volodymyr Zelenskyy wrote. The head of state emphasized that only constant international support for Ukraine and growing pressure on Russia can deprive the aggressor of the opportunity to continue terror and prolong the war. -We need sustainable and reliable peace. Only together and thanks to well-aimed strikes can we achieve this,- the President emphasized. The head of state once again called on international partners to actively help Ukraine to strengthen its defense capabilities and achieve peace more quickly. As reported by ArmyInform, at night Ukraine held out attack of 89 drones: air defense shot down more than a third.

Title: -The occupiers turned Bakhmut into a logistics hub-: warehouses and hospitals were placed in the cit...
Description: About this told on the air of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- Lieutenant Colonel Nazar Voloshyn, spokesman of the Khortytsia operational-strategic troop grouping. According to Nazar Voloshyn, the occupied Bakhmut plays an important role for the invaders. This is the point of temporary deployment of the 98th Airborne Division and the 3rd Army Corps. -The city with its mines became a kind of logistics hub for the occupiers. Due to the fact that there are mines and fortifications there, the enemy has placed ammunition, equipment, as well as warehouses with fuel and lubricants there. There is also information that the occupiers have deployed field hospitals in the mines,- said Nazar Voloshyn. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the main efforts of the Russian invaders were concentrated on the Kurakhiv and Vremiv directions.

Title: The Ministry of Defense codified and put into operation the domestic armored personnel carrier
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine reported this on November 27. . The Oncilla-Shturm armored personnel carrier accommodates three crew members and six gunners. The machine is equipped with an automatic transmission and a powerful turbodiesel engine, which in combination provide the armored personnel carrier with good driving and speed characteristics. The fuel reserve is enough for more than 700 km. The Oncilla-Shturm's armor and design feature provide protection for the crew and troops during small arms fire, debris, and impact with explosive objects. -The domestic armored vehicle Oncilla-Shturm demonstrates the progress of Ukraine in the creation of equipment that meets the modern needs of the battlefield. Its reliability and functionality allow our military to perform combat tasks in conditions of high complexity, ensuring the protection of personnel and the efficiency of operations,- said Deputy Minister of Defense Dmytro Klimenkov. The standard equipment of the armored personnel carrier includes an automatic tire inflation system, hydraulic power steering, an air conditioning system with an additional heating function, an automatic fire extinguishing system, a filter ventilation system, and a winch. Armament is a remote-controlled combat module with a large-caliber machine gun. The armored personnel carrier can be manufactured in several modifications. The Ministry of Defense reminds that manufacturers and developers of samples of weapons and military equipment who have questions about the codification process can contact the Main Directorate for Life Cycle Support of Weapons and Military Equipment by e-mail: mdalc@mil.ua. As reported by ArmiyaInform, digital innovations in the procurement of the Ministry of Defense led to ->20% increase in competition.

Title: Two in one! — our pilots simultaneously bomb infantry and shoot down enemy -maviks-
Description: The video of combat work was released on November 27 on the brigade's channel. Our drones made drops on the enemy infantry who tried to hide under the trees and in the bushes. After the hits, the Russians showed no signs of life. When an enemy reconnaissance copter appeared on the battlefield, our pilots did not get confused, but immediately rammed it, after which it fell to the ground. And our pilots continued the methodical extermination of the enemy. -The bombers of our reconnaissance company are so strict that together with the enemy's infantry, they manage to destroy their -maviks- at the same time! True multi-tasking mode in combat conditions!- - commented on the video in the brigade.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 60th mechanized Ingulets brigade repelled another assault of the occupiers, who engaged 2 BMPs with landing forces.

Title: He lied and edited a provocative video with the Ukrainian military: a man was detained in Kharkiv
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. The investigation established that in October of this year, a man, passing through a checkpoint in Kharkiv, videotaped military personnel on duty. Later, he edited the video, adding to it the exact coordinates of the checkpoint location, as well as the personal data of the Ukrainian defenders. The video contained manipulative accusations against the military. It is noted that the accused violated the law, since the distribution of information about the places of deployment of the Ukrainian military is prohibited, if it was not published in open access by the General Staff of the Armed Forces, the Ministry of Defense or other authorized bodies. The man is currently in custody and is awaiting trial in the Dzerzhyn District Court of Kharkiv. He faces up to eight years in prison. The investigation was conducted by the SBU Department in the Kharkiv region. As reported by ArmyInform, the guard dog of the occupiers: a traitor in epaulettes who switched to the side of Russia was exposed.

Title: A group of woodpeckers - a whole group of dead Russian attack aircraft was found in a forest in Kurs...
Description: A video survey of the destroyed invaders was released on November 27. Prayers, cigarettes with a heart attack warning, love cards and a reconnaissance drone were found near the Russians. The watch of one of the killed was left on a tree branch. It is not known for sure what caused the mass death of Russians on their own territory. Maybe they ate something wrong, or maybe they went to storm the wrong positions.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the UA_REG Team unit of the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces destroyed a dozen Russians during a shooting battle in the forest on Kurshchyna

Title: Record support: Ukraine received the largest investment package from the World Bank
Description: reported this by the Prime Minister of Ukraine Denys Shmyhal. According to him, this is the largest investment project in the history of the bank, launched to support our state in the implementation of reforms, social and educational spheres, the sphere of health care, agricultural producers, as well as restoration projects. In total, during the large-scale war, almost 50 billion dollars were raised through the mechanisms of the World Bank. -Extremely grateful to the United States and development partners who are funding assistance within the framework of the PEACE project. We thank the World Bank for its constant involvement and active support of initiatives that strengthen Ukraine,- Denys Shmyhal emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, the World Bank /->announced a new support package for Ukraine in the amount of 750 million dollars.

Title: Increasing competition by 20%: digital innovation in procurement of the Ministry of Defense
Description: About this told the director of the procurement policy department of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, Glib Kanyevskij, at the NATO Support and Supply Agency (NSPA) seminar, dedicated to the lessons of the development and management of defense procurement in the conditions of martial law in order to implement the recommendation of the Strategic Review of Defense Procurement Ukraine - NATO. In his online presentation, Hleb Kanevskyi shared valuable conclusions reached by Ukrainian procurement specialists, and also discussed key aspects that have become important for effective supply management in wartime conditions. -During martial law, it is extremely important to remain flexible. We have learned to adapt our procurement processes to new challenges, to quickly respond to changes in circumstances and to provide the necessary additional financial resources for the Armed Forces,- said Hleb Kanevskyi. He emphasized that maintaining constant communication with the military allows the defense department to quickly respond to the needs of the front. ‎ -We are conducting a survey of our defenders to understand exactly what is needed on the front line and to provide it in the shortest possible time,- said the director of the Department of Procurement Policy during an online speech. In addition, Hleb Kanevsky emphasized the importance of digitalization of procurement processes. As an example, he cited the work of the new -MoU Partner- web portal, which digitalizes interaction with suppliers of rear assets of the Armed Forces. According to him, the launch of the resource doubled the speed of processing documents from manufacturers and is expected to contribute to a 20 percent increase in competition at auctions. -The integration of the latest digital technologies allows for the automation and simplification of procurement procedures, which ensures greater transparency and efficiency at every stage. And it also contributes to decision-making based on big data,- emphasized Hleb Kanevskyi. He assured that the experience of organizing the support of the Armed Forces in conditions of war is unique and will become the basis for the implementation of the Ukraine-NATO Strategic Review of Defense Procurement. As reported by ArmiyaInform, Ukrainian companies are leading in international tenders for the production of drones.

Title: Attack -Kedrom-: the expert explained why Putin hit the Dnipro
Description: Oleksandr Musienko, manager, told about this on the broadcast of the -Edyny Novyny- marathon. of the Center for Military Legal Studies. According to Oleksandr Musienko, the Russian dictator's threats are truly unprecedented - this type of weaponry was not used even during the Cold War. However, the Russian dictator still fears a conflict with NATO. -The strike was on the city of Dnipro, that is, away from the borders directly with the North Atlantic Alliance. He did not hit the west of our country, and the missile did not fly there. That is, he was still wary and afraid of provoking a certain reaction from the West,- Oleksandr Musienko is confident. This proves that the launch of a new ballistic missile, states Musienko, is nothing but another element of the Russian dictator's nuclear blackmail. Earlier ArmyInform told that as of October of this year, Russia was supposed to produce two experimental rocket samples from the Kedr missile complex.

Title: Repeated attack on the restaurant: in the Kharkiv region, the Russians are shelling the already dest...
Description: reported the head of Kharkiv OVA Oleg Synegubov about this. In particular, in the city of Derhachi, the glazing of the administration building was damaged as a result of shelling. And in the Chuguyiv district, there were shellings without casualties. In the village of Slatine, a shell hit an open area and damaged a private house. In the city of Kupyansk, an FPV drone hit the building of a previously destroyed restaurant. In the village of Hlushkivka, a two-story private house was destroyed as a result of shelling. Due to increased shelling from the Kupyan and Boriv directions, 64 people were evacuated. As reported by ArmyInform, during occupiers made 369 strikes on 12 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: Bonjour in Tyotkino - a French bomb flew into the enemy concentration in Kurshchyna
Description: The video of the defeat was published on the channel of the soldiers of the Air Force of the SSU -Sonyashnyk-. Information was received that the enemy had gathered in a building in the village of Tyotkino. An AASM, a French precision munition, flew there and reduced the building to rubble. Therefore, the defeat and burial of the enemy was carried out immediately. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the 39th tactical aviation brigade strike on the crossing which the army Russian Federation built on the Seim River.

Title: They do not understand where they are - in the Lyman direction, the Russians are thrown into battle ...
Description: This was said on the ArmyTV stream by the chief of staff of the 4th mechanized battalion of the Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytsky from with the call sign -Yeger-. -Enemy servicemen do not have a complete understanding of where they are. Because the prisoners that we took, their military tickets have the following written on them: -Polygon passed- and the date, mostly 2-3 weeks ago. I arrived here and was already captured,- Yeger said. According to him, the Russians actively use capes and raincoats to try to hide from our drones, but they are not very successful. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytsky showed results of his night work to clear the city from the occupiers.

Title: A recidivist and 4 fools — a group of Russian miners-terrorists was detained in Zhytomyr Oblast
Description: The Security Service of Ukraine reported this on November 27. On November 20, agents of the Russian Federation committed a terrorist attack in the central part of Zhytomyr. Then, as a result of the explosion, one law enforcement officer who was at the scene was injured. According to the case materials, the perpetrators acted on the orders of the Russian special services, which recruited them through Telegram channels in search of -quick money.- To commit a terrorist attack, the perpetrators remotely set off an improvised explosive device near the building of the local police district administration. According to the instructions of the Russian curators, they filled the explosives with nails and disguised them in a thermos, and detonated them -remotely- using a mobile phone. At the same time, agents installed hidden video cameras at the scene, which recorded the detonation in real time. All five terrorists, who acted separately from each other, were arrested -on hot pursuit- as a result of a special operation in the regional center. Among them is a 46-year-old man from Kharkiv, who served two sentences for robbery and robbery. According to the instructions of the occupiers, the recidivist bought components for explosives, which he then hid in a predetermined storage room. Next, residents of Zhytomyr aged 15, 16, 18, and 20 years old performed enemy tasks. Two of them took these -components- from the cache and, according to the diagrams provided to them, made an explosive device in the rented apartment. Two other accomplices installed video cameras near the state institution, planted explosives there and set them off. During the searches, components of an explosive device, SIM cards and mobile phones with evidence of the crime were seized from the detainees. The investigators of the Security Service informed them about the suspicion of h. 2 Art. 258 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (terrorist act committed by a group of persons based on a prior conspiracy). The perpetrators are in custody. They face up to 12 years in prison with confiscation of property. As reported by ArmyInform, two men will stand trial for setting fire to the car of a military serviceman, which is being investigated as sabotage during martial law.

Title: In the trunk to Poland: another illegal voyage failed
Description: About this informs State Border Service of Ukraine. During the inspection of a regular bus bound for Poland, two men were found in the luggage compartment. They were hidden in a specially equipped hiding place to avoid border control. The offenders were a 23-year-old resident of Kharkiv and a 38-year-old resident of Ternopil, who had no legal grounds for leaving Ukraine. Two bus drivers, residents of Volyn, tried to smuggle them across the border illegally. Regarding passengers, administrative protocols were drawn up under Art. 204-1 of the Criminal Procedure Code (-Illegal crossing of the state border of Ukraine-). Criminal proceedings were instituted against the drivers under Art. 332 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (-Illegal transportation of persons across the state border-). Suspicion was announced to them. The court chose a preventive measure for the drivers in the form of detention for 60 days with the possibility of bail. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: -The brigade carried out certain offensive actions - this was only the first stage-: in the Kharkiv ...
Description: Lieutenant-Colonel Anton Baev, Chief the planning department of the 13th brigade of operational assignment of the National Guard -Charter-. According to Anton Baev, the brigade achieved certain successes, but this was only the first stage. Now the main task is to gain a foothold and create conditions for further advancement. It will not be easy - the enemy has stepped up its activities. -We see, the weather, in addition to everything, is now very difficult. These are also large gusts of wind that interfere with the work of our UAVs, heavy cloudiness that does not allow our winged scouts to fly. It is the temperature itself that makes it difficult for the infantry to stay in new positions,- said Anton Baev. As reported by ArmyInform, on In the Kharkiv region, the -Charter- brigade is conducting active offensive actions, knocking the enemy out of his positions.

Title: Consequences of the drone attack in the Kyiv region: 18 apartments were damaged
Description: This was reported by the head of the Kyiv Regional Military Administration, Ruslan Kravchenko. However, debris from downed drones caused damage in several settlements. In high-rise buildings, the glazing of 18 apartments and 3 office premises in 3 buildings was damaged. In two districts of the region, the blast wave damaged windows, doors, and roofs in 4 private houses, as well as 4 outbuildings and a garage. Task forces continue to assess the damage caused by the attack. Ruslan Kravchenko emphasized that Kyiv OVA is already cooperating with local authorities and international partners to provide assistance to affected families. As reported by ArmyInform, at night Ukraine held out attack of 89 drones: air defense shot down more than a third.

Title: At night, Ukraine withstood the attack of 89 drones: air defense shot down more than a third
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Aviation, anti-aircraft missile units, electronic warfare equipment and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine were involved in repelling the attack. As of 09:00, air defense shot down 36 enemy drones in Kyiv, Chernihiv, Sumy, Kharkiv, Poltava, Zhytomyr, Khmelnytskyi, and Mykolaiv regions. In addition, 48 UAVs were lost in location, presumably due to active anti-aircraft defense of the Defense Forces, 5 drones left the controlled airspace towards Belarus, Russia and the temporarily occupied territories. Private and multi-apartment houses and property of citizens in the Kyiv region were damaged due to the fall of enemy UAV debris. Preliminary - no victims and no injuries. As reported by ArmyInform, the threat of an attack from the Black Sea: enemy took out the missile carrier.

Title: Ruins after shelling: 11 people were injured by Russian attacks in the Kherson region
Description: This was notified by the head of Kherson OVA Oleksandr Prokudin. Antonivka, Sadove, Prydniprovske, Bilozerka, Stanislav, Veletenske, Shiroka Balka, Mykilske, Ingulets, Beryslav, Odradokamyanka, Novovorontsovka, Shlyakhove, Mylove and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. According to the head of the OVA, the Russian military attacked the residential quarters of the populated areas of the region, in particular damaged a high-rise building and 10 private houses. The occupiers also mutilated a gas pipeline, a service station, a garage and private cars. As reported by ArmyInform, during occupiers made 369 strikes on 12 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: The threat of a strike from the Black Sea: the enemy has withdrawn a missile carrier
Description: This was reported by the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. There are no ships in the Mediterranean. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, tests were planned, and combat launches were carried out: the commander of the Navy told about the first attack by -Neptune-.

Title: Heaven's punishment in Toretsk is our bomber
Description: The video was published on November 27 on the brigade's channel. Thermal imaging cameras were good at finding the occupants in the dark, and a drop flew in their wake. Sometimes one round was enough to hit two Russians. -Don't run away, Rusak, or you'll die of exhaustion. Operators of the 2nd mechbat catch the occupiers who are running around Toretsk. Rusnia hears an ominous buzzing overhead and tries to run away, but our drones skillfully work with resets,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the units of the Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytsky crushed the enemy armored column with infantry in the area Great Novosilka.

Title: Defense forces restrained 224 Russian assaults: the enemy intensified the offensive in two direction...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In addition, it carried out more than four thousand attacks, 142 of them from rocket salvo fire systems, and engaged about 1,300 kamikaze drones for attacks. The aggressor carried out airstrikes in the areas of settlements of Bilovoda, Spaske, Sumy Region; Pitomnyk, Visoka Yaruga, Kurylivka, Kharkiv region; Ivanivka, Lyman, Zarichne, Sloviansk, Toretsk, Katerynivka, Kramatorsk, Zelene, Pokrovsk, Kurakhove, Uspenivka, Komar of the Donetsk region; Pavlivka, Mala Tokmachka, Temyrivka, Zaporizhzhia region. Last day, in the Kharkiv direction, there were five enemy attacks in the areas of Vovchansk settlements, in addition, the enemy actively used bomber aircraft. In the Kupyansk direction there were 18 attacks by the occupiers during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults in the direction of Hryhorivka, Zeleny Gayu, Zagryzovo, Senkovo, Kolisnikivka, Synkivka, and Andriivka. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked 21 times. Tried to advance near Grekivka, Druzhkivka, Cherneshchyna, Makiivka, Terniv, Torsky, and in the Serebryansk Forestry area. Yesterday, the enemy once tried to dislodge our defenders from their positions in the Siversk direction districts of Hryhorivka with assault actions. There was no success. Thirteen assaults took place last day in the Kramatorsk direction in the areas of Chasiv Yar, Stupochki, Bila Gora and Predtechine settlements. In the Toretsk direction the enemy actively used bomber aircraft, carried out six attacks in the areas of the settlements of Dilyivka, Shcherbynovka and Toretsk. In the Pokrovsky direction our defenders stopped 59 assault and offensive actions of the aggressor in the direction of Myrolyubivka, Krasny Yar, Lysivka, Dachensky, Chumatsky, Pustinka and Novoy Trud. The greatest concentration of enemy attacks was near the village of Promin. In the Kurakhiv direction the defense forces repelled 46 enemy assaults. The enemy carried out airstrikes on populated areas. The main offensive efforts of the enemy were concentrated in the districts of Dachny, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhovo, Dalny, Katerynivka, Elizavetivka, Hanivka, Antonivka, Berestkiv, Zori and Sontsivka. In the Vremivsk direction the enemy carried out 17 assaults on our positions near the settlements of Trudove, Kostiantynopolske, Rozdolne, Novoandriivka, Vesely Hay, Rozlyv and Rivnopil. In the Gulyajpil and Orihiv directions the invaders did not carry out offensive actions, but they actively used aviation. In the Dnieper direction Russian invaders attacked our positions five times. They were fiercely repulsed and suffered losses. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. In general, the last day's loss Russian invaders numbered 1,580 people. Also, Ukrainian soldiers destroyed 14 tanks, 48 ​​armored combat vehicles, 24 artillery systems, 1 rocket salvo fire system, 1 air defense vehicle, 64 UAVs of operational-tactical level, 84 units of automobile equipment and 4 units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: Where it is narrow, there is also Russian. Burning - the use of enemy fortifications to destroy the ...
Description: The video of the combat operation was made public on the channel of the -North- operational command. Columns of Russians trying to use the passages between the rows of concrete pyramids ran into our mines and exploded brightly. But the enemy drove again and again, and again exploded on mines. -Dozens of destroyed equipment and hundreds of eliminated enemies. The Kursk operation continues. - commented on the video in OK -Pivnich-. As reported by ArmyInform, marines repelled powerful assault of the Russians in Kurshchyna.

Title: Propagandists launched an anti-Ukrainian article in the media: why are they in Greece?
Description: On November 26, the site -Banking news- with a reach of 6.5 million users in Greece published article with just a wild set of Russian narratives. It is dedicated to the so-called -Ukrainian nationalist battalions -Azov-, -Aidar-, -Kraken- and others-, the destruction of which, in the opinion of Greek propagandists this time, is -one of the main goals of the Russian invasion of Ukraine-. In the material, the Greek pseudo-journalists quote the sanctioned ex-deputy of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine Spyridon Kilinkarov, Russian military analysts Oleksandr Sharkovsky and Oleksandr Perendzhiev. They accuse units of the Armed Forces of various war crimes typical of daily Russian propaganda. The material was obviously made at the behest of Russia and is spreading through the Greek-speaking segment of the Internet with the clear aim of discrediting Ukraine, the Defense Forces of our country and specific units. Such publications are made to undermine the confidence of foreigners in Ukraine and to reduce their support. In October, the President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyi, and the Prime Minister of Greece, Kyriakos Mitsotakis, signed the Security Cooperation Agreement in Brussels, which confirms Greece's readiness to continue providing the most urgent defense needs of Ukraine. Therefore, such information -leaks- specifically in Greece can be directed against a specific security agreement.

Title: Almost 50 BBMs and 1,580 occupants: the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine announced the l...

Title: Attack on Zaporizhzhia: 369 strikes on 12 settlements per day
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhzhya OVA. Russian troops carried out 4 airstrikes on Novodarivka, Shcherbaki, Malya Tokmachka and Pavlivka. In addition, 186 UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Primorske, Gulyaipole, Novoandriivka, Shcherbaki, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Malynivka, Biloghirya, Novodarivka, and Olhivske.
