Title: How is preparation for takmed: a master class from instructors -Kabana- and-Puma-
Description: Such training of fighters already after arriving from the training center to the battalion is a mandatory element of continued training. No soldier will go on combat missions until he has received additional training, including tactical medicine. The instructors told the correspondents of ArmiyaInform how the training in the technical field takes place and why it is necessary for every fighter newly arrived in the battalion. During training, those who have well mastered the basics of tactical medicine during BZVP have the opportunity and will be able to refresh and consolidate their knowledge. Those who were less attentive and diligent must make up for lost time. — Such training takes place with all newcomers. We work in small groups - from 4‒6 to a maximum of 10 fighters in order to be able to pay attention to everyone, says Vladyslava. Medics must firmly make sure that newly arrived fighters at a sufficient level have mastered the necessary set of knowledge, abilities and skills in order to be able to provide first aid to themselves or a brother in case of injury. To do this, with each successive group of replenishment, they go through the same set of classes, exercises and training again and again. After all, as the Ukrainian proverb says: -Until you try, you won't know how.- — With beginners, we always go through the MARCH algorithm and consolidate knowledge and practice skills in practice. This is necessary so that they do not get lost in the position and during combat, so that everything is done as correctly as possible, she says. — When newcomers come, we treat them as if they know absolutely nothing. We understand that they have already received training at the BZVP, but we need to make sure of the level of their knowledge acquisition, - explains the head of the medical center, Senior Lieutenant Yuriy Faustus. This is why medics work in small groups, which, moreover, can be divided into pairs in such a way that the fighters train on each other and check each other. — Today they listen with interest, work responsibly. Therefore, it was easy to train them - they helped each other, applied tourniquets, made bandages. They themselves checked whether the tourniquet was put on properly, -Puma- says with satisfaction. New arrivals are different, doctors explain. It is easier for someone to explain everything and to teach what is necessary, but for someone it is necessary to force. It's not so bad when a person can't do something, they note - it's much worse if he doesn't want to learn. Not everyone immediately understands where they got to, that they are really at war. Therefore, sometimes it is necessary to force. It is very bad when a person himself does not realize how terrible the consequences of his negligence can be, doctors are convinced. — We must teach all those who come to us so that they do not get lost in combat conditions. Of course, they are not seeing these tourniquets and bandages for the first time, but we understand very well that time and opportunities to bring knowledge and skills to a perfect level are not always enough, - explains Vladyslava. She does not hide that not only the attitude of the fighters, but also the level of their training after passing the BZVP can be different. There are those who after the training center really have a sufficient level of knowledge and skills, but there are also those who wasted their time and did not learn even the most necessary minimum at a sufficient level. — There are cases when they think that they only have to learn how to shoot from an automatic machine, and they don't really need everything else. I encountered this quite often. Because of this, we make sure to train all new arrivals and then try to repeat them every time the opportunity arises, says Yuriy. Because of this attitude, some have to be forced to learn through disciplinary measures. Instead, it's always nice to have one or two motivated fighters in a training group who set the tone and become an example for others to follow. — What is important for us is what we have taught them now, what we have taught them right here. Because we understand that from now on the responsibility for their training lies with us, emphasizes Puma. The truth of these words is confirmed by intensive training, during which Yuriy and Vladislava give 100%, either working with the whole group of fighters at the same time, or by dividing them into pairs or singling out someone alone. It is noticeable that doctors treat their mission extremely responsibly and diligently.

Title: Barrage -Jackal-: a new high-precision missile with a turbojet engine was presented in the USA
Description: As stated in the abstract of this project on the official portal of this corporation with headquarters in Virginia, the Jackal multi-purpose missile (-Шакал- in Ukrainian) can use both lethal and non-lethal payloads for a range of functions such as electronic warfare and reconnaissance, surveillance and intelligence (ISR), ArmyInform reported. Developed in cooperation with AeroVironment, this rocket uses the technological developments of the Switchblade series, a family of ammunition that has already proven itself well in practical applications. It should be noted that the Switchblade barrage drones (-Ejection Knife- in Ukrainian) have repeatedly dopomogy-na-13-mlrd/->included in the packages of weapons that were transferred to the Defense Forces as part of the foreign partnerships and about which our editors in detail she told in her publications. The Jackal missile features a modular configuration that allows integration of lethal and non-lethal payloads suitable for complex military operations. Thanks to its turbojet engine running on JP-10 fuel, the Jackal missile can reach a speed of more than 644 km/h, has a flight range of 100 kilometers and can stay in the air for about 15 minutes. Its useful load capacity is 4.5 kilograms. The open architecture of the Jackal missile allows for flexible integration of various payloads, including electronic warfare (EW) systems, reconnaissance, surveillance and intelligence (ISR) equipment. This missile can be deployed on air, land and sea platforms. The Jackal missile was first presented at the Special Operations Forces Industry Conference (SOFIC) in Tampa, Florida. in May 2022. As the manufacturer explains, the purpose of the Jackal missile was to fill the gap between existing ammunition, such as the Switchblade 300 and Switchblade 600, thanks to increased range, speed and versatility. While the Switchblade 300 is ideal for precision strikes at short ranges and is adept at dealing with armor, the Jackal strikes a balance between speed and payload as it can carry heavy warheads and other essential equipment over long distances while maintaining the flexibility needed to dynamic combat conditions. Moreover, as Northrop Grumman points out, the Jackal missile is an excellent choice for counter-terrorism missions, allowing it to gather valuable information in difficult environments for a long time before striking. As emphasize defense market researchers from the profile portal Army Recognition, this high-precision strike missile combines advanced avionics and flight control systems, designed for navigation in conditions where GPS is unavailable, ensuring operational reliability even when conventional navigation systems fail. The Jackal missile's next-generation flight control system offers advanced capabilities such as GPS-disabled navigation and an automatic targeting mechanism that is fine-tuned for target recognition, detection and enhanced situational awareness. Thanks to its high-speed turbojet engine, the Jackal missile quickly reaches targets, providing the necessary response to emerging threats, which is an important feature for maintaining tactical superiority in changing combat scenarios. Due to its modular design, the Jackal missile provides a variety of effects, both lethal and non-lethal. It autonomously follows set waypoints and can be reconfigured in flight depending on tactical tasks. Once a target is detected, the warhead reactively accelerates to intercept the target, setting new standards for tactical superiority in range, accuracy and speed. -Today's rapidly changing landscape requires multi-domain solutions that are flexible, resilient, and able to respond quickly to tactical demands to meet these demands. The Jackal missile is a next-generation high-precision strike missile that provides critical countermeasures in high-stress conditions when launched from air, land and sea platforms at a range of more than 100 km,- says a new video about this munition posted by Northrop Grumman on YouTube . According to Northrop Grumman, the Jackal missile has attracted a lot of military interest since its initial presentation. In November 2022, the system completed a series of successful test flights, and additional demonstrations are planned for 2024 to further improve its capabilities and bring it into line with potential US military missions. In the ever-changing conditions of warfare, the Jackal missile offers a cost-effective and versatile solution for modern armed forces, capable of delivering high-precision strikes and strategic surveillance at the same time, emphasizes Northrop Grumman. High precision Jackal ammunition. Video: Northrop Grumman

Title: How to become a reckless UAV pilot: tips from an instructor
Description: - What qualities should a UAV operator have? - Let's start with the fact that UAVs are different. The main division is copters and -wings-. And, for example, the skills and mental toughness of FPV strike drone pilots and wing operators are exactly the opposite. Because, relatively speaking, if a person is determined to shoot videos for TikTok, scouting is not an option for him, because there will never be any interesting stories. To shoot such videos, you need to be either an FPV shooter or a fixer. And these are different professions. A scout actually needs a certain amount of boredom and a normal education. That is, if a person does not understand how radio waves work, he will not be able to fly an airplane. It is also necessary to understand that he will not have any spectacular heroism, but will stupidly and methodically perform the same work every day. And not everyone can stand it. I know that people have tried to switch from scouting boards to strike boards or tried to be transferred to artillery by adjusters. This also has to be done by someone, and if the person's character is more suited to it, this is the right decision. - What qualities do an FPV drone operator need? - FPV drone operator is probably one of the most difficult professions in terms of training. A pilot needs a certain recklessness. They are closer than anyone to the front line. It is necessary to dig a lot, to be able to quickly collect and assemble your household, to haul it, because it is a question of their survival, and you need to calmly treat the spectacle of human bodies torn to pieces. In fact, they are probably the last fighters in modern warfare who look the enemy in the eye before he dies. And I know that many people dream about it at night. - What should a person who wants to become a reconnaissance drone operator know? - The cadet should know that he will receive, as a rule, the task of scouting a specific area. That is, either to walk along such and such landings, or to explore such and such a settlement, or simply to conduct preliminary reconnaissance. Here, for example, we know that something was or can be at such and such coordinates. You fly everything again and find out - it's still there, or it's gone, or in that place where it was empty, something has appeared, or confirm the target has been hit. That is, we know that the REB was there, and you take off and find out why it turned off - or it died, or it left, or it is just silent. For his part, the -wings- operator must know the entire terrain of his unit in depth, in fact, reconnaissance, and another 20-30 percent, must clearly know the map in order to anchor at any moment and understand where he is. Simply because the Western fantasy that we will go to war for GPS has little to do with reality. You need to understand where you place your point so that, firstly, you are found as the latest, and secondly, so that you have time to leave this point in time. In other words, the scout does not sit in one place, unlike the adjuster. The task of a scout is to arrive, set up, and it is good if there is a shelter nearby, if there is not and there is no way to prepare it in advance, which, unfortunately, happens often, then he started from the ground, worked, quickly gathered and changed the location. It is advisable to make the second departure in a day from another place. - So that's all you teach your cadets? - Yes, that's exactly it. Here, for example, is the question of how to choose a position for an airplane. It should have many factors, in contrast to vertical take-off boards, such as -quadricopters-. You are tied not only to how to place the antennae, not only to how to place yourself so that you don't get killed. You are still tied to how you will raise and lower your plane based on today's wind. The position may be perfect for everyone, but you either can't raise the plane or you can't lower it. — What other qualities do cadets need? — Let me remind you that -wing- scouts need perseverance and attention, and FPV-schneiders need recklessness. These are incompatible qualities, so we divide the cadets immediately. Well, you need the ability to turn nuts, solder circuits, glue, etc. That is why people of working specialties who can fix something, if necessary, show themselves best in training. If a person still has some imagination to come up with a field upgrade on the plane, this is also a plus, because the shortcomings of the boards are compensated solely by the skills of the crew. — What percentage of cadets drop out during training? — There is a general rule: the cheaper and simpler the plane, the more difficult it is to learn to fly. The number of people who could not finish the course is quite large among the same FPV pilots, there are very difficult piloting skills. That is, what in more expensive boards is partly taken over by automation, you do everything yourself. The control complexity is about the same as that of World War II fighter jets. But overall, not very much. - What are the age restrictions for cadets? - I will say yes. For -wings-, age is not a critical factor. For FPV, this is actually more critical because, once again, there is no automation, and the speed of reaction is very important. That's why people often don't pull because of their age, people with concussions don't pull, people with a bad vestibular apparatus don't pull. Simply because, when you look at this screen, where everything swings around you at full height, it can really make you feel sick and sick. - How long does the training take? - Currently one and a half months. It is possible to train a person from zero to a pilot who will perform the task in that time, and it is almost always successful.

But the purpose of the lies spread by faikomets is to sow distrust of the population in the authorities and the Defense Forces. Such -throwbacks- are a typical reaction of the enemy to the strengthening of Ukraine's defense capabilities.

Title: Falling drones due to the work of friendly EW: how to solve the problem
Description: He told this in an interview with Grunt media. -We all understand very well that our EW, at a short distance to the battle line, is fighting enemy UAVs, anti-aircraft missiles, other types of enemy missiles and vehicles. Therefore, in order to work, we always have to personally establish interaction with such units on horizontal lines,- he noted. According to him, it sometimes happens that their groups directly in the execution area come into contact with each neighboring unit, and only then use their means. As reported by ArmyInform, Charlie previously told that over the past year and a half, Russian invaders have learned to quickly adapt and modernize drones.

Title: Volodymyr Zelensky criticized the G20 summit because of weak support for Ukraine
Description: He said about this while communicating with journalists within the framework of the Third Grain from Ukraine International Conference. The head of state noted that the majority of the Brazilian people support Ukraine, and thanked him for that. At the same time, in his opinion, President Lula da Silva of Brazil, the country that currently chairs the G20 and hosted the summit, has shown a weak stance on the war. -If we want good, normal relations between our nations, between our peoples, then we should probably support people first of all, and not aggressors, leaders of aggression in the world, such as Putin, such as today's, modern Russia,- explained the President of Ukraine . According to him, the weakness shown during the G20 summit gave the Russian dictator the opportunity to hit Ukraine with new missiles during the meeting of the G20 leaders. -I don't think that populism can stop Putin. I don't think cheap energy is going to protect your freedom in the long run. I believe that this is a wrong move,- the head of state noted. Volodymyr Zelenskyy also emphasized: when there will be strong statements, calls and steps, the Russian dictator will not be able to behave as he is doing now. In addition, the President noted that Ukraine raised the issue of reforming the UN Security Council due to its ineffectiveness. -Everyone is talking about this, but the reform of the UN Security Council is not taking place. There are players who do not want any reforms, because otherwise their influence will be less,- said the head of state. The President of Ukraine added that every two or three months, Putin escalates on the front in order to raise the stakes and not sit down at the negotiating table. Without a clear position of the major countries - the United States, Brazil, Asian and African countries - the agreement with Putin will be a delay and a continuation of Russian intimidation. At the same time, all steps proposed by Ukraine to end the war are based on the UN Charter. Our country hopes that its partners will support them. As reported by ArmyInform, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky supports the transition to the corps control system in the ZSU, if it reduces bureaucracy.

Title: How awards are developed: details from the Ministry of Defense
Description: About his work the head of the Central Directorate for the Development of Material Support of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Lt. Col. Maxim Kayola. -It is staffed by military personnel and civil servants with a history major. We also have an Honored Artist of Ukraine. We try to move away from the specialization of the military for which we produce awards. We also introduce our Ukrainian traditions to encourage soldiers to study history,- he said. According to Maxim Kayol, their task is to make such an award so that the serviceman, when receiving it, feels that the state appreciated what he did. -It's a war right now, so it's very important. And all of this also happens immediately upon contact with the relevant type of troops. They look, we definitely agree with them. If they don't like something, we do it so that everyone is satisfied, there are standards, and our Ukrainian symbols are deployed in the Armed Forces of Ukraine,- he summarized. As reported by ArmyInform, previously the head of the Central Department for the Development of Material Support of the Military Intelligence Servicetold about food standards in the army and the developments that are currently being implemented.

Title: The educational process according to the standards of the Russian Federation: another collaborator r...
Description: The Kherson Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. Also, the convicted person is deprived of the right to hold positions in the bodies of state power and local self-government for a period of 15 years. The investigation established that in June 2022, the man voluntarily assumed the position of the so-called -head of the education department of the Novokakhov temporary military-civilian administration.- In this pseudo-position, he ensured the operation of educational institutions according to the standards of the Russian Federation, conducted inspections of schools, inventoried their property, and appointed managers who agreed to cooperate with the occupation administration. As reported by ArmyInform, the guard dog of the occupiers: a traitor in epaulettes who switched to the side of Russia was exposed.

Title: -Generals should be in the trenches-: Volodymyr Zelenskyy supports the transition to a corps managem...
Description: About this head of state said during a meeting with media representatives within the framework of the Third International Conference on Food Security Grain from Ukraine. -This is for the military to decide. If the corps system they are proposing today will reduce the distance between the general and the soldier, if this bureaucracy will be reduced, let them do so to reduce it,- the head of state noted. The president emphasized that the task now is to reduce bureaucracy in the army. In particular, this should be taken care of by the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, General Oleksandr Syrskyi. -An officer must see a soldier. A general who has not been in the trenches is not a general for me personally. Despite the experience. With all due respect. Today, the most difficult situation is on the front line, in the trenches,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi noted. According to the President, it is necessary not only to talk about problematic issues at Stavka or in the command headquarters, but also to communicate directly with the soldiers. -That's why Syrsky is always at the front, always traveling. We communicate with him every day, twice a day. He has a morning and evening report. But still this is not enough. The generals must be in the trenches. This is the war. The morale of the military is the most important,- the President emphasized. He also emphasized that Putin's main task now is to oust the Ukrainian military from the Kursk region, and by January 20. -It is very important for him to demonstrate that he is in control of the situation. He is not in control of the situation. The Kursk operation is not a toy. We have shown that Putin is unable to fully defend his state. He threw everything at the occupation and destruction of Ukraine,- the head of state said. In addition, as the President of Ukraine noted, the Russian dictator wants to show that he will allegedly achieve the stated goal of occupying the entire Donbas. -From this and our respective results. Difficulties in the East, yes. Not enough armed forces there, yes. Understaffing exists for a variety of reasons. Specifically, delayed delivery, yes. But nevertheless we are there. We are defending our homeland. And under Putin, there have never been such losses as today in the Kursk direction,- the President summarized. As reported by ArmyInform, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy during the Third International Summit on Food Security Grain from Ukraine metwith the minister of Foreign Affairs of the Czech Republic Jan Lipavsky and discussed cooperation between Ukraine and the Czech Republic.

Title: Dodgers in rubber flip-flops were looking for safe shallow water on the Tisza in the snow
Description: About this informs the State Border Service of Ukraine. According to law enforcement officials, the organizers of the illegal crossing offered a rubber boat and instructions on -safe shallow water- for 10,000 US dollars each. The total amount that the violators paid amounted to more than 400 thousand hryvnias. Four men, three from Donetsk region and one from Ivano-Frankivsk region, agreed to these risky conditions. Their plans were destroyed by the border guards who spotted the trespassers. After several warning shots were fired, the offenders left the boat and tried to escape, but were apprehended. The detainees were taken to the border unit, where administrative protocols were drawn up on them under Art. 204-1 of the Criminal Procedure Code (-Illegal crossing or attempted illegal crossing of the state border of Ukraine-) and Art. 185-10 of the Criminal Procedure Code (-Malicious disobedience to a lawful order or demand of a military serviceman or an employee of the State Border Service-). The court will soon evaluate the actions of the detainees. In the meantime, operatives continue their investigation to identify the individuals involved in the organization of this illegal border crossing attempt. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The Ministry of Defense reported how corruption is prevented
Description: This was told by the head of the Central Directorate for the Development of Material Support of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, Lieutenant Colonel Maksym Kayola. -I had the opportunity to sort employees, both military and civil servants. We have established requirements for their reliability. They were being tested. We have a desire to contribute to our Victory,- he said. The Ministry of Defense also created the Internet platform -Partner MOU-. -Through this platform we work. All requests, all submissions of documents for acts, for military experimental tests must be made through the -MoU Partner-. Why? Because this program is tracked, no applications, no documents will be lost,- he explained. In addition, a technical committee consisting of 11 specialists was established in the MOU for each sector. -They investigate each issue, then meet and make a decision as to compliance or non-compliance. Does this product go to military trials or not; or maybe it needs to be refined. That is, we have created a system that is as transparent as possible, we involve the maximum number of people,- he noted. According to him, in order to prevent corruption, they also involve the Command of the Logistics Forces, the Central Office of Quality Control, the State Rear Operator, so that everyone is in the process and understands what is happening in the MOU. Earlier, the Minister of Defense Rustem Umyerov emphasized the priority of the struggle with corruption in all areas for which his department is responsible. As reported by ArmyInform, the National Agency for the Prevention of Corruption (NACP) together with the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine presented a new study, which identifies the main corruption risks in the rear procurement system for the Armed Forces of Ukraine and offers recommendations for their elimination.

Title: At night, the Russian field squad illuminated Luhansk region
Description: A video of combat operation appearedon the unit's page. -Yes, for two days, an enemy infantry fighting vehicle, passenger cars and trucks were blown up in the Kreminnaya and Serebryansky forest areas. The enemy also suffered losses in manpower,- added the defenders of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, the border commandant of reconnaissance-strike unmanned aircraft complexes -Phoenix-, which operates as part of the brigade of the State Border Service -Revenge-, recognized as one of the most effective units Defense Forces of Ukraine.

Title: Suits with protection against fragments and thermal imaging systems, women's body armor are new deve...
Description: About this told the head of the Central Directorate for the Development of Material Support of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, Lieutenant Colonel Maksym Caiola during SMALL TALK. According to him, there will be very big changes in material support, the wishes of the fighters -from the fields- were taken into account. -They have requests to make normal pants with built-in knee pads. The combat shirt will be made of -Coolmax- fabric for moisture removal. Now we are fruitfully working on means of personal protection, such as bulletproof vests and helmets. We have already developed and implemented 8 samples of bulletproof vests and 8 samples of helmets,- said Maxim Kayola. He also reported that a -special ballistic suit- with better protection against shrapnel is currently under development, as shrapnel damage is the predominant one. In addition, a -universal awning- and a -special suit to provide protection against thermal imaging systems- are under development. According to him, this is what our army needs very much. And the task of the management of the development of material support to implement this by the end of the year will be fulfilled. -Also, we are currently developing a women's bulletproof vest. This is very important, because the anthropometric data of women must be taken into account. This is necessary so that it is a little lighter, fits well. So that a woman can perform her tasks like a military serviceman,- emphasized Maxim Kayola. Currently, a -summer special suit- has been developed for women with requirements for their figure. This suit has already been purchased, it is in stock, it is already issued. Management is currently working on underwear for cool and cold winter, winter jacket and pants. -We have anticipated everything our servicewomen want. We will now conduct military experiments, both in the war zone and in the rear areas. After all, before developing something, we always communicate with people from different families, types of troops, to understand what they need, what they want. And they should make what they will use, not what they receive and put somewhere in the closet,- explained Maxim Kayola. As reported by ArmiyaInform, previously the head of the Central Department for the Development of Material Support of the IOM told about the food standards in the army and the developments that are currently being introduced to them.

Title: The President of Ukraine discussed the supply of artillery shells with the Minister of Foreign Affai...
Description: This is in his message on November 23. -We are glad that we have good relations at the leadership level and strong ties between our nations. Thank you for being with us since the beginning of the full-scale invasion. Many initiatives from your side to help Ukraine, including artillery. We are grateful to you for everything,- said the President of Ukraine. During the meeting, they discussed defense support, the progress of the initiative on the supply of artillery shells and cooperation between Ukraine and the Czech Republic in countering Russian disinformation. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also noted the active participation of the Czech Republic in the reconstruction of Ukraine, in particular, he thanked for the initiative to increase the funding of the National Program for the Reconstruction of Ukraine after 2025, which is aimed at restoring critical infrastructure. During the meeting, they also agreed on the next steps for the development of bilateral cooperation, including future contacts at the highest level. As reported by ArmyInform, according to the words of the President, Ukraine ppo-prezydent/->started negotiations with partners regarding new air defense systems after the Russian strike with an experimental ballistic missile.

Title: During the week, sappers of the Ministry of Defense removed 1,085 explosive objects
Description: reports this by the Main Directorate of Mine Action, Civil Protection and Environmental Security. During the last week from November 15 to 22, 2024, 3,938.51 hectares of terrain were surveyed and cleared: The work is carried out with the involvement of specialized machinery for mechanized demining. Demining liberated areas is a key task that allows for the safety of the civilian population, the restoration of infrastructure and the return of land to normal use. As reported by ArmyInform, ahead of the first: unique shots the works of our sappers in Kurshchyna.

Title: Decoy drones, repeaters, new enemy tactics: how the occupiers are modernizing UAVs
Description: the commander of the 14th separate regiment of unmanned aviation complexes of the SBS of the Armed Forces of Ukraine told about it under the pseudonym -Charlie- in an interview with -Grunt- media. -For example, a year ago they used exclusively their -geranium-shaheds-, and now they have changed their tactics a little: they put various types of equipment on their shaheds, put video communication channels that help them detect various moments on our territory,- he noted . According to him, the first few drones are -going for detection-, other drones are already directed directly to the target. -They use baits, this was not the case before. That is, decoy drones are launched in front of the Shaheds, which discharge our air defense system,- explained Charlie. As he noted, if we talk about Russian intelligence tools, they are modernizing visual surveillance systems that allow them to work in different weather conditions, time of day and observe at a greater distance. They also use different types of repeaters that allow them to fly over long distances. -Today, we see that their reconnaissance drones directly fly to such cities as Dnipro, Poltava. Therefore, unfortunately, they are not in place,- Charlie emphasized. However, according to him, thanks to caring people and organizations that help the Defense Forces, an effective system for countering the enemy's reconnaissance UAVs is currently set up. In addition, the commander of the 14th separate regiment of the BpAK spoke about providing his unit with -wings-. -50 percent is provided by measures from the side of partners, if we are talking specifically about intelligence wings. 50% are partners, 30% are the state and 20% are volunteers,- he said. We will remind, the Armed Forces of Ukraine have started work first training school for operators of unmanned ground robotic complexes (BpNK). As reported by ArmyInform, in the Forces of unmanned systems name the specialists who are in the greatest need: drivers of various categories, clerks, repairmen of various electrical appliances.

Title: Torture, abuse and training -specialists-: the GUR spoke about the torture system of the Russian Fed...
Description: told this during a speech at the forum -Genocidal practices of the Russian Federation in Ukraine: from the Holodomor to Russian-Ukrainian War- representative of the State Department of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Andriy Yusov. He cited the facts about the system of violating the rights of prisoners built in the Russian Federation. -In most cases, it was not about the use of force to obtain information. These are intentional tortures to break a person's resistance, break their personality, degrade their dignity and force them to give up everything that is valuable to that person. Or to break someone who is close to him,- said Andriy Yusov. According to him, a whole system of torture operates in the aggressor country. -Individuals are responsible for this. This is how individual -specialists- are trained - the types of torture are described, and they learn from them. This is something that cannot be imagined by any representative of a Western civilized country,- he noted. Andriy Yusov also noted that the structures responsible for monitoring the observance and protection of the Geneva Conventions and humanitarian law do not actually work. -Yes, we are talking about the International Committee of the Red Cross, which Russia, on the one hand, is effectively depriving it of the opportunity to work: it does not allow access to places of detention, does not involve it in training and exchanges. At the same time, the position of the ICRC, frankly speaking, in many cases should be much more proactive,- stressed Andriy Yusov. He emphasized that it is not Ukraine as a victim that should talk about the recorded -absolutely flagrant- examples of violations of the Geneva Conventions on the part of the Russian Federation, but those structures that are responsible for monitoring their observance and implementation. He reminded that even in these difficult conditions, Ukraine continues to work on the return from captivity of our captured defenders and kidnapped civilians. During the full-scale invasion, 58 exchanges already took place: almost 4 thousand Ukrainians managed to return home. -Unfortunately, thousands of others are still in question. And it is necessary to fight for them: both for the military and for the civilians,- emphasized Andriy Yusov. We will remind you that in October-November of this year 13 criminal proceedings were registered /a> according to the facts of the shooting of 54 Ukrainian prisoners of war. This is a third of all proceedings initiated in 2024 on such facts. As reported by ArmyInform, the Prosecutor General's Office reported on the initiated investigation into the fact shooting by Russian servicemen of five captured soldiers of the Armed Forces near Vugledar.

Title: Rustem Umyerov thanked Lithuania for the supply of weapons and training of the Ukrainian military
Description: He wrote about this on November 23 on his Facebook page. The meeting was also attended by the head of the Parliamentary Committee for National Security and Defense, Hiedrimas Jeglinskas. They discussed the security situation in Ukraine and the next steps to strengthen the Defense Forces. The Minister of Defense of Ukraine is grateful to Lithuania for comprehensive assistance: financing, supply of weapons, ammunition, drones, as well as training of the Ukrainian military. -It is also important that the Lithuanian Parliament continues to actively support us in the international arena,- Rustem Umierov noted. In addition, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine congratulated Mr. Skvernialis on his appointment to the position of Speaker of the Seimas and thanked him for the unchanging solidarity of the Lithuanian people, government and parliament. -Together we strengthen the defense and move towards victory!- - he summarized. Formerly the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov -yu-richnyczeyu-zbrojnyh-syl/->congratulated Lithuania on the 106th anniversary of the Armed Forces forces of the Republic of Lithuania. As a reminder, Ukraine and Lithuania discussed priority directions of cooperation for 2025. As reported by ArmyInform, Lithuania will invest 10 million euros in the production of Ukrainian long-range drones.

Title: -Vegan menu-, halal and kosher sukhpai: the MOU spoke about the standards and innovations of food in...
Description: This is what he told during SMALL TALK. -Changes in the food security system are ongoing. This is due to the fact that there are new challenges in the troops, new tasks, new strategy, new tactics. -Basically, our task is to make the use of food supply effective and appropriate, so that the fighters are well provided with caloric, quality and diverse food products,- Maksym Kayola noted. He said that dry food kits, so-called -sukhpai- - halal and kosher - are now being introduced for people with special religious beliefs. Such attention of the military leadership to their needs significantly increases morale. -This was implemented at the behest of the Minister of Defense of Ukraine, because he wants to provide for all families, types of troops, servicemen of all religious beliefs. We are also currently working on introducing a vegan menu for people who do not use products of animal origin according to their beliefs. But for this we need to change the -normatives-, we are working on this,- added the head of the Central Department for the Development of Material Support of the Ministry of Education and Culture. As ArmiyaInform reported, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine initiated important changes in the system of providing servicemen during treatment and rehabilitation. Thanks to the Resolution adopted by the Cabinet of Ministers, the mechanism has been improved vlasnosti/-> provision of improved nutrition to military personnel in health care institutions of all forms of ownership.

Title: The number of clashes per day increased to 125: the enemy is especially active in the Pokrovsky dire...
Description: This is reported in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 16 :00 November 23. Defense forces are holding the lines and taking all necessary measures to prevent a breach of the defense. The occupiers do not stop using artillery and aviation on the territory of Chernihiv and Sumy regions. Areas of Hrinivka, Bilovody, Oleksandria, Zhuravka and Obody settlements came under enemy fire. To date, the Russians have carried out 110 attacks on the territory of the Kursk region of the Russian Federation, including 9 from rocket salvo systems. In the Kharkiv direction four combat clashes took place today. Our troops repelled two Russian attacks in the Vovchansk region, two more clashes in the Tykhoi region are still ongoing. Eight assaults of the invaders were repelled by our soldiers near Hlushkivka, Synkivka, Zagryzovy, Novoplatonivka and Zeleny Gay in the Kupyansk direction, one more battle continues until now. The enemy launched an air strike in the Lozova region. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked seven times to no avail in the areas of Druzhelyubivka, Tverdokhlibovoy, Novoyehorivka, Grekivka and Terniv. With the support of aviation on the Seversky direction in the region of Belogorivka, our defenders repelled one enemy assault. In the Kramatorsk direction today, the enemy stormed the positions of the Ukrainian defenders in the Stupochok area once without success. Also, the enemy launched an air strike with unguided air missiles in the Chasovoy Yar area. In the Toretsk direction, the enemy twice unsuccessfully attacked the positions of our troops in the Toretsk districts, while at the same time carrying out airstrikes with guided aerial bombs in the Toretsk, Nelipivka, Katerynivka, Ivanopil and Zorya settlements, dropping a total of ten bombs. In the Pokrovsky direction in the areas of the settlements of Promin, Lysivka, Krutyy Yar, Myrnograd, Hryhorivka, Dachenske, Zhovte, Pushkine, Petrivka and Pustinka, the enemy has already attacked 28 times since the beginning of the day. The defense forces repulsed 23 attacks, and fierce fighting continues. The enemy also bombarded the settlements of Yablunivka, Zorya, Oleksandropil, Grodivka, Myrolyubivka and Elizavetivka, dropping a total of 16 guided aerial bombs. In the Kurakhiv direction, five clashes are ongoing in the districts of Berestki, Dalny and Romanivka. Seventeen enemy assaults have already been repelled by our defenders in the areas of Sontsivka, Zorya, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhove, Katerynivka and Antonivka settlements. In the Vremivsk direction, seven enemy assaults are underway near Velika Novosilka and Novodarivka, 18 enemy attacks in the area of ​​Trudovoy, Suhy Yali and Rivnopilly have already been repulsed. The enemy did not conduct active operations in the Orihiv and Gulyajpil directions. In the Dnieper direction our defenders repelled three enemy attacks. As reported by ArmyInform, as of the morning of November 23, during the day at the front, Russian invaders lost 1,420 people killed and wounded.

Title: Hunting -Magyar- for Russians, a group road cutter from the 47th brigade: a stream from a front-line...
Description: The Russians, who managed to survive the first attack, were finished off with mortars, FPV drones, drops, as well as the know-how of the Bulava unit - a machine gun on a drone. The -Birds of Magyar- unit showed a new video with the destruction of Russians. This time, their drones, in addition to single-handedly eliminating the occupiers, hit the golf cart and everyone on it. The marines showed a video of the extreme evacuation of their comrades. The 505th OBMP armored group conducted an extremely difficult operation - along the entire route, the evacuation vehicle was hunted by enemy FPVs, and the road was controlled by Russian artillery. The enemy still managed to hit the car, but this did not stop our soldiers. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - Major Andriy Makarenko and Captain Artem Golub.

Title: Recruitment and training of recruits: conditions of service in the Unmanned Systems Forces
Description: This was told by the commander of the 14th separate BpAK regiment under the pseudonym -Charlie - in an interview for Grunt media. -Key positions are occupied by people whom we initially transferred from other parts. Some of them previously served in SSO units. Only certain specialties, for example, in logistics, come to us by mobilization. We select people for combat positions ourselves. And these are contract workers,- he said. According to him, the level of material support is similar to any units of the Ground Forces. -The tariff is the same as in the infantry,- added Charlie. He also told how recruits are trained. -People who enter the service in our regiment are sent for basic general military training to one of our training centers for unmanned systems,- said the commander of the 14th separate regiment of the BpAK. As he said, the preparation lasts one and a half months. -After that, a person gets into his unit in the regiment and then undergoes -further training-, which is conducted either by his immediate supervisor - the commander, or by a group of instructors who are in the regiment's headquarters,- Charlie said. He noted that training takes place in every direction separately. -If a serviceman enters a combat unit, he goes through all the stages of combat training. In the same way, our units are divided into different types of unmanned aircraft complexes. Both training and -further training- are conducted accordingly,- the military officer explained. Previously, specialists were named in the Forces of unmanned systems , who are in the greatest need: drivers of various categories, clerks, repairmen of various electrical appliances. As reported by ArmyInform, currently function44 recruiting centers in the regions and 3 active centers in the vertical of the General Staff of the Armed Forces. ArmyInform also reminds that you can join the army either directly at recruiting centers, and use aggregator of vacancies in the ZSU.

Title: One, two, three - the occupiers were found: our drones exposed the hiding places of enemy UAV operat...
Description: The video of combat work was published by our defenders on social networks on November 23. -The shelters and hiding places of the enemy UAV operators were not lucky, not to mention the Russian infantry. Our boys continue their productive month, increasing the losses of equipment and personnel to the enemy,- Ukrainian defenders commented. As ArmyInform reported, in the border zone in the north of the Kharkiv region, fighters of the Defense Forces reliably control are tank-dangerous directions of possible enemy assault actions and destroy enemy armored vehicles even at the stage of accumulation, including including on the territory of the Russian Federation.

Title: Shrapnel in the chest: a Russian attack injured a resident of the Kherson region
Description: informs Kherson OVA about this. The victim received explosive and craniocerebral injuries, a contusion and a shrapnel wound to the chest. The emergency medical team quickly took him to the hospital, where doctors are providing the necessary assistance. Law enforcement officers are documenting the consequences of the attack in order to further bring the aggressor to justice. As reported by ArmyInform, five civilians came under the attack of the occupiers in the Kherson Oblast.

Title: Recruiting in the Forces of unmanned systems: who is wanted for the ranks of units
Description: the commander of the 14th separate regiment of unmanned aviation complexes of the SBS of the Armed Forces of Ukraine told about this under the pseudonym -Charlie- in an interview for -Grunt- media. -Today, we have organized our small recruiting center, which is constantly recruiting candidates. We know about changes in military legislation that commanders of military units can recruit servicemen without TCC. This is what we are currently working on,- he assured. According to him, there is an opportunity to join their unit both from civilian life and by desire to transfer from other military units. He notes that it is difficult to transfer from other units, but it is possible to negotiate with commanders -on horizontal communications-. -There is a large part of military personnel who, unfortunately, during the 2.5 years of war, lose their health, who receive various psychological injuries, who, for many other reasons, cannot serve directly and perform their duties precisely in the trenches , on the front lines, but they are specialists in various fields who can serve in our regiment,- Charlie emphasized. For example, as he noted, volunteers can serve in them as drivers of various categories and perform tasks related to logistics, or work in BpAK repair shops. -We now have a great need for drivers of various categories, clerks of various services, i.e. people who can work at a computer with various types of programs, do paperwork. And there is a great need for specialists who were in civilian life a master repairer of some electrical appliances, various types of gadgets, etc.,- he said. As reported by ArmyInform, currently function44 recruiting centers in the regions and 3 active centers in the vertical of the General Staff of the Armed Forces. ArmyInform also reminds that you can join the army either directly at recruiting centers, and use aggregator of vacancies in the ZSU.

Title: -Together we strengthen the security of the whole of Europe-: Rustem Umierov congratulated Lithuania...
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. -It is an honor for me to congratulate our Lithuanian friends on this important day,- the minister said in his address. Rustem Umyerov emphasized that Ukraine highly values ​​Lithuania's support, which is not only the transfer of drones, ammunition and equipment, but also a symbol of friendship, trust and joint struggle for freedom and independence. -Together we continue to strengthen the security not only of our countries, but also of the whole of Europe,- the minister added, expressing confidence in further cooperation between Ukraine and Lithuania. As a reminder, Ukraine and Lithuania discussed priority directions of cooperation for 2025. As reported by ArmyInform, Lithuania invests 10 million euros in the production of Ukrainian long-range drones.

Title: They are hysterically throwing new reinforcements into battle and driving additional equipment into ...
Description: About it on the air -Society. News- reported the commander of the battalion of attack unmanned aerial vehicles of the -Achilles- complexes of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after Ivan Sirko, Yuriy Fedorenko. -As a result, the enemy has turned the personnel into a kamikaze mode: they hysterically throw all new and new reinforcements into battle, look for reserves, send into battle those who should not be fighting, like a stormtrooper, and drive additional equipment into battle. As a result, we have round-the-clock attack and assault actions of the enemy and their losses are colossal,- Yuriy Fedorenko said. During the past day, the enemy was not able to take a single position from the Defense Forces of Ukraine, and at the same time, only the -Achilles- battalion destroyed about 35 invaders (killed and wounded). We will remind, according to Yuriy Fedorenko, in some aspects -nemaye-inshogo-vyboru/->the enemy goes to the front line of a combat engagement up to 12 kilometers, then move in shock-assault operations. -The wounded are not taken away from such a distance. As a result, wounded occupants often commit suicide by shooting themselves in the head. Captives surrender reluctantly because of propaganda. So be it - the more we destroy, the better,- summed up the commander. Earlier, ArmyInform reported how they operate on the battlefield occupiers disguised as pixels.

Title: Ukraine lights memorial candles: the President called to remember the victims of the Holodomor
Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky emphasized the importance of remembering these events. -Our duty is to remember, remember and tell the world the truth about the brutal crime, about the genocide that was committed against Ukrainians,- the head of state said. On this day, the memory of the victims is commemorated with a minute of silence, candles are lit and memorial events are held throughout the country. Special attention is paid to spreading the truth about the genocide of the Ukrainian people so that similar crimes never happen again. -Bright memory to all innocent victims, adults and children, who became victims of the Holodomor,- the President summed up. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov addressed Ukrainians on the Holodomor Memorial Day, emphasizing the importance of preserving historical memory and countering Russian aggression.

Title: Ukraine and Lithuania discussed priority areas of cooperation for 2025
Description: reported this by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. The main topics were the strengthening of Ukraine's defense capabilities, support for the Ukrainian military, and the development of the defense industry. According to Rustem Umyerov, modern challenges require new approaches, and Lithuania remains an important partner in these issues. The minister expressed his gratitude to President Nauseda and the Lithuanian people for their leadership in solving security issues at the European level. As reported by ArmyInform, Lithuania invests 10 million euros in the production of Ukrainian long-range drones.

Title: 106 creatures and 94 shelters: losses of the occupiers in the Kharkiv direction
Description: Details about the situation in the north of Kharkiv region and the losses of the Russian occupiers were informed at Kharkiv OTU. During the past day, the enemy stormed the positions of our defenders three times in the area of ​​the settlement of Vovchansk. the Russian occupiers launched 1 missile strike, 7 airstrikes using 11 guided aerial bombs and 12 unguided aerial missiles, as well as 36 kamikaze drone strikes. They carried out 346 shelling of the positions of defenders of Ukraine. The defense forces respond adequately to the actions of the enemy and continue to effectively destroy the manpower, weapons and military equipment of the Russian invaders. In addition to the loss of manpower in the Kharkiv direction, the enemy also lost destroyed and damaged 46 units of weapons and military equipment, in particular: Earlier ArmyInform reported that Kharkiv OTU denied the information about the presence of the North Korean military in Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: Another day of shelling: 484 residents of Donetsk region were evacuated from dangerous zones
Description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk OVA, Vadym Filashkin. 4 people were injured in Sontsivka of the Kurakhiv community. An infrastructure facility was damaged in Udachnensk hromada, and one person was injured in Shahivsk hromada, and 2 pieces of equipment were damaged. In Pokrovsk, 5 buildings and a gas pipeline were damaged as a result of shelling. Marinsk and Grodivsk communities remain under fire. One person was injured in the village of Terny of the Lyman community. One person was killed and two others were injured in Krasnotorka of the Kramatorsk hromada. In the Chasovoyarsk community, 4 private houses and 2 non-residential premises were damaged. In Siversk, shelling damaged two two-story buildings. 484 people, including 38 children, were evacuated from the front line during the day. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy dropped ammunition in front of a police car on Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: Before the assault - 12 km on foot: why in Kharkiv Oblast the occupiers have no other choice
Description: The commander of the battalion of strike unmanned aviation complexes of the 92nd separate brigade named after Koshovo told about this on the air of -Suspilne Novosti- chieftain of Ivan Sirk, Yury Fedorenko. — In Kupyan region, in some areas, they go to the front line of a combat clash up to 12 km away. -Imagine - 12 km carrying everything, in order to then switch to shock-assault actions,- he said. The officer explained why the Russian military is forced to act in this way. — Why exactly such a shade? Because everything that appears from transport on the battlefield - two-wheeled motorcycles, buggies, lightly armored and armored vehicles - is immediately taken under fire control by our guns, anti-tank weapons and, accordingly, UAVs. As a result, it is being destroyed, the military said. The drone commander reported what percentage of Russian equipment is destroyed on the battlefield. -Statistics say that 90-95% of lightly armored and armored vehicles that end up in the affected area burn up on the battlefield or are seriously damaged,- he said. From the overview, the enemy has no choice but to go to the front on foot. -Accordingly, the enemy has no other choice but to delay on foot,- explained Yury Fedorenko. Earlier, ArmyInform reported how they act on the battlefield disguised as a pixel occupier.

Title: Machine gun on a drone: the Armed Forces showed an innovative approach to the destruction of the occ...
Description: informs about this by a separate presidential brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytskyi. The enemy column was eliminated by the attack drone units of the Separate Presidential Brigade, including -Chimeras-, -Bulava- and -NOVA-. Thanks to coordinated work, the enemy's equipment was completely destroyed, and a significant number of the occupiers were eliminated. Those who survived the hit on the equipment were finished off with the help of mortars, kamikaze FPV drones and ammunition drops. The innovative approach of the -Bulava- unit, which used a drone equipped with a machine gun, was noted. The successful operation was made possible by the professionalism of the drone operators and competent command. Clear interaction with National Guard soldiers who provided intelligence and fire support was also noted. This operation demonstrates the effectiveness of modern drones in the hands of the Ukrainian military and their important role in modern warfare. As reported by ArmyInform, always one step ahead: -Phoenix- showed the moments of the occupiers's collapse.

Title: Lithuania will invest 10 million euros in the production of Ukrainian long-range drones
Description: This was reported by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. The memorandum between Ukraine and Lithuania, which was signed by the defense ministers of Lithuania and Ukraine, provides for the creation of a mechanism to support the security and defense forces of Ukraine through investments in the Ukrainian defense and industrial complex. Within the framework of the agreement, Lithuania allocated the first tranche in the amount of 10 million euros, which will be directed to the production of long-range weapons, in particular drones of the Paljanitsa project. Currently, the Lithuanian side is completing the bureaucratic procedures, and the funds will be transferred in the near future. Minister Rustem Umyerov expressed his gratitude to Lithuania for its constant support to Ukraine and to Minister Laurinas Kaschyunas personally for his leadership. -This is an agreement that opens up new opportunities for Lithuanian investments in our defense industry and contributes to the expansion of the strategic partnership between our countries,- Umierov noted. In addition to signing the memorandum, the parties discussed key priorities for 2025, including the training and equipping of Ukrainian brigades, provision of ammunition, air defense equipment, and further development of cooperation in the defense industry. Ukraine and Lithuania continue to strengthen their partnership in the defense sphere, demonstrating a joint willingness to work towards victory in the war against Russian aggression. As reported by ArmyInform, the Czech Republic will give Ukraine 500,000 shells by the end of the year.

Title: The guard dog of the occupiers: a traitor in epaulettes who switched to the side of Russia was expos...
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. According to the investigation, during the capture of the village of Dvorichna by Russian troops, the policeman voluntarily began working for the Russian occupation authorities. Initially, he was engaged in receiving applications and drafting documents in accordance with the legislation of the aggressor state. In the summer of 2022, after confirming his loyalty to the occupiers, the man received the position of -v. at. of the senior investigator of the investigative department- in the so-called -Department of Internal Affairs of the Temporary Civil Administration of the Kharkiv Region-. Later, he was reassigned as the chief of -Police Station No. 1- in Dvorichnaya. In his position, the traitor directed his subordinates, in particular during the protection of public order at propaganda events such as the -First Bell- in local educational institutions. For his activities, he received a monthly salary of 60,000 Russian rubles. After the liberation of Kupyan region, the suspect fled to Russia, where he is hiding from Ukrainian justice. The former policeman was dismissed from the ranks of the National Police of Ukraine, and he is currently wanted. The traitor will be tried in absentia in the Ordzhonikidze District Court of Kharkiv. He faces up to life in prison on all charges. As reported by ArmyInform, sentenced to 10 years of imprisonment 55-year-old resident of Donetsk region for cooperation with Russian special services. The intruder transmitted to the enemy the geolocation of Ukrainian military positions in the Slavyansk direction, targeting Russian missiles at strong points and long-range artillery of the Armed Forces.

Title: Shooting lists and mobile crematoria: Russia planned the genocide of Ukrainians long before the inva...
Description: This was announced the head of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, Lieutenant General Kyrylo Budanov, during the forum -Genocidal Practices Russian Federation in Ukraine: from the Holodomor to the Russian-Ukrainian War-, which took place on November 22, 2024. According to Kirill Budanov, the preparation included the creation of firing lists, the deployment of mobile mobile crematoria and the organization of mass burials. Russian propaganda and the state machine called for the destruction of Ukrainians, based on theses voiced in Putin's article published in July 2021. In this article, the Russian dictator denied the right of Ukrainians to exist, which became the ideological basis of future crimes. Kyrylo Budanov noted that total Ukrainophobia has become not only the policy of the Russian authorities, but also a mandatory public conviction. Before the start of the invasion, the occupiers were briefed on the location of mass graves and the compilation of firing lists. They planned to include Ukrainian language and literature teachers, ATO veterans, journalists, priests, public figures and others who supported Ukrainian statehood. The head of the GUR MOU emphasized that the mass crimes of the Russian military in Buch, Borodyanka, Gostomel, Izyum, Mariupol and other cities were not chaotic, but planned and synchronous. These actions were based on the doctrinal provisions of the Russian genocidal policy. The forum, in addition to military experts, was attended by Holodomor researchers, historians, public representatives and foreign guests, who discussed the crimes of the Russian government against the Ukrainian people, which have continued since the Holodomor until today. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov addressed Ukrainians on the Holodomor Memorial Day, emphasizing the importance of preserving historical memory and countering Russian aggression.

Title: An ambulance that will not come: Russia has brought a decline in the medicine of the occupied Luhans...
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysohor, the head of the Luhansk Regional Military Administration. In many cities, even before, only one ambulance crew was on duty per shift, as a result of which calls often went unanswered, and patients waited for hours. Tragic cases when people did not wait for a doctor have repeatedly become a reason for criticism. Although the number of special vehicles allegedly increased on paper, the real ambulances provided by Russia disappeared without a trace. Instead, doctors, paramedics and drivers are now being cut. In Starobilsk, air alerts are regularly announced, even when there is no threat in the neighboring areas or in the entire -rear- part of the -LNR-. During such events, propaganda meetings are held in schools, during which children are moved to damp, unfurnished basements, where anti-Ukrainian lectures are organized. In addition, the occupation administration regularly organizes meetings of children with the Russian military, using them to plant propaganda. These actions of the occupiers cause increasing indignation among the population, which is faced with the decline of the medical field and aggressive propaganda in educational institutions. As reported by ArmyInform, in Alchevsk, as well as in other settlements of the temporarily occupied Luhansk region, the situation with the removal of garbage has remained critical for more than ten years. Spontaneous landfills continue to grow, and instead of solving the problem the occupation administration chose the path of repression, installing more than 100 video surveillance cameras to fine citizens for littering.

Title: The Defense Forces told how the occupiers are attacking Chasiv Yar
Description: A representative of the 24th OMBr named . King Danyla Andriy Polukhin. -They started shelling the city with all types of artillery and aviation. They are attacking from barrel artillery, from closed positions with tanks, they are very actively using drones - both skids and kamikaze, as well as anti-aircraft missiles,- said Andriy Polukhin. According to Andrii Polukhin, over the past day, the enemy tried to storm the positions of the Ukrainian military, but was unsuccessful. The enemy is now using the tactics of small groups, trying to penetrate to the rear of the positions to conduct their operational activities there. These groups, although penetrating the rear, remain blocked - unable to bring up ammunition, receive reinforcements or establish supplies. Groups reveal themselves over time and are destroyed. -Against our boys are regular units of the Russian Armed Forces - fighters who are being trained for combat operations in the conditions of urban development and drone warfare. They are well equipped and ready to carry out assaults,- noted the representative of the 24th OMBr. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the occupiers near Chasovoy Yar are blocking themselves. The main task of our units now is the defense and neutralization of enemy groups.

Title: The enemy dropped ammunition in front of a police car in the Kharkiv region
Description: This was reported by Oleg Synegubov, the head of Kharkiv OVA. Three hits were recorded in the pine forest in the village of Liptsi and the village of Slobozhanske. There are no casualties. Around 6:00 p.m., in the village of Kivsharivka, Kupyan district, the occupiers dropped ammunition in front of an official car of the Main Directorate of the National Police. There were three people in the car. The car was damaged, but no one was injured. In the city of Kupyansk and the village of Doroshivka, the enemy used FPV drones. No casualties were recorded. As part of the increased evacuation measures, 32 people were evacuated from the Kupyanskyi and Borivskyi directions. As reported by ArmyInform, five civilians came under the attack of the occupiers in the Kherson Oblast.

Title: Always one step ahead: -Phoenix- showed the moments of the collapse of the occupiers
Description: About this informs State Border Service of Ukraine. In particular, since the beginning of November, -Phoenix- has inflicted significant losses on the enemy: destroyed 4 units of enemy armored vehicles, -Hail- and a large number of infantry.

Title: -They are activated to destabilize the situation-: how the occupiers disguised as pixels act
Description: told the commander of the battalion of strike unmanned aviation complexes of the 92nd separate brigade named after the Kosh Ataman Ivan Sirk Yuriy Fedorenko told about this. -Now they are resorting to a new tactic, namely: dressing up as a Ukrainian pixel, trying to infiltrate through our battle formations into the rear areas,- he said. The officer explained the purpose of the Russian invaders. - They are there in a certain waiting mode, while the strike group is assembled, which begins active operations from the front. And that's when they step up to destabilize the situation, damage our reserves, mortars and other firepower, the military said. However, the Defense Forces are well aware of this insidious enemy tactic and effectively counter it. — Since we are talking about this with you, the Defense Forces are very well aware of such tactics of the enemy, since he has been using them since the beginning of an essentially full-scale war. Only now it is gaining a larger volume, said the commander of the Ukrainian drones. Ukrainian defenders timely detect the occupiers hidden in the pixel and eliminate them or capture them. - The vast majority of these groups are detected by the Defense Forces, eliminated and captured when the opportunity arises. But not all of them surrender, so they are mostly liquidated, said Yuriy Fedorenko. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that occupiers dressed in Ukrainian uniforms are effectively detected on the field battle.

Title: Voyage of a new generation: we take a backpack, go to Romania and return to the sound of sirens
Description: About this informs State Border Service of Ukraine. Two violators were arrested immediately, but the other two tried to escape. They were quickly stopped thanks to the use of a drone that adjusted the actions of the response team. The detainees were men aged 24 to 36, residents of Donetsk, Cherkasy and Dnipropetrovsk regions. Violators are subject to administrative protocols under Articles 185-10 and 204-1 of the Code of Ukraine on Administrative Offenses. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Kupyan adventure in kamikaze mode: the Armed Forces explained how the Russians managed to jump into ...
Description: told the commander of the battalion of strike unmanned aviation complexes of the 92nd separate brigade named after the Kosh Ataman Ivan Sirk Yuriy Fedorenko told about this. — The situation unfolded as follows: taking advantage of the unfavorable weather conditions - the fog, which was thick enough, the enemy in kamikaze mode used one unit of armored equipment, such as a tank with trawls that removes mine barriers, and two MTLB. These are combat armored vehicles for transporting, in particular, infantry units, he said. For the place of an unexpected attack, the enemy chose an area least suitable for the use of armored vehicles. -At high speed, [the Russians] jumped in at the place that is the least passable for lightly armored and armored vehicles,- explained the soldier. However, as soon as the equipment and manpower of the occupiers were discovered by the fighters of the Defense Forces, the enemy was inflicted with fire damage. The equipment was burned, and the landing party was partly destroyed, partly captured. - As soon as they crossed this line, they were detected by the Defense Forces, after which a fire was inflicted, as a result of which the tank was burned, two MTLBs were burned, and the enemy's assault infantry was eliminated, - Yuriy Fedorenko said. Those of the Russian military who were lucky enough to be captured provided important intelligence. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how in Kharkiv Oblast, a Ukrainian Paladin hit a Russian tank hiding in a garage.

Title: The defense forces hit areas where enemy personnel were concentrated
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Over the past day, missile troops and artillery of the Defense Forces hit four areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and military equipment and three artillery systems of the Russian invaders. We will remind you that last The loss of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,420 people. Also, Ukrainian soldiers destroyed 20 tanks, 36 armored combat vehicles, 24 artillery systems, 105 operational-tactical UAVs, 73 cars and 3 special equipment units of the occupiers. As reported by ArmyInform, almost 200 enemy assaults on the front: the enemy is concentrating efforts in two directions.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Minister of Defense: Hunger as a weapon is a crime we will not forget
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. -This day reminds us that the enemy is willing to use any means to achieve their goals. Hunger as a weapon is a crime for which millions of Ukrainians paid with their lives. We remember our ancestors and honor their memory,- the minister noted. Rustem Umyerov emphasized that Russia still uses the same methods today: spreading disinformation, denying historical facts and using economic pressure. The Kremlin, as in the past, is trying to manipulate grain, creating a threat of famine not only for Ukraine, but also for the whole world. -In the 21st century, the enemy will not go unpunished. We are destroying the Russian fleet that is blocking the grain corridor, and we are striking bases and warehouses where attacks on our agricultural infrastructure are being planned. Ukraine is already bringing the aggressor to justice,- he emphasized. The minister appealed to his compatriots to honor the memory of the Holodomor victims and to continue the struggle for independence. -We are fighting for a peaceful future of Ukraine and the world. We remember the tragedies of the past and take revenge for our tortured ancestors. Ukraine will win, and Russian evil will be punished,- Rustem Umyerov concluded.

Title: Almost 200 enemy assaults on the front: the enemy concentrates efforts in two directions
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. However, the Ukrainian defenders steadily restrained the onslaught of the occupiers, inflicting significant losses on the enemy. According to detailed information, yesterday the enemy launched two missile strikes against the positions of Ukrainian units and populated areas with the use of two missiles, as well as 67 airstrikes, dropping 97 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, it carried out 4,560 attacks, including 123 from multiple rocket launchers, and engaged 1,490 kamikaze drones. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of the settlements of Liptsi, Ivanivka, Bilogorivka, Zakitne, Siversk, Velyka Novosilka, Novy Komar, Mala Tokmachka, Kozatske. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy stormed the positions of our defenders three times in the area of ​​the settlement of Vovchansk. In the Kupyansk direction, six attacks by invaders took place during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Zeleny Gay, Hlushkivka, and Zagryzovy. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked 19 times. Tried to wedge into our defenses near Torsky, Grekivka, Terni, Novoehorivka and Makiivka. In the Kramatorsk direction the occupiers attacked five times in the area of ​​Stupochki and Chasovoy Yar. On the Toretsk direction the enemy launched eight attacks in the Toretsk direction. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 44 offensive actions of the aggressor in the direction of Myrolyubivka, Promen, Lysivka, Sukhoi Yar, Pustinka, Hryhorivka, Dachenskyi, Petrivka, and Pushkini. In the Kurakhiv direction the defense forces repelled 36 Russian attacks. The occupiers most actively tried to advance in the Berestki, Sontsivka, Dalny, Novodmytrivka, Kurakhovo, Katerynivka, Romanivka, and Antonivka districts. In the Vremivsk direction the enemy carried out 30 assaults on our positions in the districts of Trudovoy, Kostyantynopolskyi, Rozlyv, Rozdolny, Suhy Yali and Novodarivka. In the Orikhov direction, the occupying forces once unsuccessfully stormed the positions of the Defense Forces in the Kamiansky area. In the Dnieper direction, the enemy unsuccessfully attacked the positions of our defenders four times. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. We will remind you that last The loss of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,420 people. Also, Ukrainian soldiers destroyed 20 tanks, 36 armored combat vehicles, 24 artillery systems, 105 operational-tactical UAVs, 73 cars and 3 special equipment units of the occupiers.

Title: Five civilians were attacked by the occupiers in the Kherson region
Description: reported this by Oleksandr Prokudin, the head of Kherson Regional State Administration. Antonivka, Sadove, Rozlyv, Komyshany, Sofiivka, Stanislav, Tomyna Balka, Shiroka Balka, Bilozerka, Kizomys, Beryslav, Kachkarivka, Osokorivka, Tyaginka, Odradokamyanka, Kozatske and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. As the head of the OVA noted, the Russian military hit the residential quarters of the populated areas of the region, in particular, they damaged 9 private houses. The occupiers also vandalized a warehouse, a garage, a trolleybus and private cars. As reported by ArmyInform, numerous shelling covered Zaporizhzhia: there are victims, an injured child.

Title: The enemy keeps 20 ships in the Black Sea: there is a threat of a missile strike
Description: The Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. In the Mediterranean Sea, 2 enemy ships, 1 of which is a carrier of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 16 missiles. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, The government approved the plan implementation of the Maritime Security Strategy of Ukraine, developed by the Ministry of Defense.

Title: Dozens of artillery systems, anti-aircraft missiles and more than 1,400 infantrymen: the General Sta...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.
