As ArmiyaInform reported, on the night of November 21, the Russians, as stated in the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, struck Ukraine for the first time with a medium-range intercontinental ballistic missile. published a video, which shows six powerful flashes of light in the sky. Perhaps their number is equal to the number of warheads carried by the Russian missile.

Title: Rustem Umyerov: Sweden will finance the production of Ukrainian long-range drones
Description: About this notified Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov on his page in Facebook. -It was agreed upon with my colleague and friend, Minister of Defense Paul Jonsson, during my working visit to Sweden. This is another step towards strengthening Ukraine's defense capabilities, which demonstrates the trust of our partners in our military-industrial potential,- Rustem Umyerov said. He informed that the meeting also discussed plans for financing aid to Ukraine for 2025. -We are working to ensure that this support is even greater and meets the real needs of our defenders. A separate focus is equipping our brigades. We are finalizing agreements with our Nordic partners. I thank Sweden for its constant support, which helps us bring our joint victory closer,- added the head of the defense department. It should be noted that the -Danish model- provides for the financing of the production of weapons and equipment in Ukraine by Western partners. Denmark became the first country to work according to this format, financing the production of Ukrainian self-propelled guns -Bohdan-. As reported by ArmyInform, 12 countries united in the Northern Group in order to strengthen security and support Ukraine.

Title: Air strike on Kostyantynivka: 6 injured and a fire in an educational institution
Description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. Pokrovskyi district: Kramatorskyi district: Bakhmutskyi district: In total, in 24 hours, Russian troops carried out 8 attacks on populated areas of Donetsk region. 201 people, including 19 children, were evacuated from the front line. As reported by ArmyInform, Russian strikes led to the death of the civilian population Kherson region.

Title: The enemy shelled the suburbs of Kramatorsk, there are dead and wounded
Description: reported this by the head of the Donetsk Regional State Administration, Vadym Filashkin. The village came under enemy fire this morning. According to preliminary information, there were 6 strikes. All responsible services are working on the spot, the exact consequences of the shelling are being established. As ArmiyaInform correspondents report, loud explosions were heard in Kramatorsk, the shelling lasted for about 20 minutes. We will remind, on the night of November 22 as a result of an attack by UAVs in Sumy two people died, another 12 were injured of varying degrees of severity. The occupiers for the first time applied in the city of “Shakhedi” with shrapnel.

Title: Psychedelic solo assaults: recluses are sent to attack in the Orihiv direction
Description: The head of the communications department of the 118th separate mechanized brigade, Dmytro Pelikh, told about this on the air of -Suspilne.Novyny-. According to Dmytro Pelikh, the attacks of the occupiers are as incomprehensible as possible. In fact, these are not even assaults, but individual actions of the occupiers in the direction of Ukrainian fortifications. -Actions like this look as strange as possible. Because they send one or two attack aircraft to our well-fortified positions,- said Dmytro Pelikh. Earlier, ArmyInform reported, occupiers are adapting to conditions on battlefield in the south of Ukraine. They try to use as little armor as possible, instead operating in small groups of infantry.

Title: Drones and robotics for the Armed Forces: the Ministry of Defense, together with the deputies, is wo...
Description: This was discussed during the meeting of the Temporary Special Commission of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine on the Protection of Investors' Rights, which was attended by Deputy Minister of Defense Dmytro Klimenkov and Director of the Procurement Policy Department of the Ministry of Defense Hlib Kanevskyi. Representatives of the Ministry of Defense discussed the effectiveness of the development and implementation of preferential financing programs and portfolio guarantees for the development of the Ukrainian defense-industrial complex with people's deputies. Dmytro Klimenkov noted that the expansion of financial instruments to support Ukrainian manufacturers of high-tech weapons is critically important for strengthening defense capabilities. -This will accelerate localization and increase the scale of production, in particular, of deep-strike drones, UAVs, electronic warfare equipment and robotic complexes. More than UAH 90 billion have already been contracted for 2024-2025: 55% — for long-range drones, 37% — for other UAVs, 6% — for EW and 2% for robotic complexes. This approach will make it possible to provide the Armed Forces with modern equipment even more effectively,- he said. Hleb Kanevskyi reported on the implementation of purchases of high-tech defense goods. -Investments of the Ministry of Defense in innovative defense solutions, such as unmanned aerial vehicles, robotic complexes and deep-strike drones, are aimed not only at strengthening defense capabilities, but also at stimulating the development of Ukrainian technological enterprises, creating new jobs and ensuring stable growth of the defense industry,- he emphasized . The TSC meeting became an important platform for the exchange of opinions on the integration of experience and the optimization of legislative mechanisms that will contribute to the development of a strategically important industry. -The Ministry of Defense expresses its gratitude for the invitation to participate in the event and confirms readiness for a constructive dialogue for the joint strengthening of Ukraine's defense potential,- the ministry said in a statement. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukrainian manufacturers participated for the first time in a series of international tenders, which included two lots: for the production of advanced FPV drones with autonomous functions and sustainable communications, as well as interceptor drones.

Title: - White tickets abroad: details of a corruption scheme to evade mobilization
Description: reports this by the Specialized Prosecutor's Office in the Defense Sector of the Western Region. It is noted that six suspects, including officials, doctors and ex-law enforcement officers, have been active since August 2023. They helped conscripts avoid mobilization by creating fake medical reports. The scheme involved: The cost of such services was between 9 and 14 thousand US dollars. The investigation documented two cases of transfer of funds in the amount of 18 thousand dollars. Currently, law enforcement officers are conducting searches, seizing medical documentation, and checking the suspects' involvement in other similar cases. The issue of choosing preventive measures and removing them from their posts is also being decided. The investigation continues under the procedural guidance of the prosecutor's office. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The Military Law and Order Service talked about three options for returning to service after the SZH
Description: About this in an interview with ArmiyaInform, the deputy chief of the Main Department of the Military Law and Order Service, Colonel Oleksandr Grynchuk, said. The first option concerns servicemen, about whom information has already been entered in the Unified Register of Pretrial Investigations. In such a case, the serviceman can independently, at the stage of the pre-trial investigation, apply in writing to the investigator, the prosecutor, directly to the court or come to the nearest administrative body of the VSP. But there are still certain conditions. In particular, this applies to servicemen who have committed FGM for the first time. There must also be a written consent of the commander of the military unit to continue his military service. The second most common return option. It applies to servicemen who have committed a felony, the duration of which did not exceed three days. That is, before the acquisition of signs of a criminal offense. In this case, this serviceman can independently return to the military unit to continue his service. The commander has to find out the circumstances why the serviceman committed the SZH. And then disciplinary responsibility is applied to him. The third option is when a serviceman who has committed a criminal offense wants to return to service, and at the same time, the information about the offense is not entered in the EDPR. That is, 3 days have already passed, according to the disciplinary statute, the commander of the military unit has appointed an official investigation, which can last a month, but there are also different situations. If the official investigation has not been completed or the investigator has sent the materials for revision, and the information has not yet been entered into the ERDR, such a serviceman with the participation of the VSP is delivered to the reserve battalions that are part of the Armed Forces. There is an algorithm approved by the Commander-in-Chief, and in reserve battalions such a serviceman is transferred to military units and units of the Armed Forces. Depending on the situation, a decision is made to return him to service: either to the place where he served, or to another place. Read more in our material: How to return from the SZH correctly: about search, reserve battalions and transfer to another part ArmyInform reminds that you can join the army either directly at >recruiting centers, as well as use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces.

Title: Only kamikazes are going into battle: in one of the directions, the Russians are testing new canniba...
Description: Yuriy Syrotyuk, chief sergeant, told about this on the air -Suspilne Novyny- fire support companies of the 5th separate assault brigade. According to Yuriy Syrotyuk, it has come to the point that Russian attack aircraft are already going to Ukrainian positions one by one. -If they used to go three or four at a time, now they send their infantrymen one at a time. At random, in one direction. Those foot soldiers run into our formations, or are tracked by aerial reconnaissance. 90 percent remain in place, wounded or killed,- assured the chief sergeant of the fire support company of the 5th separate assault brigade. Earlier, ArmyInform reported , the occupiers resort to -meaty- combat reconnaissance and -meaty- assaults in Chasovoy Yar under fear of physical massacres by their own command. This tactic does not bring success, as the Defense Forces fighters regularly destroy small groups of enemy infantry that penetrate into the city.

Title: 34 traitors are deprived of state awards of Ukraine: the President signed a decree
Description: This is stated in the message at sites of the head of state. The first list included 34 people. Among them are former government officials, people's deputies, heads of the SBU and the Prosecutor General's Office, prosecutors, artists, Russian political, religious and cultural figures. All of them were deprived of state awards of Ukraine indefinitely. The maximum set of sanctions — 21 species — was applied to ten of them. It is not only about the deprivation of state awards of Ukraine, but also, in particular, about the blocking of assets, the cancellation of licenses and permits, and the complete cessation of trade operations. Among them, sanctions were applied to seven for the first time. In particular, this is the former first deputy leader of the political party -Party of Regions- and the head of the relevant faction Oleksandr Yefremov. He had the Order of Merit I-III degree and Prince Yaroslav the Wise V degree. Former First Deputy Prosecutor General of Ukraine Renat Kuzmin. He had the Order of Merit II-III degree and the title -Honored Lawyer of Ukraine-. Also, eight persons who are already under other sanctions of Ukraine were deprived of state awards of Ukraine. Former People's Deputy of II-IV and IX convocations Viktor Medvedchuk. He was awarded the -For Merit- orders of I-III degrees and Prince Yaroslav the Wise V degree, had the title of -Honored Lawyer of Ukraine-. Former Minister of Education and Science (2010–2014) Dmytro Tabachnyk. He had orders of Prince Yaroslav the Wise IV-V degrees and the title -Honored Worker of Science and Technology-. Former Prime Minister of Ukraine (2010–2014) Mykola Azarov, who was awarded the Order of Merit I-III degrees and Prince Yaroslav the Wise V degree, and also had the title -Honored Economist of Ukraine-. In addition, the former Prosecutor General of Ukraine (2010–2014) Viktor Pshonka was also deprived of the state award of Ukraine. He had the Order -For Merit- of the 3rd degree. Andriy Derkach, former People's Deputy of the III-IX convocations. He had the Order -For Merit- of the 3rd degree. Patriarch Kirill, head of the Russian Orthodox Church and former KGB agent. He was awarded the Order of Prince Yaroslav the Wise, 1st degree. Russian singers Mykola Baskov, Philip Kirkorov, Oleksandr Malinin, Russian composer Ihor Krutoy were deprived of the honorary title of -People's Artist of Ukraine-, and singers Karolina Kuyek (Ani Lorak) and Taisia ​​Povaly were also awarded the title of -Honored Artist of Ukraine-. The day before, the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine supported draft law No. 11410, which was initiated by the President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyi. This draft law provides for the deprivation of state awards of Ukraine of persons who have been convicted of serious or particularly serious crimes, criminal offenses against the foundations of national security of Ukraine, against peace, security of humanity and international legal order, certain crimes against public safety; those who promote the aggressor state or justify the occupation of Ukraine.

Title: - He disappeared, and his mouth disappeared. In short, the entire company was destroyed - the Armed ...
Description: This is reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The occupier says that one of his acquaintances went to ground zero, where he was destroyed by the Security and Defense Forces of Ukraine along with his entire occupation unit: -He disappeared and his company disappeared. In short, the whole mouth was destroyed. And they confirmed it a week ago,- the Russian complains. He also advises the interlocutor not to criticize the Russian authorities, because any wrong word in social networks is punished by being sent to a -meat- assault : -They send it to the front for the very shit, understand?-, the occupier adds. The GUR of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine also reminds that there will be due retribution for every war crime committed against the Ukrainian people. As reported by ArmyInform, in the radio intercept obtained by intelligence officers, residents of the Belgorod region about -%e2%80%95-perehoplennya-gur/->write regular episodes of looting of Russian army.

Title: The Ministry of Defense approved a new amphibious all-terrain vehicle for use in the army
Description: This is informed by the Ministry of defense of Ukraine. A four-axle vehicle can be used to navigate difficult terrain. It allows you to confidently move through loose soils, steep slopes, and thick undergrowth. The all-terrain vehicle also overcomes water obstacles and wetlands. The power of this machine is enough to transport up to half a ton of cargo. We remind you that manufacturers and developers of samples of weapons and military equipment who have questions about the codification process can contact the Main Directorate for Life Cycle Support of Weapons and Military Equipment by e-mail: mdalc@mil.ua As ArmiyaInform reported, over 55 billion UAH have been provided for the production of weapons in the project of the state budget-2025.

Title: -Burn as many trails as possible-: the only mission of disposable stormtroopers in Toretsk
Description: This was told by the commander of the 49th separate assault unit on the broadcast of the -Edyny Novyny- marathon. Yevgeny Skoryna of the -Karpatska Sich- battalion. According to Yevgeny Skoryna, the tactics of the occupiers remain unchanged - forward in small groups. Without taking into account the number of losses of personnel, equipment and ammunition. -Their task is to break as many paths as possible for the possibility of going deep into the battle formations. They are moving forward with little understanding of the situation that awaits them,- said the commander of the -Karpatska Sich- assault battalion. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the Toretsk direction, the enemy has an advantage in manpower, weapons and ammunition - personnel units of the Russian army, equipped contractors.

Title: For the attack on Sumy, the enemy used -Shakhedi- with shrapnel for the first time
Description: This was reported by the head of Sumy OVA Volodymyr Artyukh. -These weapons are used to destroy people, not to destroy objects,- said the head of the region. According to him, the Russians used four UAVs for the attack. Shrapnel marks can be seen on houses damaged by hits. -We went around the city, in a densely populated area,- Volodymyr Artyukh added. According to preliminary information, two people died as a result of the attack. , another 12 were injured of varying degrees of severity.

Title: Ukrainian companies are leading in international tenders for the production of drones
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. In addition, in terms of the number of applications for the production of interceptor drones, Ukrainian UAV manufacturers became the first - submitting 32% of the total number. In advanced FPV drones, our companies were second with a result of 26% of submitted proposals. Kateryna Chernogorenko emphasized that such a number of proposals from our companies proves that we are achieving the goal of scaling drone production in Ukraine. -It is already helping to create an asymmetric advantage in technology over the enemy. Especially in the context of interceptor drones, as our companies have the best expertise in the manufacture and application of such technologies. We want to push the world industry so that such drones go into mass production,- said the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for Digitalization. Applications for the production of advanced FPV drones ended in October. The call for proposals for the interceptor drones ended on November 11. Companies that win the tenders will receive orders for drones that will be tested and evaluated. If their designs show good results at this stage, larger orders for FPV drones from the winning manufacturers are planned. The agency recalled that the Drone Coalition was created in February 2024 during the 19th Ramstein-style meeting. The initiative was proposed by Latvia and is jointly coordinated with Great Britain. Currently, the Drone Coalition includes 16 partner countries. Ukraine has already received thousands of drones as part of the initiative. It is expected that another 20,000 to 30,000 drones will be purchased and delivered on top of the joint procurement funds already accumulated by the Coalition (€71 million). As ArmiyaInform reported, Ukrainian FPV drones developed by Brave1 teams successfully tested for resistance to work in conditions of active radio electronic suppression (REB).

Title: The Russian army increased pressure on Luhansk region: our defenders do not give up positions
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysohor, the head of the Luhansk Regional Military Administration. In particular, during the past day, fighting took place near the settlements of Tverdohlibove, Novoyehorivka, Grekivka and in Serebryansk Forest. Russian forces tried to break through the Ukrainian defenses, but our defenders held their positions, inflicting significant losses on the enemy. According to Artem Lysohor, the Ukrainian military continues to successfully carry out defense tasks at key frontiers, despite the increasing intensity of hostilities. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces stopped almost 200 Russian attacks: the enemy has become more active in the East.

Title: Ukraine is looking for innovative technologies to combat the aggressor's drones
Description: Mykhailo Fedorov wrote about this in his Telegram channel. Drones play a key role in modern warfare, and Russian forces actively use them for large-scale operations. To counter this threat, the initiative platform Brave1 together with the investment fund D3 is organizing the Jammer Hackathon, the goal of which is to create innovative systems to combat UAVs. Basic development requirements: Hackathon participants can be programmers, engineers, mathematicians, researchers, students, and startups. Teams will have the opportunity to develop their projects and present them to a professional jury. The best solutions will receive funding for further implementation. Registration is open until November 25. -Your decision can be decisive in the fight for our victory,- Mykhailo Fedorov emphasized. As ArmiyaInform reported, Ukrainian FPV drones developed by Brave1 teams successfully tested for resistance to work in conditions of active radio electronic suppression (REB).

Title: Notarial isolation: documents in the occupied Luhansk region became unreachable
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysohor, the head of the Luhansk Regional Military Administration. In Severodonetsk, the occupation authorities limited the possibility of applying to notaries. Previously, services were provided by a notary from Lysychansk, who came once or twice a week. However, after the prohibition of the so-called -extraterritorial principle- of service, citizens from Severodonetsk are prohibited from using the services of notaries in other cities of the -LNR-. Currently, one notary has been appointed in the city, but the documents pending in other settlements have not yet been handed over. The queue for a notary is scheduled until the spring of 2025, which creates significant difficulties for the population, forcing them to wait for months. In Starobilsk there is an increase in control over the school process. Teachers, cooperating with the occupying power structures, conduct informal surveys among the parents of students, finding out their attitude to the teaching of the Ukrainian language. Despite this, the return of the Ukrainian language to the school curriculum in the occupied territories is not foreseen. Such actions are aimed at identifying residents who are -disloyal- to the Russian authorities. According to Artem Lysohor, these cases are another example of oppression of the local population in the temporarily occupied territories of Luhansk region. As reported by ArmyInform, to the temporarily occupied territories of the Luhansk region /->funds for the implementation of the housing restoration program have arrived. However, in three years, from 2024 to 2026, only the roofs and foundations of about 200 apartment buildings are planned to be restored.

Title: Defense forces struck an important enemy target
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. However, our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying troops and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. The department noted that last day missile troops and artillery of the Defense Forces struck one important target of the enemy. We will remind, last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1050 persons. In addition, Ukrainian soldiers neutralized one tank, 13 armored combat vehicles, five artillery systems, MLRS, one air defense vehicle, one operational-tactical UAV, eight missiles, 32 cars and a unit of special equipment of the occupiers. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces stopped almost 200 Russian attacks: the enemy has become more active in the East.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, fortitude, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Ukrainian scouts have mastered the art of controlling combat boats
Description: This is reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -School of skippers- is part of the -Steel Front- military initiative, founded by the -Metinvest- company. Within the framework of the first set of training, 30 military personnel, in particular scouts of the GUR of the Ministry of Defense, were trained. The course program included 30 hours of theoretical classes and more than 50 hours of practice. The cadets mastered the skills of radio communication, navigation, maneuvering in difficult conditions, countering drones, evacuating the wounded and towing ships. About 10 hours each participant spent at the helm of the boat as the main skipper-captain. Training was conducted under the leadership of foreign instructors, and the program was adapted to the needs of the Ukrainian military. -This course made it possible to train qualified skippers capable of performing difficult tasks in the Black Sea in a short time. We hope for further development of this initiative,- noted one of the course graduates. Metinvest has already invested 200 million hryvnias in the development of the maritime program, which includes the training of skippers, the purchase of speedboats and ships. In October 2024, the special forces of the GUR of the MoD received the Swedish-made Combat Boat-90 armored amphibious assault ships from the -Steel Front-. The representative of -Steel Front- Oleksandr Vodoviz emphasized that the initiative received positive feedback, and work on the program will be continued to strengthen Ukraine's maritime security. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministers of Defense of Ukraine and Finland discussed the training of servicemen of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: The Russian strikes led to the death of the civilian population of the Kherson region
Description: reported this by the head of the Kherson State Administration Oleksandr Prokudin. According to him, Tyaginka, Beryslav, Stanislav, Komyshany, Sadove, Antonivka and Zelenivka came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. As the head of the OVA noted, the Russian military hit the residential quarters of the populated areas of the region, as a result of which 1 private house was damaged. The occupiers also mutilated a gas pipeline, a farm building and a private car. As reported by ArmyInform, ten settlements of Zaporozhye were affected by Russian blows.

Title: The defense forces stopped almost 200 Russian attacks: the enemy became more active in the East
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. In addition, it carried out more than three thousand attacks, including 139 from rocket salvo systems, and used more than 900 kamikaze drones for attacks. The enemy carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of the settlements of Grekivka, Raigorodka, Kuzminivka, Serebryanka, Lyman, Toretsk, Shcherbynivka, Oleksandro-Kalynov, Ivanopil'a, Oleksandropil, Chumatske, Pustinka, Andriivka, Kurakhove, Ulakly, Yantarne, and Velyka Novosilka. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy carried out offensive and assault actions ten times in the Starytsia, Vovchansk and Hlybokoy areas. The number of combat clashes per day in the Kupyan direction reached eighteen. The defense forces repelled the attacks of the occupiers in Petropavlivka, Kolisnikivka, Zagryzovo, and Lozova districts. On the Lyman direction, our troops stopped 16 enemy attacks. The invaders concentrated their main efforts in the districts of Tverdokhlibovo, Novoyehorivka, Grekivka, Terniv, Torsky and Serebryansky forestry. Ukrainian soldiers stopped three attempts of the invaders to advance near Chasovoy Yar and Stupochky in the Kramatorsk direction. The situation is under control. The enemy tried five times to advance in the Toretsk direction in the area of ​​Toretsk and Shcherbinivka. 48 attacks, this number over the past day were repelled by our defenders in the Pokrovsky direction. The enemy attacked near the settlements of Myrolyubivka, Promin, Lysivka, Petrivka, Chumatske and Pustinka. The defense forces continue to restrain the enemy in the Kurakhiv direction. In the districts of Berestki, Sontsivka, Zori, Kurakhovo, Dalniy, Katerynivka, and Antonivka, the occupiers tried 31 times to break through the lines occupied by the Defense Forces of Ukraine. Fourteen enemy attacks were stopped by our defenders in the direction of Trudovoy, Kostiantynopolskyi, Rozlyv, Suhy Yali and near Novodarivka, which is in the Vremivsk direction. In the Orykhiv direction, enemy units once tried to advance in the area of ​​Pyatikhatok. In the Dnieper direction our soldiers repelled the attacks of the Russian invaders on the positions of the Ukrainian army five times. The operational situation on the Volyn and Poliske directions has not changed significantly. No signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. The Defense Forces of Ukraine continue the operation in the Kursk direction, where the enemy launched 15 airstrikes over the past day, using 22 guided air bombs, and our defenders also repelled 29 attacks by invaders. We will remind, last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1050 persons. In addition, Ukrainian soldiers neutralized one tank, 13 armored combat vehicles, five artillery systems, MLRS, one air defense vehicle, one operational-tactical UAV, eight missiles, 32 cars and a unit of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: Increased missile threat: the enemy has withdrawn almost 30 ships into the Black Sea
Description: The Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. In the Mediterranean Sea, 2 enemy ships, 1 of which is a carrier of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 16 missiles. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, the commander of the Navy spoke about the first use of naval drones.

Title: Ten settlements of Zaporozhye were affected by Russian strikes
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhzhya OVA. In particular, 68 UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghirya, Malynivka, Olgivske and Novodarivka. In addition, 7 shelling from RSZV covered Novodanilivka, Novoandriivka and Mala Tokmachka. Ivan Fedorov noted that 97 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriyivka, Novodanilivka, Malaya Tokmachka, Biloghirya, Malynyvka, Olhivskyi and Novodarivka. -We received 4 reports about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. Civilians were not harmed,- added the head of the OVA. As reported by ArmyInform, today, November 22, Russian troops struck a residential neighborhood in Sumy with the help of Shahed drones.

Title: Enemy losses per day: artillery systems, BBM and 1050 infantrymen
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 22.11.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy is trying to advance deep into our territory: ZSU stopped 174 attempts.

Title: In Sumy, Shahed hit a residential building, there are victims
Description: informs Sumy OVA about this. According to preliminary information, as a result of the attack, two people were killed, 12 more were injured of varying degrees of severity. Emergency and rescue operations are ongoing at the scene. Specialists continue to disassemble the rubble, information about the victims and the scale of the destruction is being clarified. As reported by ArmyInform, in Kryvyi Rih already more than 30 victims: the consequences of devastating strikes.

Title: The enemy is trying to advance deep into our territory: the Armed Forces stopped 174 attempts
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The invaders launched four missile (12 missiles) and 46 air strikes (74 anti-aircraft missiles) on the territory of Ukraine. In addition, more than 300 kamikaze drones were brought in for destruction and about three thousand shots were fired at the positions of our troops and populated areas. On the Kharkiv direction, the enemy stormed the positions of our units in the Vovchansk and Staritsa areas ten times. according to the data, the losses of the enemy in the direction amounted to 52 servicemen killed and wounded, also our defenders destroyed a tank, four armored combat vehicles, an anti-tank missile complex and damaged three cars of the occupiers. In the Kupyansk direction the aggressor carried out offensive actions near Petropavlivka, Kolisnykyvka, Zagryzovy and Lozova. Ukrainian defenders stopped 14 enemy attacks. Two more clashes continue. In the Lyman direction, Russian invaders attacked the positions of the Defense Forces 16 times near Tverdokhlibovo, Novoyehorivka, Grekivka, Terni, Torsky, and in the Serebrian Forest. Three clashes continue until now. In the Kramatorsk direction the enemy stormed our positions near Time Yar and Stupochky three times. The battle continues. In the Toretsk direction, with the support of aviation, the enemy attacked the positions of Ukrainian units near the populated Toretsk and Shcherbinivka five times. In the Pokrovsky direction the enemy attacked 49 times in Myrolyubivka, Promenya, Lysivka, Petrivka, Chumatsky and Pustinka districts. Our defenders repelled 38 attacks. Eleven attacks are ongoing, the situation is under control. Occupants losses in this direction, 208 soldiers were killed and wounded, Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed an armored combat vehicle and four cars of the invaders. In the Kurakhiv direction the enemy made 26 attempts to break through our defenses near Berestki, Sontsivka, Zori, Kurakhovoy, Dalnyi, Katerynivka and Antonivka. Sixteen engagements have been completed and ten more are still ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction the enemy attacked our units 14 times, tried to break through in the direction of Trudovoy, Kostiantynopolsky, Rozlyv, Suhy Yali and near Novodarivka. Two attacks by the occupiers are still ongoing. In the Orikhov direction, the invading troops once stormed the positions of the Defense Forces in the Pyatikhatok area. In the Dnieper direction our troops repelled three attacks, the enemy had no success. There are no significant changes in the rest of the directions. Operation in Kursk Oblast is ongoing. Enemy aviation continues to strike its villages and cities with guided aerial bombs. Ukrainian soldiers repelled 27 enemy assaults. The department also honored the soldiers of the 14th separate mechanized brigade named after Prince Roman the Great, the 81st separate airmobile Slobozhan brigade and the 38th separate marine infantry brigade, who effectively destroy the enemy, causing him significant losses in manpower and equipment. As reported by ArmyInform, FPV drone pilots of the Bulava, Chimera and Nova units of the Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytsky destroyed 4 units of enemy armored vehicles, -Hail- and a large number of infantry.

Title: What will be the result of lowering the age and enlisting women in the army: the historian spoke abo...
Description: Should we be afraid of mobilization measures? What will reducing the mobilization age, conscription of women, or the introduction of other mechanisms operating in the world bring to Ukraine? A military historian, head of the Center for Military History, Vasyl Pavlov, told the ArmiyaInform correspondent about this: -If we talk about mobilization, we will not find any other recipes for effective resistance to the aggressor. The only question is that until 2014 Ukrainian society was generally in a certain -lethargic- state, no one was preparing for war. From 2014 to 2021, the Ukrainian authorities, the Ukrainian state, managed to minimize the impact of the war on society, which led to the fact that the war and its feeling ended at the administrative borders of the anti-terrorist operation or the operation of the joint forces, while the rest of the country did not feel it. And when the question of mobilization arose, it became clear that the population was absolutely not ready to participate in the war. I don't know how to rate it. Is it very bad or not. We are very fond of saying, -I was not born for war.- Indeed, no one is born for war, no one is born for murder. Most likely, people are born to realize higher, more beautiful goals. But life works out the way it does. And if we talk about mobilization, then sooner or later Ukraine will go through all the stages that states that found themselves in a state of total war went through. We are now in a state of total war, that is, it is taking place on the entire territory of our state, regardless of whether there are military actions on the ground, or rocket attacks, or daily night attacks by Shaheds, or whether there is a threat of actions by subversive and intelligence groups. That is, we now have a situation where the entire population of the state is in one way or another related to the war. But a certain part of the population does not believe that this is their war. And the reason here is that for 30 years, the youth education policy was not carried out properly, the society education policy was not carried out, the state was not preparing for war. We constantly mentioned that it would be good for Ukraine to become Israel, but in the end we became Israel. But then we have to accept all those norms that exist in Israel itself. This is a certain mobilization age, this is the mobilization of women, this is the participation of all strata and strata of the population in the war. Therefore, I hope that just as Ukrainian society has overcome many problems of its growth since 1991, we will also overcome the problem of mobilization. Sooner or later it will all be evened out, because in a state of war, and everyone should understand this, we still have a long, long time to live. And again, here the question will be that the state should take a proactive position in the matter of the formation of a mobilization resource. We very often make fun of Russians that they are trying to do something from kindergarten. But we have to understand a very simple thing: they have been preparing for war for several generations. And the Russians have been openly talking about this since 2015. That they have the mobilization resource to wage war for one to two generations, that is, for 25 to 50 years. In other words, the Russians completely deliberately moved to a war of attrition, to a long-term war. In the same way, we need to prepare for this: prepare society physically, technologically and mentally.

Title: How to return from the SZCH correctly: about the search, reserve battalions and transfer to another ...
Description: — Not so long ago, changes were made to the Criminal Code of Ukraine in relation to SZH. From now on, there is an opportunity for military personnel to return to service, avoiding criminal punishment. So, what is the legal way to return from the SZH now? - Currently, there are several options for returning to military service. Everything depends on the categories of servicemen. There are three in total. If we talk about changes in the Criminal Code, then this applies to military personnel, about whom information has already been entered into the Unified Register of Pretrial Investigations. In such a case, a military serviceman can independently, at the stage of the pre-trial investigation, submit a written request to the investigator, the prosecutor, directly to the court or come to the nearest administrative body of the VSP. If, at this stage, criminal proceedings are ongoing against such a serviceman and his military service is suspended, the prosecutor may submit a motion to the court to release him from criminal responsibility to continue his service. But there are still certain conditions. In particular, this applies to servicemen who have committed FGM for the first time. There must also be written consent of the commander of the military unit for his continuation of military service. Accordingly, the court may decide to close the criminal proceedings and release the serviceman from criminal liability. In this case, the serviceman is given three days to arrive at the military unit or at the place of service, and already the unit is obliged to reinstate this serviceman in the service. At the same time, it should be noted that there may be certain circumstances that will not allow a serviceman to return to the military unit where he served, for example, the commander's refusal to give consent. In this case, he can return to service in another military unit. The list of these parts is determined by the General Staff of the Armed Forces. There is a different category of servicemen, and a correspondingly different return option. It is usually the most common. Up to 45% of the cases when servicemen committed a SZH, the duration of which did not exceed three days. That is, before acquiring signs of a criminal offense. In this case, this serviceman can independently return to the military unit to continue his service. Of course, the commander has to find out the circumstances why the serviceman committed the SZH. And then disciplinary responsibility is applied to him. And there is a third category. This is when a serviceman who has committed a criminal offense wants to return to service, and at the same time, the information about the offense is not entered into the ERDR. That is, 3 days have already passed, according to the disciplinary statute, the commander of the military unit has appointed an official investigation, which can last a month, but there are also different situations. Perhaps the serviceman fell ill or was insulted by someone in the service, or there were certain family circumstances, and he was not heard and was not given leave. entered in the EDPR, such a serviceman with the participation of the VSP is delivered to the reserve battalions, which is in the Armed Forces. There is an algorithm approved by the Commander-in-Chief, and in reserve battalions such a serviceman is transferred to military units and units of the Armed Forces. Depending on the situation, a decision is made to return him to service: either to the place where he served, or to another place. For example, there are task forces, let's say -buyers-, who carry out the recruitment of military personnel. — Tell us more about these reserve battalions. What is their function? - Every operational command has reserve battalions. And now the initiative to increase the staff and the number of these battalions has started. This was done in order to go to a meeting and receive servicemen who decided to return to service. True, there are also certain nuances here. First of all, we are talking about the return to the units identified as a priority for completion. It is intended that the soldier return to the combat unit, and not just to the rear. It is important not to legalize the process of transferring servicemen through the SZH. But, of course, each case must be considered separately. If a serviceman is medically unfit to serve in combat units, then other options are considered. Someone can't be an attack fighter, but can be, for example, a UAV operator, a signalman, or an IT person. That is, efforts are focused on what is most needed now and on human capabilities. — Let's take a closer look at the issue of returning to service in another unit. And how does it work in practice? Is only the consent of the commander of the unit where the serviceman wants to serve sufficient? -According to Article 401 of the Criminal Code, the written consent of the commander of the military unit to which the serviceman wants to return to continue his service is sufficient. Today, this mechanism is implemented in reserve battalions. You can find out more about this in any department of the VSP. But this applies to those servicemen against whom criminal proceedings have been opened and there is information in the EDPR. If we consider the option when the information is not entered in the ERA, then the general norms of departmental regulatory and administrative acts of the Ministry of Defense and the Armed Forces of Ukraine on issues of military service, according to which the consent of the commander of the military unit where the serviceman served, and the commander of the military unit to which the serviceman is transferred. And here, as I have already said, a special action algorithm has been developed. In particular, working groups have been created in the reserve battalions to speed up decision-making. There are also medical workers, and employees of personnel agencies, and psychological support, and Law Enforcement Services. To process documents, in addition to mail, messengers are used so as not to wait for the documents to arrive. In particular, servicemen submit reports, commanders confirm their approvals. This working group then considers the expediency of moving the serviceman, and a relocation plan is developed within a day and submitted to the Commander-in-Chief for review. Transfers may be approved within the Armed Forces. In the case of a positive decision on the transfer of a serviceman, an order is issued for personnel. The personnel center of the Armed Forces of Ukraine sends an electronic notification of the adoption of a personnel decision to the unit where the serviceman is serving and to the unit where the commander agreed to the transfer. Also, within three days, the senior group informs the serviceman about the adopted or unadopted personnel decision. Decisions may not be made, for example, due to health, profession, presence or lack of certain experience. It is possible that the serviceman needs to be sent for additional training or retraining. There may be cases when it needs to be sent to the VLK. There are medical companies in the new staff of reserve battalions. Because this is not only an entry into the Armed Forces, but to some extent also an exit from them. If the serviceman needs additional examination. There are such flagrant socially unjust cases when a person has lost a limb, but for some reason is listed in the SZH. Therefore, we make an appropriate decision and report such situations to the command. —Are there any units that are interested in sending those who went to the SZH to them? Perhaps some brigades have approached you? — Many military units are interested in being equipped, in particular, at the expense of servicemen who have completed SZH and wish to return to service. Therefore, in reserve battalions, conditions have been created for the selection of such servicemen, which is carried out by representatives of military units. They come there, study personal files, documents, and in accordance with this, the units carry out selection. Someone is looking for certain specialists, for example: signalmen, REB officers, engineers, sappers or drivers, because there is a shortage of them. The interest is there, and so is the action algorithm. That is, something like recruiting is conducted. Only in this case, not the civilian population, but active servicemen. And it is even better, because the military serviceman is already trained, was in the formation, performed tasks. — Has the number of those who voluntarily return to the army increased due to the introduction of changes to the law? —The rate of servicemen who voluntarily return to military units and show willingness to serve, increased, and a positive trend is observed in the future. Other measures also contribute to this. For example, the Commander-in-Chief decided on a large-scale search. When we'll peak, I can't say. But we predict that growth will continue. Courts consider the petitions of military personnel. The return algorithm works. Working offices have been created in the battalions. In fact, we are now going down the path of selecting a category of parolees who have volunteered to serve. They made study rooms. Online court sessions were held, decisions were made, decisions were sent to the battalions. There are also additional places for working groups of pre-trial investigation bodies and procedural heads from the prosecutor's office. These meetings are scheduled daily. There was also a decision of the Supreme Court, which appointed certain judges to hear these very cases in order to speed up the processes of returning servicemen to service. Next, we will look at the dynamics. — You said a large-scale search. How is the search for those who have committed FIR or desertion generally carried out? -The search is carried out in cooperation with many authorities. We work with the SBU, the National Police, the TCC and SP, the SBU, the Border Service. The case is being investigated, and a search is being made for all possible locations or hiding places of servicemen. For example, by the place of residence of parents, family, close relatives, loved one; by the place of recruitment or work. In addition, data are transferred to general registers that are relevant to the search. Operational information exchange is carried out. Our search system is constantly being improved. An interaction manual has been developed, where the processes are defined by the direction of work. According to the result of the search, servicemen are delivered either to the reserve battalions, if the information is not entered in the EDPR, or to the nearest pre-trial investigation body. You should not think that no one is looking for anyone. There are already many examples when servicemen received real sentences. But we also understand and emphasize that there is no single main problem of the implementation of the SDF or the desertion of servicemen. Each case should be considered only individually and the circumstances of the offense should be studied. In individual cases, appoint additional investigations and inspections. In particular, regarding the activity or inaction of the officials of the management structure, which forces the serviceman to commit the specified offenses.

Title: Autonomous anti-ship symbiosis: the US announced the transfer of unmanned ground vehicles to the KMP...
Description: As stated in to the official release posted on the Oshkosh Defense portal, ROGUE-Fires (Remotely Operated Ground Unit for Expeditionary Fires fire action-) is an unmanned ground vehicle (UGV) that uses the extreme off-road mobility and cargo capacity of the Oshkosh JLTV off-road vehicle, as well as advanced autonomous vehicle technologies to support ground-based anti-ship missile (GBASM) operations, ArmyInform reports. ROGUE-Fires have two modes of operation: tele-controlled and fully autonomous. This allows effective performance of combat missions in conditions of minimal operator intervention. The platform is capable of carrying a wide range of warheads, including the Naval Strike Missile (NSM), a modern missile designed to engage sea targets at a distance of up to 185 kilometers. One of the key advantages of ROGUE-Fires is the ability to conduct distributed logistics operations, which makes it not only a weapon platform, but also a versatile machine to support operations in the rear. ROGUE-Fires is also integrated into the NMESIS (Navy Marine Expeditionary Ship Interdiction System), which includes proven remote control technologies and the Naval Strike Missile. One of the key tactics used with NMESIS is the -scoot-and-shoot- method (quick movement after a shot), which allows you to minimize the possibility of receiving hits from the enemy in response. The NSM is a high-precision missile developed by Kongsberg Defense. Its feature is the ability to fly at low altitudes, avoiding radar detection, and hit both stationary and moving targets with maximum accuracy. To create the missile body, composite materials are used to reduce the radar signature. The NSM has a high-explosive high-explosive warhead made of a high-strength titanium alloy, filled with an insensitive explosive with a reduced probability of detonation when the missile is fired. One launcher accommodates 4 missiles, after firing, the NSM can travel a long distance over land, and then go to a target in the sea. This is followed by recognition and selection of an object for destruction, the missile hits the ship in the waterline area and uses a programmable detonator to inflict maximum damage on heavily armored targets. SUV JLTV, about which ArmyInform details told in one of her materials, was developed for the US Army and Marine Corps as a replacement for HMMWV (Hummer) military vehicles. In August 2015, the first contract for the supply of 16,901 vehicles to the armed forces was signed. JLTVs provide better protection than HMMWVs, comparable to the level of heavier and larger MRAP-type armored vehicles. The Gale Banks Engineering 866T diesel engine is capable of accelerating the armored car to a speed of 110 km/h. In total, the Pentagon plans to deploy 14 such batteries. By 2025, the Marine Corps wants to have four NMESIS batteries, which will allow it to achieve initial operational readiness. Full combat readiness is planned for 2030. The appearance of such ground-based unmanned systems as ROGUE-Fires demonstrates the rapid development of technologies of autonomous combat vehicles. This machine not only increases the flexibility and mobility of the troops, but also reduces the risks to the personnel by allowing tasks to be carried out remotely. The ability to adapt the platform for different tasks makes it valuable in the changing nature of modern warfare, where flexibility and speed of reaction play a crucial role. ROGUE-Fires ground unmanned systems for the US KMP. Video: Journal Military

Title: Telegram channels of the Russian Federation spread a fake about the supply of dozens of mobile morgu...
Description: The disinformation post is accompanied by a photo showing mobile containers with what appears to be the English inscription -Mobile Morgue-. As reports the Countering Disinformation Center, in fact this is another fake of Russian propaganda, and mobile containers, about in question are mobile boiler houses that the Ukrainian Red Cross, in cooperation with Coca-Cola, delivers to local communities to support the population of Ukraine. The theme of -use of crematoriums in the Armed Forces- is strongly supported throughout the full-scale invasion. For example, in September 2023, propaganda -brought- such crematoria in the amount of 200 units from Germany, and in August 2024 - from Sweden and Italy. Judging by the pace of propaganda, there will soon be no mobile crematoria left in Europe. At the same time, it is Russia that actively uses them, and there is corresponding evidence for this. Thus, as of April 2022, according to the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, 13 mobile crematoria were operating in the temporarily occupied Mariupol to clear the streets of the bodies of dead civilians. The use of such crematoria was also recorded in the territory of Chernihiv region and in the city of Novoaidar, Luhansk region.

Title: More than 30 victims have already been injured in Kryvyi Rih: the consequences of devastating strike...
Description: reported this by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional Military Administration Serhiy Lysak. According to him, three people were injured in Dnipro. In Kryvyi Rih, 31 people were injured. Nine apartment buildings were destroyed, three administrative buildings, a post office, a store and a power line were damaged. Rescuers and utility services are working at the impact sites throughout the day. People are helped by psychologists and volunteers from charity organizations. At the same time, shelling of Nikopolshchyna continues. The Russian occupiers used barrel artillery and kamikaze drones, shelling the district center and the Marganets community. Fortunately, there were no casualties among local residents. Ukrainian services continue to eliminate the consequences of the attacks, helping residents affected by the aggressor's actions. As reported by ArmyInform, u a 38-year-old woman is in serious condition, she has cut wounds on her head.

Title: The president called on the world to strengthen sanctions: -Putin spits in the face of those who see...
Description: The head of state wrote about this in his Telegram channel. According to Volodymyr Zelenskyi, this is Russia's second step in a year to expand the scope of the war. The first was North Korea's deployment of at least 11,000 troops to support Russian aggression. -This is an obvious and serious increase in the brutality of war, as well as a cynical violation of the UN Charter. -Putin ignores calls from the whole world, including China, Brazil, the United States and European countries, to end the war,- the President emphasized. Volodymyr Zelenskyy also noted that Russia continues its attacks, despite all attempts by the international community to establish peace. He emphasized that Ukraine has a full right to self-defense in accordance with the norms of international law. -Every night our country is attacked by Iranian drones, and a contingent from North Korea is deployed on the border. -Putin not only continues the war, but also challenges all those who seek peace,- the head of state noted. The president called on the international community to respond decisively to the actions of the Kremlin. He emphasized that the lack of tough sanctions and measures only encourages Russia to new attacks. -The world must act decisively to force Russia to real peace. Otherwise, strikes, threats and destabilization from Russia will continue and affect not only Ukraine. Real peace is worth the effort, and we need to act now,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy concluded.

Title: Recidivist Cinderella: set fire to a military man's car and ran away so much that he lost things
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informed about this. According to the investigation, on November 20, 2024, a man who was previously charged with criminal responsibility deliberately set fire to a car with visible signs of a military vehicle. For this, he used a pre-prepared ignition mixture. As a result of the arson, the car suffered significant damage, causing material damage to its owner, a defender of Ukraine. The suspect was detained in accordance with Article 208 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine. Currently, the issue of selecting him as a preventive measure in the form of detention is being resolved. Law enforcement officers are also investigating the man's possible involvement in other similar crimes. It is being established whether he had connections with the alleged masterminds of the crime, in particular with Russian -curators-. The pre-trial investigation is ongoing. It is being conducted by investigators of the Chuguyiv district police department of the National Security Service of Ukraine in the Kharkiv region. It should be noted that according to Article 62 of the Constitution of Ukraine, a person is considered innocent of committing a crime until his guilt is proven in a legal manner and established by a court verdict. As reported by ArmyInform, they wore burgundy and worked for Russia: two more traitors were detained in Chernihiv Oblast.

Title: REB mines are not afraid - -Birds of Magyar- have learned to bypass the most powerful Russian REB
Description: The video of the combat work was published on November 21 on the battalion channel. Recently, powerful EW installations have appeared on the equipment of the occupiers, which prevent our drones from working on them. -But there is a way out: large-scale and permanent remote mining of all possible ways of movement, assaults, logistics, evacuation of the enemy. Equipment stopped by mines is then disposed of by ordinary FPV drones,- said the battalion commander, Captain Robert Brovdi. He showed how Russian equipment detonated on a remotely installed mine is then calmly carried out by drones, since the EW is not working on it. -The wormhole must be stopped systematically and in advance. Along the entire front line. Without risking the infantry, to mine non-stop with the forces of hundreds of aviation units that we have,- says Robert Brovdi. Now -Birds of Magyar- is conducting a large fundraiser for mines for drones on their channel. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 414th battalion of unmanned aviation systems -Birds Madyara- as part of the marines struck Russian attack aircraft.

Title: Exclusively with drones - the enemy attacked in a column and was defeated
Description: The video of combat operation appeared on November 21 on the brigade's channel. The occupiers decided to break through in a column in the Vremivsk direction. Their goal is to deliver as many infantry as possible and land them for assault operations. The column of Russians moved across the field without even trying to hide. The enemy carried out similar assault actions in several areas at once. The enemy uses artillery and MLRS to support its troops. The aerial reconnaissance of the 3rd mechanized battalion detected the enemy in advance, which made it possible to effectively work on it. -Our units managed to destroy two tanks and two MTLB. The enemy suffered losses in equipment and heavy losses in infantry. An enemy “Grad” was also discovered and destroyed,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the 4th mechanized battalion of the Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytsky made a selection of the last photographs Russian invaders.

Title: The beginning of a military career: a recruiting center was opened in Sumy
Description: About notify on the information portal of the Sumy City Council. The Center's specialists work directly with military units, so they offer a wide selection of positions. Candidates are guaranteed that they will be assigned to the chosen unit. In addition, the specialists of the Recruiting Center accompany the future soldier all the way: from the first consultation to the start of service in the unit. ArmyInform reminds that you can join the army either directly at recruiting centers, and use the aggregator vacancies in the Armed Forces.

Title: Real war changes quickly, we must adapt education to these changes - Serhiy Melnyk
Description: About said on November 21 Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine, Brigadier General of Justice Serhiy Melnik. -Despite full-scale Russian aggression, we continue to improve the system of military education, in particular under the NATO DEEP program. Even in such a difficult time, we do not stop the transformation of the educational process. We should focus our efforts on improving the study of foreign languages ​​so that graduates of higher educational institutions of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine can represent our country at the international level,- Serhiy Melnyk said. For according to him, as part of the reform of the military education system, special attention is paid to the implementation of the NATO DEEP Program and the involvement of foreign partners in strengthening the language training of cadets and servicemen. In particular, preparations for the institutional audit of the military education system of Ukraine in 2025 have begun with the financial support of the Republic of Lithuania. Special emphasis will be done to intensify the teaching of foreign languages ​​for first-year students of higher military educational institutions. For this purpose, it is planned to update educational programs and form requests of higher education institutions, which can be financed by international partners. In addition, it is planned to involve instructors from combat brigades in the educational process and training of cadets. -Real war changes quickly. For example, at the beginning of 2022 we knew nothing about FPV drones, and today it is one of the key weapons. Therefore, we must quickly adapt the processes of education and training of servicemen to changes on the battlefield,- emphasized Serhiy Melnyk. As reported by ArmyInform, the number of training flights of cadet pilots will increase, the geography of flights will expand.

Title: Evaders bought -diseases- for their own children - a new scheme was exposed in Odesa
Description: This was announced on November 21 by the Prosecutor's Office of Odesa Oblast. The head of one of the departments of -Children's City Clinical Hospital No. 3- was informed of the suspicion of obtaining an illegal benefit (Part 3 of Article 368 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). According to the investigation, the suspect offered the citizen to carry out a fictitious hospitalization of his two minor children and issue documents with false information about the joint stay of the father with them in hospital treatment. These documents could allow the conscripted father to avoid being summoned to the TCC and SP, as well as provide him with unhindered movement around the city. The doctor was detained after receiving $400 for issuing fictitious documents. Currently, the suspect has been remanded in custody with an alternative to bail. The full circle of employees of the medical institution involved in the crime is established. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Ukraine is ready to share with Finland the experience of confronting the aggressor — Rustem Umyerov
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine announced this on November 21. -Finland is one of our most important partners, and I sincerely appreciate that cooperation between our countries has been actively developing in recent years,- said Rustem Umyerov. According to him, the possibilities of strengthening Ukrainian defense capabilities on the battlefield with the help of Finnish security products were discussed. The parties also agreed on the further development of bilateral cooperation in the field of military tech, in particular in the field of telecommunications. -Individually, we see great prospects for partnership between the enterprises of the defense industry of our countries. For its part, Ukraine is ready to share its unique experience of modern confrontation with an aggressor country with which Finland, like Ukraine, shares a common border. Thank you Antti Hyakkanen for your openness to cooperation,- wrote Rustem Umyerov. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine and Estonia signed > Memorandum between defense departments.

Title: A friend will not betray, a pig will not eat - the opposite happened to the occupiers in Kharkiv Obl...
Description: The video was published on November 21 on the channel of one of the fighters. At first, aerial scouts filmed the surviving Russian rummaging through the pockets of his dead comrade. Moreover, he does it skillfully, it can be seen that this is not the first chosen corpse of his brother. After some time, our aerial scouts recorded how a whole family of pigs occupied the body of the Russians. Judging by their color, domestic, but wild. -Looting on the battlefield is a habit for the Ruz people. But saboteur pigs are this week's find. They take revenge with a vengeance, even more brutally than special forces. Merciless animals,- joked the Burevia fighter. As reported by ArmyInform, the -Horiv- special purpose reconnaissance platoon of the Presidential Brigade of operational assignment named after Hetman Petro Doroshenko -Bureviy- attacked the enemy in Luhansk region.

Title: The Ministry of Defense will test new samples of women's winter clothing
Description: This was reported by on November 21 Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. It is about: - winter windproof jackets and pants, — underwear for cold weather (shirt and pants). -The Ministry of Defense improves the physical support of female military personnel, makes structural changes in clothing and personal protective equipment, taking into account the anthropological characteristics of women. Our goal is to develop a new winter jacket and pants, as well as demi-season and winter underwear. We have to provide women with comfortable clothes that will meet their needs and allow them to perform combat and special tasks more effectively,- Deputy Minister of Defense Dmytro Klimenkov noted. Basic requirements for the specified items are defined by the technical specifications of the Ministry of Defense. You can familiarize yourself with them on the official digital portal -‎MOU Partner-‎ in the -‎TS/TU/Announcement-‎ section (hereinafter - -‎Technical specifications of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine for items for physical support-‎ - -‎Field uniform-‎) and -‎Underwear-‎). -We invite interested manufacturers (suppliers) to notify by November 25 2024, the Central Directorate for the Development of Material Support and the Command of the Logistics Forces of the Armed Forces regarding the possibility of manufacturing and providing free of charge for military (experimental) tests at least 11 sets (units) of the above items. All applications for participation in trials must be submitted exclusively through the MOU Partner portal ( https://partner.mod.gov.ua/)-, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine said in a statement. The Ministry of Defense is committed to ensuring equal conditions of service for all servicemen, introducing innovations that increase the comfort and efficiency of our defenders, as well as expanding the range of suppliers. As reported ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense told about the purchase of technological weapons for 90 billion UAH.

Title: They didn't pass the exam, they passed the exam - the occupiers studied takmed, and the GUR checked ...
Description: Video of combat work published on November 21 by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The HUR soldiers discovered a cluster of enemy personnel who were -playing doctor- and decided to add a practical component to the Russians: using the Tavria anti-aircraft missile system, they launched a missile attack on the training ground. -The invaders did not pass the exam - a platoon of Russians suffered losses in the form of killed and seriously wounded, which, however, no one was in a hurry to save,- commented the video in the GUR. As reported by ArmyInform, the GUR refuted fake reports about a -massive attack-.

Title: James Bond is no longer the same: the pro-Russian agent -007- received 15 years in prison
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. Counterintelligence officers of the SBU detained the spy in September 2022. She was a resident of the temporarily occupied Pologiv district, where she was recruited by the Russian special services. Under the guise of volunteering, the traitor arrived in Zaporozhye to collect intelligence. The attacker tried to establish contacts with the Ukrainian military in order to obtain data about the bases, fortified areas and firing positions of the Defense Forces. She used an anonymous chat in the messenger to communicate information to her supervisor from the FSB. The SBU timely detected and documented the criminal activity of the agent, and also took measures to secure military locations. According to the SBU materials, the court convicted the perpetrator for h. 2 Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). The investigation was conducted by SBU employees in the Zaporizhia and Ternopil regions under the procedural guidance of the regional prosecutor's office. As reported by ArmyInform, they wore burgundy and worked for Russia: two more traitors were detained at Chernihiv Oblast.

Title: For a break - our Paladin hit a Russian tank hiding in the garage
Description: The video was released on November 21 on the brigade's channel. The enemy tank was spotted by aerial scouts of the reconnaissance battalion, who traced its movement to the garage where the occupiers hid their equipment. The coordinates of the hiding place were given to the artillerymen of the 2nd self-propelled division, which are armed with the American M109 PALADIN self-propelled gun. After the hit, first the garage caught fire, and then the tank itself. It all ended with the detonation of his ammunition. In the morning, aerial scouts testified that the enemy's equipment turned into scrap in the ruins. As reported by ArmyInform, the battalion of unmanned attack aircraft complexes -Achilles- of the 92nd assault brigade named after chief Ivan Sirko immediately struck two TOS-1A -Solntsepok- heavy flamethrower salvo systems.

Title: The President met with the Chief of Defense Staff of Great Britain
Description: It became known in the evening of November 21. The meeting was also attended by the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, General Oleksandr Syrskyi, and the Chief of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Lieutenant General Anatoliy Barhylevych. -We are grateful to your people and government for long-term support from Great Britain. Our countries have good contacts and strong cooperation,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. During the meeting, defense cooperation between Ukraine and Great Britain was discussed, in particular the development and expansion of the technological capabilities of the Armed Forces. Volodymyr Zelenskyi and Anthony Radakin paid special attention to Ukraine's military needs and further assistance from partners. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine and Great Britain discussed plans to help Ukrainian soldiers in 2025.

Title: Stop it with a mine, destroy it with cassettes, finish it off with drops - in the Kharkiv region, an...
Description: The video of the battle appeared on November 21 on the brigade channel. The occupiers do not stop trying to break through, and this time they moved to the positions of the 3rd assault brigade with a convoy of three armored combat vehicles. After the first car was blown up by mines, the infantry began to flee from the armored vehicles. But the artillery of four divisions of the brigade began to work on the enemy attack aircraft. Powerful strikes from the use of cluster munitions killed almost all of the enemy's manpower. Drops from the FPV drone bombed the remnants of the equipment and the occupiers who were already retreating on foot.   As reported by ArmyInform, the platoon of the Primus attack unmanned aerial systems of the 1st assault battalion of the 3rd assault brigade showed extermination of Russians who managed to reach our positions.

Title: On the Day of Airborne Assault Troops, the President honored the soldiers with state awards
Description: It became known in the evening of November 21. The ceremony was also attended by a delegation from Great Britain led by the Chief of the Defense Staff, Admiral Sir Anthony Radakin. The Head of State noted that the Airborne Assault Forces fight in the most difficult areas and perform the most difficult tasks. -There is not such a really hot section of our front that would not feel the power of our DSHV. And separately, I want to thank our paratroopers for the Kursk operation - for the fact that Ukraine proved that it is capable under any circumstances of directing this war in such a way that Russia understands what they have done with this war and that they will be responsible for it. must answer,- said the President. Volodymyr Zelenskyy urged to always remember all Ukrainian men and women who gave their lives on the battlefield for the sake of Ukraine and its independence. Those present honored the memory of the fallen with a minute of silence. The head of state presented the -Golden Star- order to the relatives of three fallen Heroes of Ukraine. The highest rank was posthumously awarded to: Lieutenant Vitaly Dudai. The platoon under his command repeatedly repelled enemy attacks near Maryinka, inflicted significant casualties on the enemy, destroyed three tanks, several BMPs and vehicles with infantry. Vitaly Dudai died last year on May 21 as a result of enemy mortar fire during the replacement of the group in combat positions. Senior sapper Danilo Zvonarev. He made passages through enemy mine-explosive barriers, mined the front edge of the defense, participated in assaults and, as part of evacuation groups, took out the wounded and dead under enemy fire. On July 23 of last year, during the mining of the front edge of the defense in the Maryinka area, Danylo Zvonaryev, as part of his group, came under artillery fire. He covered his two brothers, but he himself died from multiple shrapnel wounds. Sergeant Artem Sobchenko. During the battles in Soledar, as a combat medic, he saved the lives and health of many comrades, took part in defensive battles in Bakhmut and led a unit. During another Russian assault, his fighter was wounded and could not get to the shelter himself. Artem Sobchenko reached his brother under targeted fire, provided help and evacuated. But during the transfer to the firing position, he suffered a life-threatening wound as a result of artillery fire. Two more Heroes of Ukraine personally received the Golden Star order: Colonel Yevhen Lasiychuk. The commander of the 25th separate airborne brigade, which is fighting in the Pokrovsky direction. In March, the unit under his leadership thwarted a large-scale offensive by the Russian occupiers, who engaged 36 tanks and 12 BMPs. In general, during the defense in this direction, the soldiers of the brigade destroyed almost a thousand occupiers and wounded more than one and a half thousand, as well as eliminated 43 tanks, 81 BMPs, 4 armored personnel carriers, 1 self-propelled guns and 17 drones. Major Ruslan Panezyorov. Last year in January near Klishchiivka, during the evacuation of three wounded comrades, he came under enemy fire, but despite this, he remained on the battlefield together with the group and destroyed 15 invaders. In the winter of this year, he ensured the passage of assault groups under the aimed fire of artillery and tanks, and then arranged mine and explosive barricades. Thanks to this, it was possible to destroy about 35 invaders and 5 BPM. The Head of State presented the -Cross of Combat Merit- to two more defenders. It was received by: Colonel Andriy Tkachuk. The commander of the 71st separate hunting brigade, which last autumn conducted defensive and offensive actions in the Zaporizhia direction and advanced up to 1 km deep into the front line.
