In May of this year, the brigade together with other military units of the Armed Forces destroyed 8 self-propelled guns, 14 tanks, 11 BMP and 36 vehicles in the Vovchansk region. Colonel Aleksii Yavkun. The commander of the 81st separate airmobile brigade, whose units destroyed 8 T-80 tanks, 6 BMPs, an ammunition depot and up to 50 Russian invaders near Beilohorivka from March to April of this year and forced the enemy to retreat. Also, in just one battle at the beginning of May, units of the brigade eliminated 3 T-80 tanks, 2 BMPs, 1 armored personnel carrier and up to 20 invaders. In addition, the Head of State awarded defenders with the orders of Bohdan Khmelnytsky II and III degrees, -For Courage- II and III degrees and Princess Olga II degrees. The President presented the award -For Courage and Courage- to 199 training centers of Airborne Assault Forces, and also awarded 77 separate Airborne Assault Brigades the honorary name -Naddnipryansk- and 148 separate artillery brigades - -Zhytomyr-. As reported by ArmyInform, President reacted to the use of intercontinental weapons.

Title: -The mountaineer- drowned - in Kurshchyna, the record holder occupier was hit
Description: The video of the hits was published on November 21 on the group's channel. the Russian first tried to hide in the grass, after several drops he remained alive, managed to roll into a ditch and hid in the water, where he also survived many more hits. -13 resets! This is our dearest occupant. We have never spent so much on one infantryman,- the Black Swan commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the Black Swan strike group of the 225th assault battalion demonstrated fantastic accuracy in destroying the Russians.

Title: Paratroopers of the 80th brigade captured 26 Russians, -Azov- sets fire to the occupiers: stream fro...
Description: In Kurshchyna, Ukrainian rockets hit the command post of the Russians near the village of Maryino. It was corrected by the fighters of the combined detachment of the 78th separate assault-assault regiment -Bumblebee- and the crew of the -Harpoon- 413th separate battalion of unmanned systems. The third assault brigade destroyed a column of equipment and all Russian infantry during the assault in the Kharkiv region. This time, the occupiers advanced on the positions of the 3rd OShBr with a column of three BBMs. The first car blew up on mines, the infantry hurried, and the artillery of four divisions of the brigade began to work on it at once. The remnants of the equipment and the occupants were bombed with rockets and FPV drones. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - Major Andrii Makarenko and Lieutenant Colonel Serhii Misyura.

Title: The disgusting seven - a whole group of collaborators was detained in the Kherson region
Description: The Security Service of Ukraine reported this on November 21. After the release of the regional center, the accused tried to avoid justice. One of them was going to flee abroad, and the rest minimized their contacts and hardly left the house, trying to -lay low.- In particular, the SBU and the National Police detained two Kherson residents who were -chief accountants- in the temporarily occupied city - one at the regional hospital, and the other at Gauleiter Saldo's administration. According to his instructions, female collaborators transferred all the property of captured state institutions to the benefit of the Russian Federation and introduced a -ruble- zone. Another detainee is a local businessman who, after the occupation of the port city with the permission of the Rashists, set up a currency exchange point where he bought hryvnias in exchange for Russian rubles. According to available data, through such controlled -financiers- the enemy hoped to completely remove the official currency of Ukraine from circulation in the region. The other three collaborators urged local residents to -vote for joining- the region to the Russian Federation. Together with them, another agitator of racism was detained, who from the stage of the Belozersk community spoke in support of the occupying groups of Russia. Currently, all those involved have been notified of suspicion (according to the crimes committed) under several articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: h. 2 Art. 28, Ch. 4, 5 and ch. 6 Art. 111-1 (collaborative activity committed by a group of persons based on prior collusion); h. 1 Art. 111-2 (assistance to the aggressor state); h. 1 Art. 436-2 (justification, recognition as legitimate, denial of armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, glorification of its participants). Perpetrators face up to 12 years in prison with confiscation of property. As reported by ArmyInform, the Security Service of Ukraine and the Prosecutor General's Office notified about the suspicion of two Russian militants who tortured local residents during the occupation of Kherson.

Title: Heavenly Buntar - the Defense Forces have a new reconnaissance -wing-
Description: This was announced by the Deputy Prime Minister for Innovation, Education, Science and of Technologies, Minister of Digital Transformation of Ukraine Mykhailo Fedorov. Buntar-1 is used for real-time reconnaissance, target detection, as well as adjustment of artillery, in particular reactive. The main feature of the drone is uninterrupted communication even under EW. One of the developers of the reconnaissance UAV Buntar-1 is a fighter of the Security and Defense Forces, so the drone was developed for the real needs he saw at the front. Buntar-1 operates at a range of 80 km, so it was difficult to test it on the test site. With this request, the developers turned to Brave1. The cluster helped with test flights and introduced the company to the defense tech community. After that, the drone was successfully used on the battlefield. Learn about further plans, market challenges and feedback from the front in the new edition of Warchangers. As ArmiyaInform reported, Ukrainian FPV drones developed by Brave1 teams successfully tested for resistance to work in conditions of active radio electronic suppression (REB).
